summary: Burger Time is an action game released by Data East in 1982. The goal is to make burgers by stepping on the giant ingredients to drop them onto the plates below. Defeat the enemy pickles and wieners by trapping them between the burger ingredients!

name: Arcade Archives: Burnin' Rubber
summary: Burnin’ Rubber is an action game released by Data East in 1982. Race the course against enemy vehicles, avoiding obstacles and aiming to be first to the goal. Speeding up will make it possible to jump, allowing you to not only avoid obstacles, but also land on enemy vehicles, exploding them to gain points.

name: Arcade Archives: Circus Charlie
summary: Circus Charlie is a scrolling action game released by Konami in 1984. The player takes control of a circus clown, Charlie, to perform daring circus acts such as jumping through rings of fire and the flying trapeze. Dazzle and amaze the crowd with your perfect performance!

name: Arcade Spirits: The New Challengers
summary: Arcade Spirits: The New Challengers is the follow-up to 2019's Arcade Spirits, a visual novel of love and pixels, in which you seek friendship and romance while working in an arcade. Now the tables are turned, as you seek friendship and romance while PLAYING in an arcade!

name: Arcade Paradise
summary: Welcome to Arcade Paradise, the 90’s retro arcade adventure game. With the keys to the family laundromat, Ashley decides to transform the business and give the sleepy town of Grindstone something to get excited about! Stay one step ahead of your father, manage and invest profits, and build your very own Arcade Paradise!

name: Arcade Archives: Cybattler
summary: Cybattler is an action based shooting game released by Jaleco in 1993. Take control of the new prototype Cybattler mech, Blanche, and battle in space against a mysterious military force. Engage the enemy in a variety of ways. Get up close with the Beam sword, or take out multiple targets at once with the Beam launcher, the choice is up to you.

name: Arches
summary: In this visual novel, boyfriends Cameron and Devon investigate the supposedly haunted ghost town of Echo in search of an explanation of its troubled past.

name: Artillery Royale
summary: Turn by turn Artillery game with fun physics and fully destructible map. Control a team of warriors, with specifics capabilities and weapons to defeat your opponent. To win the battle use strategy and plan your next move ahead!

name: Arcaxer
summary:
Arcaxer is a turn based VR RPG with first person action oriented combat, and a 3rd person god-view overworld set in a sci-fi simulation filled with colorful AI characters.

In the overworld you will explore procedural dungeons to find equips and new abilities for your character. You can access the hub world to interact with NPC's and buy new items with the credits that you earn in the dungeon.

name: Arcade Archives: Frisky Tom
summary: Frisky Tom is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1981. Control Tom the plumber, and fix the water pipes broken by mice. The mice not only break the pipes, they also attack and set off bombs! Deal with this pest problem and complete the stages.

name: Ardent Seas
summary: Naval RTS, with a side of land combat, and an extra portion of evil space alien robots.

name: Arcade Archives: Gemini Wing
summary: Gemini Wing is a shooting game released by Tecmo in 1987. On a secret mission, Gemini Wing, your objective is to control a Gunship and reclaim the world from the insects. Complete the stages by using 8 different types of Gunballs to shoot down enemies.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Cross II
summary: Thunder Cross II is a shooting game released by Konami in 1991. Control Blue Thunder 2 and Red Thunder 2 and battle for the survival of the galaxy. Upgrade your shots and increase your options to defeat the bosses. Two player co-op is also available.

name: Argo
summary: Argo is a role-playing game set in a pseudo-3D continuous world. The player explores the environments from a first-person view. It is possible to try to talk to any encountered character, as well as attack anyone. Most battles take place within the exploration area and involve a fairly simple turn-based exchange of attacks. However, occasional fights against larger monsters take place on a separate screen, have an over-the-shoulder third-person perspective, and require the player to move and attack in real time. Experience points and gold are awarded for defeating enemies. It is necessary to feed the protagonist; when his condition is "hungry" food also restores a portion of his hit points.

name: Architect: Episode 1
summary: Become a city planner and build the city of your dreams in Architect: Episode 1! In this exciting Strategy-Sim game it's your job to translate your creative vision into reality and plan different parts of the city wisely to keep its citizens happy both now and long into the future. Decide on locations for important buildings such as schools and cinemas while taking into consideration the impact each placement will have on the entire district. Same goes for shops, restaurants, schools, and even amusement parks - the design of the city is all up to you. Can you build a city that bears your own unique touches? Play Architect: Episode 1 and find out!

name: ArcaPinball: Wacky Worlds
summary: The gameplay of ArcaPinball: Wacky Worlds is similar to Arkanoid with Power-Ups but the playfield it's in 3D.

name: Arcana Heart 3 Lovemax Sixstars!!!!!! Xtend
summary: Arcana Heart 3 Lovemax Sixstars!!!!!! Xtend, the free update for Arcana Heart 3 Lovemax Sixstars!!!!!! It includes 2 new playable characters (as paid DLC), a new Arcana, 2 new stages, and an upgraded 16:9 aspect ratio.

name: Aro & Elmi
summary:
Aro & Elmi is a German arcade action platform game that teaches kids the importance of brushing your teeth. The two main characters, Aro & Elmi, represent two types of toothpaste produced by Wybert, the company that commissioned this promotional game.

The levels are split into "Gum World" and "Tooth World", as the two toothpaste types are specifically intended for intense gum and tooth care, respectively. Each of the characters has two objectives: collect food debris and destroy the harmful bacteria that run around the mouth by hurling droplets of toothpaste at them. This ammo is limited, but you can increase it if you find extra toothpaste tubes of matching colour. Also watch out for secrets and bonus tooth care gel tubes that can be found in levels, often in secret places.

The game is made on a very professional level, with cartoon-like pre-rendered sprites for the characters and the bacteria that look like characters from a kids' TV show. German players call platform games "jump & run", and here you'll be doing a lot of jumping and running to a catchy tune. Aro & Elmi can be recommended to players of all ages, and knowledge of German is not required (there will be quizzes between some levels on how to properly brush your teeth, but these will not let you fail even if you give a wrong answer). The game is allowed to be freely distributed for non-commercial purposes.

name: Artist Idle
summary: In Artist Idle, you can watch colored blocks slowly fill up the screen. At first, the blocks are chunky - showing a vague look at what you are trying to create. Through upgrades and gathering pixels, you are able to create more detailed pictures, eventually making works of art fit for a gallery!

name: Arcade Archives: The Astyanax
summary: The Astyanax is an action game released by Jaleco in 1989. After receiving a divine revelation, a warrior sets out to battle the evil demons and restore peace to the world. Harness the power of the Fire Axe and strike your foes with conviction!

name: Arcade Archives: Earth Defense Force
summary: Earth Defense Force is a shooting game released by Jaleco in 1991. Control your XA-1 space fighter and take part in a worldwide endeavor to stand up against the Agima Empire's plot to take over the Earth! With each power-up the might of your weapons and the types of optional formations increases!

name: ArcaPinball: NeoWorlds
summary: ArcaPinball: NeoWorlds it's a game similar to Arkanoid but with power-ups and blocks in 3D.

name: Arcade Archives: Frogger
summary: Frogger is an action game released by Konami in 1981. Guide a lost frog to the house on the other bank within the time limit. There will be many obstacles to overcome on the way home. Time your way safely across dangerous roads full of cars and rivers where alligators and snakes lie in wait.

name: Armed 7 DX
summary: With ARMED 7 DX, discover 7 stages of pure mecha-shooting action with customisable weapons. Use all laser beams, space rockets and missiles to suit your needs. Gear up and fight !

name: Arcade Archives: Vs. Baseball
summary: Vs. Baseball is a sports game released by Nintendo in 1984. Capturing the very essence of what makes baseball fun, the game has influenced many other baseball games made since. While somewhat simple, the game boasts many features such as pitch selection and base stealing.

name: Arcade Archives: Markham
summary: Markham is a scrolling shooter game released by Sunsoft in 1983. Use a Beam Gun and powerful Missiles to attack and destroy Antarctic Bases. Aiming each attack type takes some getting used to, but once you do, taking out enemies feels great!

name: Arcade Archives: Legend of Makai
summary: Legend of Makai is an action RPG released by Jaleco in 1988. Set out on an adventure to save the princess who was captured by the enemy. Buy weapons and items from the shop, and get hints from the townspeople and shop owners to help solve the mysteries of each stage.

name: Arcade Archives: Zero Team
summary: Zero Team is an action game released by Seibu Kaihatsu in 1993. Four members of the Zero Team take off to save a woman kidnapped by evil ninja. Partake in technical battles with simple controls and, while using the environment from time to time, defeat the enemies attacking from all directions!

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Tennis
summary: VS. Tennis is a sports game released by Nintendo in 1984. This work can be played this game with up to 4 players. You can compete with each other in singles play or play together in doubles play. The key to victory is to use two different types of hitting balls: shots and lobs.

name: Arcade Archives: Vs. Mahjong
summary: Vs. Mahjong is a 2-player Mahjong game released by Nintendo in 1984. Practice against the computer with 1-player mode or play against friends and family with 2-player mode. Think whether to make complex Mahjong hand or reliable Mahjong hand and experience the real pleasure of Mahjong!

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Cross
summary: Thunder Cross is a shooting game released by Konami in 1988. Take control of the Blue Thunder M-45 and fight against the Mechanikon hordes. Multiple versions of the game are included, such as the old Japanese Version and the new Japanese Version, which have different difficulty levels, as well as the European Version, and the rearranged North American Version.

name: Arcade Archives: The Tin Star
summary: The Tin Star is a shooting game released by Taito in 1983. Control the sheriff and take out the gang of thugs. Skillfully utilize features in the main stages, such as surprising the enemy or getting double points. Duel on horseback in the bonus stage! Take out the passing enemy in a single shot!

name: Arcade Archives: The Fairyland Story
summary: The Fairyland Story is an action game released by Taito in 1985. Take control of a young witch and battle against monsters deep within the castle. Master various magics and techniques to overcome your enemies.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Dragon
summary: Thunder Dragon is a shooting game released by NMK in 1991. You must pilot a manned combat helicopter Thunder Dragon in order to stop a group of mad scientists that have taken over an automated weapon of destruction. Utilize 4 different types of shots, each with their own unique characteristics, as well as powerful bombs to save humanity from imminent destruction.

name: Arcade Archives: Formation Z
summary:
Now calling on our greatest warriors, get in formation for your most thrilling battle yet!!

"FORMATION Z" is a shooting game released by JALECO in 1984.
Pilot the transforming battle robot "IXPEL" to defeat the mobile enemy base Gezerium.
Switch between aerial and terrain formations and use the pulse laser to take down regular enemies, reserving your big bang attacks for striking down weapons of mass destruction.

name: Arcade Archives: Crime Fighters
summary: Crime Fighters is an action game released by Konami in 1989. Infiltrate the base of a dark crime gang, with the goal of rescuing a group of beautiful women who have been kidnapped. Take down baddie after baddie with various fighting moves and weapons.

name: Arcade Archives: Koutetsu Yousai Strahl
summary: Koutetsu Yousai Strahl is a shooting game released by UPL in 1992. Bent on world domination, mad scientist Gegeben Funkerun has formed the secret society, Aizerun Geist. Select from four types of main weapons, sub weapons, and bombs, and use them to destroy the steel fortress Koutetsu Yousai Strahl!

name: Arcade Archives: Kangaroo
summary: Kangaroo is an action game released by Sunsoft in 1982. A mama kangaroo must pummel her way through enemy monkeys to save her baby kangaroo. Jump and use ladders to make your way up. Punch enemy monkeys to defeat them, and avoid their attacks to reach the baby kangaroo waiting for you.

name: Arcade Archives: Guerrilla War
summary: Guerrilla War is a survival shooting game released by SNK in 1987. Take control of a rebel leader and fight to take back your country from dictatorship. Use powerful weapons such as hand grenades and tanks to defeat the enemy and reclaim your country.

name: Arcade Archives: Gradius III
summary: Gradius III is a scrolling shooter game released by Konami in 1989. The story of Planet Gradius has transformed from legend to myth. Take on the Bacterion Empire in epic space battles. An edit mode has been added to the game, allowing players to customize their equipment. Enjoy playing the best game in the series!

name: Arcade Archives: Halley's Comet
summary: Halley's Comet is a shooting game released by Taito in 1986. Take control of your ship to defeat the enemies from Halley's Comet, and save the planets of the Solar System. Destroy space rocks to collect parts to power up your ship. Skillfully navigate the stage to become stronger while stopping the enemy.

name: Arcade Archives: Lightning Fighters
summary: Lightning Fighters is a shooting game released by Konami in 1990. Super Fighters mounted with plasma wave weapons and Trigon, an unmanned auxiliary combat pod, are sent out into battle as mankind's final trump card to repel the invasion of an alien civilization. This Konami masterpiece makes a return specially for the scrolling shooter gamer in you.

name: Arcade Archives: Naughty Boy
summary:
I won't lose to any monsters!
Burn the castle down!

Naughty Boy is an action game released by Jaleco in 1982. Travel across forests, through barbed wire fences, and over rivers to purge the castle of monsters with fire! The stone-throwing action takes some getting used it, but once you experience the satisfaction of striking an enemy, you'll be hooked on it.

name: Arcade Archives: Ninja Kazan
summary: Ninja Kazan is an action game released by Jaleco in 1988. Take control of Ninja Kazan, and set out on a journey across the world, reclaiming 5 lost secrets to recover the Scroll of the Five. Become a master of the ninja arts and take on enemy after enemy!

name: Arcade Archives: Pettan Pyuu
summary: Pettan Pyuu is an action game released by Sunsoft in 1984. Take control of the character, Pettan and make use of the plates to wipe out bugs and solve the interdimensional maze. You will need to master 4 different types of plates, all with their own characteristics.

name: Arcade Archives: Swimmer
summary: Swimmer is an action game released by Tehkan (Koei Tecmo Games) in 1982. Take control of the swimmer and see if you can make it to the treasure island. Use Power Pills and dive underwater to skillfully avoid obstacles and enemy monsters.

name: Arcade Archives: Tecmo Bowl
summary: Tecmo Bowl is an American football game released by Tecmo in 1987. Experience matches as a player of either the Wildcats or Bulldogs. Predict your opponent’s moves and steal the ball! Use passes and runs to cut through their line and score an amazing touchdown!

name: Arcade Archives: Super Punch-Out!!
summary: Super Punch-Out!! is a sports-action game released by Nintendo in 1984. The main character participates in heated 3-minute matches against world-class fighters. With the same dual-screen punching action from prequel, and the new "Ducking" defense move, you could feel that you are actually on the boxing ring even more.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Cobra
summary: Super Cobra is a shooting game released by Konami in 1981. The player's goal is to fly their helicopter all the way to the enemy base that appears at the end and claim the spoils of war. Be careful not just of enemies as you progress through the game, but also of your fuel level, or you might crash and burn.

name: Arcade Archives: Saboten Bombers
summary: Saboten Bombers is an action game. Take control of a good little cactus that lives in your house. While you are out, he will protect your house. Throw bombs to drive out the bad cactuses and insects.

name: Arcanoid Breakout
summary: Breakout come back in this modernized top-of-the-art version. Enjoy hours of pure fun with this classic break the bricks game. Enjoy the enhanced version with today device capabilities and revive the gameplay simple yet addictive of first generation video-games. Collectable power-ups; multi-balls, fireballs make this version like no others. Show off your skills and complete the increasingly challenging levels. It's time for you to break a few walls!

name: Arrow Sudoku
summary: In Arrow Sudoku, every puzzle contains a handful of "arrows" laid out in unique patterns. The numbers found along the shaft of the arrow must sum up to the number at the base. This simple rule leads to endless variety in the puzzles you will conquer.

name: Arcade Fuzz
summary: TTV3 is fast-paced maze wanderer minigame with procedural maps and audio, with original gameplay and aesthetics. Arcade Fuzz is a physics-based drifting minigame. Moving tentacles, limited time, procedural levels and the inability to break are elements of the challenge. Put your reflexes to the test with these games of the Brazilian underground indie game development scene.

name: Arcade Archives: Plus Alpha
summary:
Get items to transform your fighter ship into different 3 types of ship!!

Plus Alpha is a shooting game released by Jaleco in 1989. To rescue the 7 kingdoms from tyranny, the warrior girls Selia and Rumy set out in their fighter ships. Each of the 3 types of fighter ships has their own unique attacks, so you can switch between them as you battle in style!

name: Arcade Archives: Rush'n Attack
summary: Rush'n Attack is an action game released by Konami in 1985. Infiltrate an enemy base and get past four obstacles to rescue your comrades! Take out foes with a knife, or with weapons dropped from enemies. Jump and duck to avoid attacks and make it to the goal. The honor of the Green Berets depends on you!

name: Arcade Archives: Soccer
summary: Soccer is a sports game released by Nintendo in 1985. Play matches against the CPU in single player mode or another player in 2-player mode. Try polishing your skills in single player, then take on friends and family! Enjoy simple, but exciting gameplay in the father of all soccer games!

name: Arcade Archives: Radical Radial
summary: Radical Radial is an action shooting game released by Nichibutsu in 1983. Control a tire-shaped vehicle and head for the goal. Speed through dangerous courses filled with aliens and enemy vehicles, accelerating, decelerating, shooting, and jumping to get through.

name: Arcaea
summary: Touch, hold, slide—and, for the first time ever, use the Joy-Con controllers to glide through the world of Arcaea. Feel the rhythm in a vast collection of songs now fully available on Nintendo Switch, and follow the fateful story of the girls lost in its world. Each awakens without any memories in a barren, pale world of ruined buildings and dry oceans. Only the drifting, glass shard-like memories offer any sense of life in this world... but where will the memories lead them?

name: Arcade Archives: Guzzler
summary: Guzzler is an action game released by Tehkan (Koei Tecmo Games) in 1983. Control Guzzler the merry firefighter and put out raging fires. Since the fires constantly spawn enemies, quick decisions and action are the key to victory!

name: ArmaCulture
summary: ArmaCulture is an indie factory-builder RPG set in the midst of a bitter, industrialized war between two nations in a fictional world similar to our own. The game combines illustrated character art with stylized pixel art to create a unique and dark historic atmosphere.

name: Arcade Archives: Task Force Harrier
summary: Task Force Harrier is a shooting game released by UPL in 1989. The player pilots Harrier V, a fully customized advanced fighter aircraft based on Harrier 2, and deploys to save the world from a coup led by the old faction. Collect items to upgrade your weapons and gain the upper hand in battle.

name: Artists of Fortune: Distant Worlds - Lacerta Planet
summary: Welcome to the world of wind and sands! Paint by numbers and uncover the secrets of the lizards civilization!

name: Artists of Fortune: Distant Worlds - Fulgur Planet
summary: The future is here... Welcome to the world of cyberpunk! Paint by numbers and uncover the secrets of a futuristic society!

name: Artists of Fortune: Distant Worlds - Crystallus Planet
summary: It turns out the Yeti has its own planet! Paint by numbers and uncover secrets of their civilization!

name: Artists of Fortune: Distant Worlds - Ferrum Planet
summary: Metal formation in the space... Paint by numbers to find out its secrets!

name: Armed With Wings
summary: Travel through the lands, in a quest to bring justice to the one who destroyed the rebellion army. Armed with an eagle, solve puzzles and beat down bad guys in this action packed plaformer.

name: Ark of Artemis
summary: Half a year passed since the world was destroyed by the angels —— Claudia decided to set off for the Demon Continent, but she was attacked by angels on her way. After gaining the power of the divine weapon, she was able to repel the angles.

name: Art of Space
summary: Art of Space is a fast-paced space combat shooter with some unique mechanics and customisation options. Includes a story/campaign mode.

name: Arcadeon VR
summary: SWAP MATCH DODGE DESTROY.... Arcadeon brings the best of old school arcade tile matching into an ultimate action packed futuristic VR experience

name: Archeologist Simulator
summary: Like a true explorer, look for all the bones hidden underground to build the dinosaur skeleton.

name: Arcanion: Tale of Magi
summary: Arcanion: Tale of Magi is a retro-style platformer that tells the story of a fledgling warrior Magi, and she and her allies must recover a book from a thief who seeks to use its powers to carry out his revenge.

name: Archangel: Nemesis
summary: Follow the story of 13 year old Twigs as she prepares to go to Boarding School!

name: Art Syndicate
summary: Put your management skills to the test as an art gallery owner, exhibit the most brilliant paintings, create your own, and if you've already broken your moral compass try to snatch some precious artworks from your competition - "Exitus acta probat"!

name: Arcano
summary: Arcano is an over the top action adventure in VR. Playing as a secret agent, you'll make the impossible possible. Slow-motion shootouts and crazy stunts at a variety of exciting locations — all with online co-op.

name: Armored Xpress
summary: Armored Xpress is a new unique story-driven Match 3 game built with rich RPG elements and an ATB battle system.

name: Arc Wizards 2
summary: The war of the wizards begins! This is a shooting action game!

name: Arcade Archives: Time Pilot '84
summary: Time Pilot ’84 is a shooting game released by Konami in 1984. Pilot your aircraft in 8 different directions and defeat enemies with your Vulcan cannon and homing missiles. Defeat the giant ship at the end of each stage to continue to the next.

name: Arsène Lupin: Gentleman Bomber
summary:
Back in 1905 one of the most prolific, daring and dazzling thief was starting his career. He is none other than Arsène Lupin, the gentleman thief.
This is his untold story, a story of bold action, disguise and thievery.
Embody 8 of the most iconic characters of the series, and if you're lucky, you'll discover some hidden gems. Take your character through 6 different maps representing both defining moments of Arsène's story and cultural French beacons. Each level has its own
strong audio theme. Choose among 5 different game modes, each with their own set of objectives and gimmicks representing Arsène's different skills and sides, from gentleman to thief.
In any case, be sure to bomb your opponents before they bomb you!

name: Archon-9: Alien Defense
summary: An exciting sci-fi real-time strategy game. You are the leader of a band of elite Marines on a rescue mission; it is your job to secure the outpost and rescue lost miners. Aliens are running amok; it won't be easy...

name: Arcane Arts Academy
summary: Welcome to the Arcane Arts Academy, home to a magical menagerie of wonders! Join Erika as she adjusts to her new life and takes on the unique struggles and challenges of everyday life as a magical college student. She’ll make new friends, and maybe even find love… but she may also find unexpected foes! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, seeking to control Erika’s magical abilities. Perhaps not all is as it seems after all!

name: A Random Maze
summary: 一个忘记自己姓名与过去的人，在突然出现的神秘人物的帮助下，从一个空无一人的医院开始探索自己的过去。只有取回真实，才能从这里离开，即使……真相不像你所期待的那样，他也依然盼望着他的未来。

name: Arabian Treasures: Midnight Match
summary: This is the rags to riches story told in a match 3 puzzle adventure within an Arabian themed game!

name: Artemishea
summary: Step into a unforgiving world of danger and try to survive as you compete among other players to stay alive, Play as a animal and take down large prey as you progress along in your life. Hunt, Survive and Thrive in this land.

name: Archer Master
summary: A Tower Defense-Storytelling game about fighting against evil orc!

name: Arcus
summary: Arcus is a fantasy action game where failure is just the next step in the story. Use a bow to aim and fire arrows at invading enemies. Swing your sword at any angle to get past enemy defenses. Spend resources between missions to buy special arrow types and increase your chances of success while you solve the mystery behind the new undead skeleton faction in a land where magic has been made taboo.

name: Arosia
summary: Arosia is the Tile Map game based on Strategy and Luck. Use your strategy skills with best of luck to occupy World! Don't stop untill the World is yours.

name: Arcade Archives: Hacha Mecha Fighter
summary: Hacha Mecha Fighter is a shooting game released by NMK in 1991. Control Kawauso and Tsuchibuta as they fly forward on airplanes and defeat enemies along the way. It's a great, easy game to get into, even for players who don't often play shooting games, but still poses enough of a challenge to keep fans of the genre interested!

name: A Robot's Journey
summary: Embark on A Robot's Journey to becoming a parent and reflecting on childhood memories. Traverse and explore lush landscapes while collecting energy, gathering fragments, overcoming obstacles, and solving puzzles in this 3rd person, exploration, puzzle adventure.

name: Armored
summary: It's time for you to prove yourself in the management of armored vehicles. You have to perform many operations from liberating the territory to escorting VIP and battling against enemy armored vehicles.

name: Army of Numbers
summary: A arithmetic game, let you play at the same time exercise arithmetic reaction ability.

name: Arctic Anxiety
summary: Survival simulator in extreme conditions. The game takes place in the Arctic ocean. The pilot of a cargo plane makes a hard landing on the water. To survive, the player will have to search for a cargo washed up on the shore.

name: Artifacting
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of excavations, artifacts and relics in a cozy and dark match 3 game - Artifacting!

name: Arbeit Man in another world
summary: Limited time maze adventure game

name: Arrow Battle Online
summary:
Ten players shoot arrows at the same time in an online battle!
Can you survive to the end as the arrows rain down on you?

Take advantage of your opponents' gaps and attack while avoiding the large number of arrows pouring down on you!
It's simple to use, but you can enjoy deep battles by timing your attacks, managing your stamina, and shooting arrows to drive your opponent back to the wall!
In addition to archers, there are other types of soldiers such as shield soldiers, and the key to victory is to cooperate with each other "loosely".

The key to victory is to cooperate with each other "loosely". In online battles, rates are added according to your contribution to victory.
Let's aim for the highest title [S] class, and even higher!

There are also hundreds of avatars to change your appearance.
There are hundreds of avatars to choose from, and you can combine them to create your own original character!

name: Artery Gear: Fusion
summary: A Chinese turn-based mobile RPG game where you collect and improve units known as Artery Gears to fight a threat known as the Automatos.

name: Archvale
summary: Take up your weapon in this RPG bullet-hell world and embark on a journey to right wrongs from long ago. Only you can defeat the evil forces of the Undying guardians and reunite the world with the fabled Archvale.

name: Arrival of Beasts
summary: Discover one of the hardest tower defense games with strategic elements, individual gameplay and challenging mechanics. Play together with your friends in co-op mode, create a team and compete with other players in the online ranking.

name: Arcade Archives: Pirate Pete
summary: Pirate Pete is an action game released by Taito in 1982. Overcome a number of difficult obstacles to save the captured damsel in distress! It's a great, easy game to get into, even for players who don't often play shooting Fight on deck, in the ocean blue, and through caves to face off with pirates at the end of your journey. A thrilling, white knuckle adventure awaits.

name: Ark: Ultimate Survivor Edition
summary:
ARK: Ultimate Survivor Edition includes base game ARK: Survival Evolved and the following Expansion Packs:
- Scorched Earth
- Aberration
- Extinction
- Genesis Parts 1 & 2.

As an additional bonus, this compilation also includes original soundtracks containing the music of ARK as composed by Gareth Coker.

name: Arena Tactics
summary: Enter the Arena with your myths for turn-based fast-paced tactical PVP Fights!

name: Arausio
summary: Explore the ancient theatre of Arausio and discover Roman antiquity in this narrative exploration game!

name: Arcade Space Shooter 2 in 1
summary: In Space War Infinity, evolve your ship as you advance and level up in the game. Unlock more than 20 different upgrades and weapons during the game. Defeat 5 bosses ready to spray you. Endless game! After completing all the missions, try to move up in rank by facing waves of enemies created in real time. In Space Smash, avoid being crushed by the space storm by collecting Orbs of blue energy to save more time and space, watch out for the red Orbs. Get the highest score possible! Get to the podium on the scoreboard and try to stay there as long as possible. Unlock ships with unique characteristics by collecting coins that appear in the arena.

name: Arcade Archives: Seicross
summary: Seicross is a shooting game released by Nichibutsu in 1984. Taking place in an interstellar city, drive your bike, Gilgit, and rescue Petrimen while avoiding attacks. Enemy bikes can be defeated by bodily hitting them to knock them over or into walls and other objects on the terrain. Use these tactics in combination with beams to fight.

name: Arcane Waters
summary: From swashbuckling on the high seas to idyllic days on your peaceful farm, from remote trading towns to monster-filled lands, it’s time to gather some friends and go on an adventure! Whether you’re a pirate, trader, crafter or farmer, choose your ship and explore a vast new world.

name: Art of Destruction
summary: A physics sandbox simulation game about constructing and demolishing structures. If you like destroying stuff or just mess around, then this game is for you!

name: Arcade Boy
summary: The story of a boy stuck in an arcade...

name: Art of the Rail
summary: Spiritual remake of the classic transport tycoon games. Build a profitable transport network and grow your worlds economy, either on your own in singleplayer or in multiplayer whether cooperatively or competitively.

name: Armed Emeth
summary: Valess, a boy earning petty cash in a commune of drifters is suddenly met by Lock, a stand-alone golem. Valess' mother was kidnapped by a terrorist organization, and upon discovering that the leader of that organization has an enormous bounty on his head, Valess receives a golem of his own from Lock and decides to join him on an adventure into the unknown where numerous bounties await. Thus begins their journey of grit and oil across several continents!

name: Arachnowopunk
summary: A Single button infinite runner metriodvania about a friendly spider!

name: Arcade Archives: Shingen Samurai-Fighter
summary: Shingen Samurai-Fighter is an action game released by Jaleco in 1988. The player controls Takeda Shingen, embarking on a grand journey to defeat Uesugi Kenshin. Pick up the 風(Fu), 林(Rin), 火(Ka), 山(Zan), and other items that power you up as you defeat enemy warlords.

name: Archquest
summary: Archquest is a classic CRPG that mixes a retro aesthetic, immersive first-person exploration, and tactical turn-based third-person combat based on tabletop RPG rules. Inspired by AD&D Gold Box games such as Pool of Radiance.

name: Artist Life Simulator
summary:
Live the life of (a starving) artist in 19th century alternative history.
Collect and combine feelings, memories, ideas and inspirations, fight with depression, addiction or madness and other mental phenomenon.
Paint masterpieces, sell them for riches (or scraps) and explore the city of Nova Oportunia. A unique card-based roguelite with 18 alternative endings.

name: Arcade Archives: Raiden
summary: Raiden is a shooting game released by Seibu Kaihatsu in 1990. Get aboard the ultra high-altitude fighter-bomber Raiden and protect the Earth from a sudden alien invasion. A variety of stages and power-up items provide lots of excitement for you to enjoy.

name: Aran's Bike Trip
summary: Go on a 2 day ride in the Netherlands and explore the Dutch countryside, woods and heathlands through a whole bunch of 360º photos. Will Aran live to tell the tale?? (spoiler: he does)

name: Arcadegeddon
summary: Rise up and play with up to three friends in this ever-evolving cooperative multiplayer, roguelite shooter. Explore multiple biomes, mini games, find hidden chests, and defeat numerous enemies and bosses.

name: Arcade Redemption
summary: Be prepared to put your skills and reflexes to the test in the ultimate rock and roll arcade experience!

name: Arcade Archives: Sea Fighter Poseidon
summary: Sea Fighter Poseidon is an action shooting game released by TAITO in 1984. The player fights against enemy divers and enemy’s battleships to save his captured friends. If the player's water scooter runs out of fuel, it will explode, so be sure to defeat enemy divers with torpedoes and steal it from them.

name: Arcane Walker
summary: Players play an arcane mage in the game. At the beginning of each game, players need to master more than 50 kinds of arcane magic to attack all kinds of enemies. The collision of roguelike's playing method and magic greatly increases the players' love for the game.

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: Italy - Yugoslavia
summary: A nation pack with two new factions: Italy and Yugoslavia. Over 250 new units and aircraft from the 1965-1991 era. Iconic modern equipment like the VCC-1 and SIDAM, or Praga SPAAG and M-84 MBT, but also plenty of venerable veterans like M4A3 Sherman, M36 Jackson or SU-100.

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: France - Belgium
summary: France and Belgium enter the arena of Armored Brigade. This expansion of this real-time tactical wargame adds two factions and a new map. The playable Nations have different army compositions and organizational structures, giving more complexity to the game.

name: Art of Rally: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The art of rally deluxe edition includes:
- The base Art of Rally game
- 50+ track OST by Tatreal, with both MP3 and high-quality FLAC versions

This is the perfect accompaniment for your next road trip, or errand to the grocery store. Who are we to judge?

name: Archetype Arcadia
summary:
The world has fallen to Peccato Mania (original sin), which causes self-harm and other problems.

To save his younger sister Christine, who has been stricken by the disease, Rust full-dive into the online game "Archetype Arcadia", which is the only way to stop the progress of the symptom.

Hope, pain, joy, betrayal, and inevitable "death" are found in this game, where the memories of the players turn into avatars and fight.

A fully-voiced text novel adventure game that tells a terrifying story of the overwhelming volume, led by memories that should have been lost.

name: Armored Brigade Nation Pack: Czechoslovakia - Netherlands
summary: Czechoslovakia and Netherlands enter the arena of Armored Brigade. This expansion of this real-time tactical wargame adds two factions and a new map. The playable Nations have different army compositions and organizational structures, giving more complexity to the game.

name: Armageddon Onslaught
summary: In 2060 the end of the world has come, and humanity is on the edge of extinction. Against the army of Hell, four formidable warriors, known as the Demi-Angels, arise. They will have to face horrors of all kinds and fulfill the darkest of the prophecies.

name: Artha
summary: Take the Control of your mysterious cards in the online PVP epic card battle!

name: Arc Defence
summary: Arc defence is a game in genre classic top down 2d tower defense, But in difference of classic TD, enemies can fight back. Use towers upgrades and special abilities to stop waves. Be ready for epic battle and try to protect our lands!

name: Archons of Doom
summary: Play as an Archon of Doom to conquer the entire universe in this fantasy horror strategy game.

name: Artifact Hunter
summary: Challenging adventurous match-3 game! Help Jason find valuable artifacts and save his father!

name: Arcadius
summary: Arcadius is a multiplayer social resource gathering simulator. Venture around islands with friends collect, mine & sell everything you come across

name: Arelite Core: Horse Armor
summary: Horse Armor DLC brings new found security to the heroes of Arelite Core, by providing exactly what it promises: horse armor. Become more than a man (or a woman, or a madox, or a holarii), become a half-horse hero as you don the legendary garment.

name: Arclands
summary: Create a buzzing village and become a powerful enough wizard to defend it in this RPG inspired city builder!

name: Arcana Sands of Destiny
summary: Classic adventure game with hidden object elements. No "Screwdriver hidden in a steel safe" nonsense! This game will take you on a journey of unlocking mysteries, discovering artifacts, solving puzzles and quests, all in a beautifully created Egyptian world at the beginning of the 20th century !

name: Arcane Eyes
summary: Arcane Eyes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Ark and Ade
summary: Have you ever dreamt about being inside an old arcade machine? Ark and Ade is a fast-paced VR First Person Shooter. Plunge into the retro vibes and shoot your way out through an evocative low-poly 80’s Sci-Fi setting to protect Ark and defeat Ade.

name: Around the Fire
summary: Revisit human history in the form of a story. With simple graphics representing the art style from whence it came. Emerge yourself into the world of cavemen, and evolve your knowledge as you slowly understand how the world works.

name: Arenix
summary: Arenix is a brutal endless top-down shooter with thousands of monsters and even more bullets. Death is inevitable, but how long can you survive?

name: A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog
summary: A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog is a virtual reality adventure in which you go on a search for the inhabitants of the valley, who have disappeared since a mysterious fog appeared in their homeland. Help the little rabbit by completing the story around the charismatic characters of the valley.

name: Arc Wizards 3
summary: The war of the wizards begins! This is an exciting action game with a 16-bit taste!

name: ArcticBoy: The Interactive Story
summary: A touching story of a young programmer Alexey. One day he meets a girl through a joke site, but who would have thought that Alexei would not be laughing at all. Take a pack of sushi rolls, saddle a snowmobile and go on a long journey to your princess.

name: Archer boy
summary: Archer boy is a game in which you need to defend a castle. Get coins for destroying opponents. Buy upgrades for coins. Beat your previous record.

name: Aripi
summary: "Aripi" is an exciting adventure about an astronaut forgotten in orbit and his dream that unexpectedly came true.

name: Arc Wizards
summary: The war of the wizards begins! This is a shooting action game!

name: Arena Experiment
summary: Arena Experiment puts you in the role of a participant in a reality show, where your only task is to survive in a closed zones called Arenas for as long as you can.

name: Arc Apellago
summary: Traverse the sky in this open-air platformer featuring elegant, fluid movement and swift combat. Play as a mysterious assassin-like wielder of spirit energy to strike down enemies, restore the great guardian statue and return the land to the earth

name: Arden's Wake
summary: The sea levels have risen, and a young woman and her father live in a lighthouse perched atop the ocean’s surface. When he goes missing, she must descend deep into the post-apocalyptic waters previously forbidden to her, embarking on a thrilling journey of family history and self-discovery.

name: Arcade Archives: Darwin 4078
summary: Darwin 4078 is a shooting game released by Data East in 1986. Your ship evolves by absorbing life forms that it converts into energy, and changes shape as well as evolving new attacks and characteristics. There are also mutations that do not follow the evolutionary path, and you can end up with unique ships you never would have imagined!

name: Arcade Legend
summary: Arcade Legend is an arcade simulator and management RPG. Clean up your run-down venue, add new games and customize the layout and look. Build your reputation to continue unlocking content and play officially licensed, modern arcade titles as you unravel the secrets the venue holds.

name: Arbor
summary: Arbor is a Roguelike game made to be very challenging and with a high score system similar to those old-school arcade games, find out how you stack up against other players!

name: Arashi: Castles of Sin
summary: Become one with the shadows and embark on quest for justice as Kenshiro, a shinobi and the last surviving son of the noble House Arashi.

name: Arcade Archives: Vendetta
summary: Vendetta is a beat-em-up released by Konami in 1991. Players fight to save a friend's younger sister, who was kidnapped by the Dead End Gang. Select one of four colorful characters to play. This title also supports simultaneous play with up to four players.

name: Artifact Foundry
summary: Artifact Foundry, a special edition of Artifact, the DOTA2 card game, with streamlined gameplay, new cards, new single-player content, and an improved new player experience.

name: Arcano: The Trickery
summary: Develop your strategy and create your own deck in "Arcano: The Trickery", a fresh new take on the old formula for "trading card games". Master the power of the elements of alchemy and magic to defeat your opponents in online pvp battles and gain new cards to complete the collection!

name: Arena of Ruins
summary: It consists of Lan mode multiplaying and several simple acts of single mode.

name: Archery Arena
summary: Archery Arena is a third person arcade based shooter with RPG leveling system. Stomp, roll, shoot and slash your way through a horde of enemies and bosses as your work to the final arena and compete for the highscore.

name: Architectus
summary: ARCHiTECTUS is a sandbox game about planning, building, furnishing and exploring of constructions.

name: Arcuz
summary: Arcuz is an Action Role Play Game full of action with 18 different maps and 25 quests. Fight with the monsters, train your hero, search better weapons, compose new items and learn new skills.

name: Arcuz II: Dungeons
summary: The little hero is back! This time he is going to explore the dungeon in the village Arcuz and save the world!

name: Arcadian Rift
summary: Fight as a space pirate in this sci-fi FPS adventure where you raid ships and gather an arsenal of weapons, gadgets, and upgrades to build your character. Use your gear to hunt down and destroy the four rogue AI who have conquered and occupy this lawless star system.

name: Arcade Archives: Bio-Ship Paladin
summary: Bio-Ship Paladin is a shooting game released by UPL in 1990. Players use a variety of weapons to defeat bosses, including a main weapon with charge and chain shots, beams that fire toward a crosshairs, and power-ups that enlarge your ship.

name: Armada
summary: Simplistic naval warfare game with PvP combat.

name: Arena 54: Visual Novel Action Adventure
summary: Arena 54 - Visual Novel Action Adventure is a story-driven RPG that brings the universe together in an epic war for the Crystal. Save the planet Earth simply by making the right choices. Choose wisely, or the Crystal will be lost in Doom Hammer’s hands.

name: Armello: The Dragon Clan
summary: Join the insidious band of scaled heroes in their journey to reclaim their birthright, Armello's throne. The Dragon Clan, Armello's second Clan DLC, features four new playable Heroes, a brand new Dragon-exclusive Quest system, a complete Dragon Clan Novella, Dragon Dice, six new Signets, and a new Amulet!

name: Armello: Usurpers Hero Pack
summary: Join the fray for Armello's throne with four new playable Heroes and four new Rings - one for each Clan!

name: Armello: The Bandit Clan
summary: Fight for glory as the infamous Bandit Clan in Armello's first Clan DLC! The Bandit Clan DLC features four new playable Heroes, over 50 unique Bandit quests, Bandit Dice, a new Bandit Clan Ring, and a bunch more goodies!

name: Armello: Rivals Hero Pack
summary: Rival Armello's original Heroes in their quest for the throne by taking charge of the Great Clans' misfits with this Hero pack! Includes four new playable Heroes, one new Amulet, and four new Rings!

name: Arnold Bounty Hunter
summary: It is a fantastic adventure according to genres like Beat 'em up / Shoot' em up / Platformer, which was created as the spiritual heir of the iconic classic games of the era of the NES. The heart of the project is diversity and complexity. Each level contains unique mechanics.

name: Arkan Tower
summary: "Arkan Tower" is a casual tower defense game with many different enemies and different types of upgradable towers. Show your courage and cunning in defense!

name: Armored Cavalry: Metalline
summary: ARMORED CAVALRY:METALLINE Is a multiplayer action shooting arena game.With Top-down view,and double joystick. Control of dozens of tons of heavy mech. Use weapons and tactics, cooperate with your teammates,and defeat the enemy.

name: Arrival: Zero Earth
summary: Put on your Gore-Tex jacket, because it's winter in Finland. The year is 1995 and the aliens have invaded the earth! Roguelike action game with short, roughly 20 minute runs. Make the numbers go up by collecting items and by recruiting dozens of local townspeople to blast the enemy. Wishlist now!

name: Arcade Archives: Kuri Kinton
summary: Kuri Kinton is an action game released by Taito in 1988. The game follows the martial artists of Kuri Kinton in their brutal battles with evil fighters, set amid chaos and violence at the end of the millennium. Use special breathing techniques to power up and unleash amazing energy blasts to come out on top!

name: Arker: The Legend of Ohm
summary: Explore the land of Ohm, recruit your hero and battle in exciting strategic online battles against other players.

name: Arcaduis
summary: Arcaduis is an Atari 2600 Retro games simulation game in a retro cartoon atmosphere.

name: Ardennes Offensive
summary: Ardennes Offensive is a 2004 first-person shooter game released for Microsoft Windows. Developed and published by Asylum Games in Germany, and IncaGold in Europe.

name: A Room Without You In It
summary: A first-person, sort-of-escape-the-room, point-and-click adventure dealing with grief, trauma and depression, and how they can take us to a place that's very hard to come back from.

name: Arcade Archives: Vandyke
summary: Vandyke is an action game released by UPL in 1990. Players use weapons including swords, boomerangs, bombs, and flails to defeat enemies and bosses as they progress. Your character will also gain attack power and strike a heroic pose when you pick up meat items, so be sure to use these to your advantage!

name: Arcade Archives: Space Cruiser
summary: Space Cruiser is a shooter released by Taito in 1981. Players take on the role of a Space Cruiser captain in 2100 AD, patrolling space to ensure peace on Earth. Intercept enemies, go beyond the asteroid belt, and power up your ship at space stations!

name: Archer's Adventure
summary: 2D cartoon style shooting game

name: A.R.C: Alien raid combat
summary: A game based on the classic Tower Defense style, assemble your best combination to overcome obstacles, can you do it?

name: Arkana Senki Ludo
summary: Arkana Senki Ludo is a 2d board game with rpg elements in which the player compete againts another human player (up to 4 players at the same time) or a computer opponent to reach the goal of each level first. They can use cards to advance or fight against the opponents.

name: Armello: Special Edition
summary: Armello is a grim fairy-tale board game come to life. Full of swashbuckling adventure combining deep, tactical card play, rich tabletop strategy and RPG elements. Wage epic single and multiplayer battles, cast spells, hire agents, and prepare poisons and ruses on your quest for the throne!

name: Arctictopia
summary: Arctictopia is a puzzle-solving game in the Arctic Ocean. Figure out routes and plan your moves to help mama polar bear find her cub on the melting ice.

name: Arnold
summary: Control a spaceship and fight against treacherous aliens.

name: Arc of Alchemist: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Arc of Alchemist
- Special Box
- Art Book (44-page)
- Soundtrack CD
- Special Jacket

name: Ark of Loif
summary: Ark of Loif, Hardcore Action Shooter – RPG.

name: ArcheAge: Unchained - Garden of the Gods
summary: Follow in the footsteps of the legendary Library Expedition to explore the origin of Gods.

name: Arcade Drift
summary: Feel the taste of arcade drift. Be the first on the leaderboard!

name: Arkos
summary: Arkos is a first-person fantasy shooter with unique voxel render. You play as the white wizard Arkos, who went in search of a powerful weapon of his teacher elf Corvus, who disappeared without a trace many years ago in the dungeons of an ancient castle.

name: Argy Bargy Legends
summary: A collectible card game about a confrontation between three factions: acorns, floats and candles. Build a unique, powerful deck and write yourself in the story of Argy Bargy crushing everyone and everything in your path.

name: Ari's Journey
summary: A retro precision platformer in a top-down action packed story. Navigate tight corridors and fly at high speeds using precise timing. A precision platformer without any platforms.

name: Architects of Shangri-La
summary: Visit the mythical land of Shangri-La! Govern the legendary state, build cities, take care of its citizens, protect them, provide with spiritual and political guidance. Let yourself be amazed by its mountain beauty. Help Shangri-La defend against enemies who do not share its peaceful vision.

name: Aruna
summary: Aruna is a beautiful and intense 3rd-person adventure game. Dive deep with your soul inside a mystical environment and bring back the light to your corrupted world, heading towards a mysterious place hidden in the mountains.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Scenario Set 3
summary: 9 Free Mode scenarios will be added under DLC 1 or DLC2.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Skill Card Set 1
summary: Adds 15 set of Limited Skill Cards. A set contains 3 cards. The Skill Cards can be acquired in Free Mode by selecting "Add" under "Skill Cards".

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Scenario Set 1
summary: "Conflict at Gujarat Fortress" will be added as a Free Mode scenario under DLC 1. Also, the Limited Skill Card, A Knowing Smile, can be acquired during this battle if specific conditions are met.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Scenario Set 5
summary: 10 Free Mode scenarios will be added under DLC1 or DLC2.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Scenario Set 4
summary: 9 Free Mode scenarios will be added under DLC2.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Scenario Set 2
summary: "Battle for the Title" will be added as a Free Mode scenario under DLC 1. Also, the Limited Skill Card, Roar of the Sher Senani, can be acquired during this battle if specific conditions are met.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Skill Card Set 3
summary: Adds 15 set of Limited Skill Cards. A set contains 3 cards. The Skill Cards can be acquired in Free Mode by selecting "Add" under "Skill Cards".

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Skill Card Set 2
summary: Adds 15 set of Limited Skill Cards. A set contains 3 cards. The Skill Cards can be acquired in Free Mode by selecting "Add" under "Skill Cards".

name: Ardarium
summary: Watch nations grow and forests spread in this casual sandbox game where everything is automatic and gameplay is optional. It's like a screensaver that you can play. Make explosions that deform the ground, start forest fires, trigger earthquakes that wipe out civilizations, or just watch the sunrise.

name: Arma 3: Tac-Ops
summary: Take part in three distinct military operations and influence the course of events with the Arma 3 Tac-Ops DLC Singleplayer Mission Pack.

name: Arm of Revenge Re-Edition
summary: "Arm of Revenge" A arcade style platform action game, get more experience, learn new skills, upgrade equipment, Touching story, smooth moves, more than 30 skills to combo, 3 types of arm to change, survival mode...and more!, quickly with the hand of revenge kill all enemies.Enjoy it!

name: Arcade Archives: Pop Flamer
summary: Pop Flamer is an action game released by Jaleco in 1982. Players control the Pop Flamer to defeat monsters as they pop all the balloons in each stage. You'll need to refuel your flamethrower by popping balloons, since the flames get weaker each time you use it.

name: Arma 3: Helicopters
summary: Fly the brand-new CH-67 Huron and Mi-290 Taru heavy-lift helicopters, and master Sling Loading to provide ground support in the Arma 3 Helicopters DLC.

name: Arma 3: Tanks
summary: Roll in heavy firepower and take control of the battlefield with three brand new armored vehicles in the Arma 3 Tanks DLC.

name: Arma 3: Zeus
summary: Arma 3 Zeus is a new form of multiplayer where improvisation is the key to success. Inspired by popular tabletop games such as 'Dungeons & Dragons', this free DLC for Arma 3 enables you to assume the role of Zeus, a game master with the ability to curate the multiplayer experience of others.

name: Arma 3: Jets
summary: Fight in the sky with brand new air-superiority jets and use advanced targeting systems to shoot down the enemy in the Arma 3 Jets DLC.

name: Arma 3: Malden
summary: Welcome back to Malden, soldier! This is where we started our amazing journey with the Arma franchise sixteen years ago. We hope you'll enjoy this re-imagination of Malden.

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - CSLA Iron Curtain
summary: Engage your enemy in mechanized infantry operations, Special Forces raids and long-range patrols in an alternate 1980s Cold War Czechoslovakia!

name: Argus Panoptes
summary: A 2D platformer with engaging, physics-based mechanics in an unforgiving world. Collect the eyes of Argus Panoptes to complete the levels in this dystopian take on mythology.

name: Ark: The Center
summary: The Center is a free add-on for ARK: Survival Evolved that includes a massive new map for survivors to explore, nearly double the size of the playable geography of the standard ARK Island landscape making it about 70 sq. kilometers. The Center complements the current ARK biomes with a rich, hand-drawn Tolkien-esque aesthetic.

name: Ark Mobius
summary: This is a game containing "beautiful girl + rhythm game + multi ending GALGAME". In 2320, a huge monster appeared on the earth.Only magic energy can do harm to the monster.However,there is no more magic energy left on earth. So,you need to gain the energy from magical girls and save your world.

name: Archie
summary: Help Archie find the way out of the cave by solving an addicting puzzle.

name: Aries
summary: Space strategy gaming reimagined. Dive into fast-paced real-time planetary battles against the backdrop of a turn-based campaign that sees you build your empire in the stars. With hundreds of troops and ships at your command, can you forge an empire that lasts?

name: Arms Race: TCWE - Politics
summary: “From Stettin in the Baltic to Trieste in the Adriatic an iron curtain has descended across the Continent.”—Winston Churchill, address at Westminster College, Fulton, Missouri, March 5, 1946

name: Arizona Sunshine: Dead Man
summary: Welcome to the final days before the zombie apocalypse! Arizona Sunshine – Dead Man DLC drops you in an infested US missile base where you will lead a frantic attempt by US Army Special Forces to contain the expanding zombie outbreak in the American Southwest.

name: Archangel: Hellfire - Fully Loaded
summary: Fight for reign over post-apocalyptic lands: Go solo and explore life before all-out war ignited, or battle waves of enemy mechs in Mech Assault Coop Mode (1-4p)—Enlist in The Great Mech Wars today!

name: Army Gals: The Poker Game
summary: Can you beat the three girls at five card strip poker and reveal the gals a little more intimately.

name: Arn's Winter Quest
summary: In the words of its creator, “Arn’s Winter Quest has been a labor of love for me for two months, and rivals those hacks such as Hat Quest and EarthBound 2.5: Electric Boogaloo Joint Jive. It has a lot of fun inside jokes, an incoherent story, and all new battle graphics. This hack is basically linear Dragon Warrior with a bunch of humor thrown in, so if you like fighting and you like funny and you like very hard viewtiful fun time hacks, then don’t play this hack because it’ll satisfy your cravings and your head will probably explode.”

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim - Halloween
summary: New wares just in time for the Halloween season.

name: Arms Race: TCWE - Industrialization
summary: DLC Industrialization brings a new experience of economic cooperation between allied and neutral countries in an Arms Race: TCWE game.

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2
summary: The apocalypse is in full swing! Date Elder Gods, win back the Dreamlands - and all of reality as you know it - in this cosmic horror-comedy RPG.

name: Aria Chronicle: Necroknight
summary: The “Necroknight” is a Hero practicing necromancy. When they receive damage while protected by the “Bone Armor,” the enemy will receive damage in return. This “Bone Armor” can be stacked up to increase effectiveness, or removed to deal damage to the enemy, giving a new edge to your party.

name: Arcade Archives: Pac-Man
summary: Pac-Man is an action game released by Namco in 1980. Players clear stages by eating all Pac-Dots in each round without getting caught by any of the four ghosts, each with its own personality. Eating Power Pellets will let you attack the ghosts, so time them carefully!

name: Arcade Archives: Xevious
summary: Xevious is a shooter released by Namco in 1982. Players pilot the Solvalou and face off with the Xevious forces. Defeat airborne enemies with the zapper, and terrestrial enemies with the blaster. This game also features 26 character types with their own codenames.

name: Arran: The Book of Heroes
summary: Arran: The Book of Heroes is an action TopDown Hack & Slash cooperative multiplayer game, set in a fantasy world where mighty heroes rise and fight hordes of enemies to restore peace in a war ravaged land.

name: ArrowBall
summary: ArrowBall is a fast-paced Arrow-Sports game where you use explosive arrows and acrobatics to outmaneuver your opponents and control the ball. Engage in 1v1 or 2v2 local multiplayer battles across a variety of unique Stages. Run, jump, slow time, build up your Super Bar, and unleash your Super...

name: Arcade Archives: Typhoon Gal
summary: Typhoon Gal is an action game released by Taito in 1985. Players control martial-arts challenger Yuki as she faces off with the toughest opponents at rival martial arts schools. Yuki can use both major and minor techniques. Weaken enemies with minor techniques, then take them down with a single major technique!

name: Arcade Archives: Soldam
summary: Soldam is a puzzle game released by Jaleco in 1992. The game is an elusive puzzle known only to the fairy folk. The core rule of the game is to line up rows of nuts with the same color horizontally to remove them. The puzzle also has a special trick: surrounding other nuts with a pair of nuts of the same color will turn the nuts in the middle into the other color. Use this to make your way through the game!

name: Armello: Deluxe Bundle
summary:
Get all major Armello DLC in one place and at a special discount with the Armello - Deluxe Bundle!

Armello is a grand swashbuckling adventure that combines three styles of play; The deep tactics of card games with the rich strategy of table top board games, combined with a character role-playing system.

name: Arcade
summary: ARCADE is an ARCADE game in which you shoot 'n' dodge. Are you dead? Press START button and shoot 'n' dodge again! Sounds easy, doesn't it? I would argue with you!

name: Arch Stone vs. The Zombie Specters
summary: Arch Stone vs The Zombie Specters - Bad Dudes have unleashed Zombie Specters on the City. The DoD sends in Special Agent Arch Stone to stop them. Clear the Bad Dudes and Zombie Specters from several progressively challenging levels.

name: Artificial Superintelligence
summary:
You’re a startup founder building the world’s first sentient supercomputer! Slide either left or right to train your AI, handle the bizarre requests of Silicon Valley residents, and explore parallel universes. If you can keep your employees, your investors, the government, and the internet from tearing apart the fabric of society, then maybe you'll actually bring about the Singularity. But you'll probably just get arrested by the FBI. Or kidnapped by an obsessed superfan. Or consumed by a swarm of nanorobots.
¯\_(ツ)_/¯

name: Arthurian Legends
summary: Arthurian Legends is a medieval first person action game set in the land of Albion during a time of myth and legend. Battle hordes of Saxons, demonic beasts, the undead and worse in thy quest to save Albion from The Masters of the Old Religion.

name: Arcana: Heat and Cold. Season 1
summary: The misfortunes of the unskilled magician who just wanted to make some money and not get into any troubles.

name: Arena Breakout
summary: Arena Breakout is a free-to-play realistic and tactical FPS on mobile. Players can enjoy Immersive Gunplay with console-quality graphics and sound on mobile. In the arena, players can customize their own gun with the ultimate Gunsmithing system, decide their gear to fight for fortune, and breakout for the win. Come and join this battle, also a great gamble!

name: Arena of Speed: Fast and Furious
AR Flower
summary:
It may heal your inquietude and sadness.
"AR" is included, you can plant flowers in real world and take photos.
It is easy to learn: plant flowers one by one. Take your hot time of the summer vacation.
100 Levels in one world. Pass a level can get coins to unlock more worlds.

name: Artificial Life
summary:
Watch life evolve in the palm of your hand! Oddly hypnotic and relaxing, Artificial Life is a simulation of the growth and evolution of microorganisms - basically artificial life forms. Initially, each organism is given a random set of rules governing its behavior. If the rules end up being useful for survival, the organism may live long enough to mate with another organism and pass its genetic code on to some offspring.
Over time, the organisms with the most useful behaviors will pass on their genetic code, leading to interesting patterns of behavior unfolding before your eyes - flocking behaviors, solitary predatory tactics, scavenging, and hiding are some examples - and all this behavior is evolving from total randomness.

name: Arcane Tower
summary:
Evil reigns throughout the kingdom, darkness obscures the landscape. A brave wizard is determined to put an end to all of this. But there's only one way. The Arcane Tower keeps the powers and secrets required to defeat all the evil.
Arcane Tower is a roguelike game with mechanics carefully designed to make every run challenging, interesting and incredibly fun.

name: Argh! Earthlings!
summary:
Get "Argh! Earthlings!" and discover the consequences of an UFO crash, accidentally caused by David, a young, slightly left-handed hobby astronomer.
Explore the surroundings of over 50 game scenes. Collect various items and combine them by just a simple finger tap. Discover the secret of a little farm and its residents and help the really upset alien named "Fred" to escape the earth, but don't get caught by the lurking agents...

name: Arcsmith
summary:
BECOME AN ARCSMITH Assemble essential items of the future using a library of modular pieces with master arcsmith Korith Dinn as your reluctant mentor. Watch your quiet station become the focal point of an intergalactic power struggle that could determine the future of the universe.

A NEW TYPE OF VR EXPERIENCE Solve challenging three-dimensional engineering puzzles. Balance heat, power and other variables along the way and use diagnostic tools to guide your creations.

LEARN ON THE JOB Get the basics, but the rest is up to you. Wrap your brain around the creation and assembly of the galaxy’s most (extra)ordinary items. Start with building a simple radio, then progress onto space drones and antimatter generators. A vast variety of devices await your creation.

AN ORIGINAL STORY A unique tale of friendship and redemption from the team behind award-winning games Thomas Was Alone and Subsurface Circular. Arcsmith is the first week at a new job unlike any you’ve experienced before.

name: Arctic Quest
summary: With a wave of his icy fingers, the Snow King unleashed a bitter frost on the tropical islands across Earth. In Arctic Quest, you set out to solve the puzzles. As pieces of ice fall from the sky, grab them with your mouse, rotate them and place them on a grid within the puzzle, filling in the shape and returning warmth to the island bit by bit. If the waters that surround your once balmy home fill up with unused ice, your quest will fail.

name: Arctic Quest 2
summary: In Arctic Quest 2, the son of the Snow King sets out to turn Earth into an icy prison for all living creatures. To foil his evil plans, you must solve inlay puzzles. New powers are available to help you win, including water elements that can fill in the empty pieces of a puzzle and fire elements that can wipe out all of your hard work! Easy to learn, fun to play, and featuring amazing new visuals and audio effects, Arctic Quest 2 will please fans and newcomers alike.

name: Arcade Archives: The Genji and the Heike Clans
summary: The Genji and the Heike Clans is an action game released by Namco in 1986. Players control the hero Taira no Kagekiyo on a mission to the capital city of Kamakura, to defeat the Demon Genji Clan's king Yoritomo. The player will face attacks by Genji Clan soldiers like Yoshitsune and Benkei along the way to Kamakura. Defeat all challengers and gather the Three Sacred Treasures to defeat Yoritomo.

name: ArtFormer: Ancient Stories
summary:
ArtFormer is a story-driven cinematic platformer with RPG elements. This Indie game project consists of four challenging story chapters each with a unique hero, different gameplay, and original art style based on existing fragments of human history: Cave paintings, Egyptian papyrus, Greek pottery, and Roman mosaic.

The characters and stories seen through the eyes of ancient artists from different times will come to life before your eyes. Four chapters of ArtFormer each with a unique hero, storyline, and new mechanics!

This isn't just a humble tribute to the cinematic platformers (Prince of Persia, Another World, Oddworld, Flashback...), but a proud continuation of their gaming legacies.

ArtFormer's game controls are specially designed and adapted to enable gamers with reduced mobility or other impairment to one upper limb. Yes, this means that the game can be controlled with one hand. However, you cannot expect a "standard" control setup, but a slightly different control scheme than that used by other similar games. Please bear that in mind while playing.

name: Archewood
summary: A 2D MMORPG that is a loot fest with tons of abilities to master and skills to train, with a player driven economy.

name: Arrowmancer
summary:
Arrowmancer is the world's first machine learning illustrated anime game! Powered by Waifu Labs!

Challenge yourself with genre-defining RPG mechanics that combines a mixture of strategy and reflexes. Easy to pick up, but difficult to master!

Meet and connect with a universe of infinite characters. Explore the solar system and conquer its challenging dungeons. Level up your witches and become an interplanetary legend!

Your solarpunk magic adventure awaits!

name: Argentum Online
summary:
THE FIRST 100% ARGENTINE MMORPG
Argentum is a multiplayer online game, where you can take on the role of a warrior, wizard, paladin and many other classes, and explore the mythical lands of Argentum.

It was born 20 years ago as a game fully developed in Argentina and then released to the community for free. The code is accessible to all, thus allowing its evolution and continuity over time.

From the hand of the original creators of the game, Argentum Online resurfaces as a commemoration of the 20 years of its origin.

name: Artists of a Dead World
summary: A lonely city somewhere at the end of the world.

name: Arken
summary: Retro inspired Zelda-like / action adventure

name: Artemis' Minesweeper
summary: Artemis' Minesweeper is the a hardcore version of minesweeper, a mashup of minesweeper and a bullet hell shoot 'em up. It features Artemis of the Blue Fan-Game by VTuber Numachi Tamanegi.

name: Art Fight Duel
summary: ​An homage to Art Fight, draw your cards, summon characters from various artists and duel for your favourite team!​

name: Archtower
summary: Archtower is a mixture of Roguelite and ARPG. Explore the mysterious Tower, build your characters, improve and develop your clan. Use different skills from power crystals to optimize your builds. And try not to die. But don't worry, the game gives you options to survive and keep your loot on defeat.

name: Ara and the Empty Universe
summary:
A game where nothing is happening metaphorically.
Let's say... you find yourself in a strange world where the trees and buildings all float 5 meters above ground level? That's no dream sequence, it's not metaphorical either, it's happening. Reality seems to be broken and you are going to have to face that.

Game length: 70 - 100 minutes, depending on how much you explore.

name: Argousze
summary: Short story about an alien invasion that never happened.

name: Arcade Maniac
summary: Two gameplays in one! An infinite runner where you help Ziggy win the arcade while dodging pedestrians.

name: Are You Ok?
summary: A short Twine game about understanding.

name: Are U OK?
summary: Are U OK? is about a meltdown at a movie premiere.

name: Arena Circus
summary: A visual novel set in a fantasy world where appearance is everything and humans are at the bottom of the totem pole. A disowned prince and a sickly human who got a second chance at life rebel against a corrupt monarchy.

name: Aria at the Funeraria
summary: See ghosts and corpse brides at the funeral home.

name: ​ARZA: Adrenaline Rush Zombie Assault
summary: Hardcore Zombie Survival Top-Down Shooter

name: Arena
summary: The ultimate arena game! Fight your friends or the AI for dominance, who will be the first to master the arena?

name: Artifacto
summary:
Welcome adventurer.

Do you want to embark on a search for artifacts hidden in vast dungeons filled with dangerous traps and clever enemies?

In, Artifacto you can do just that.

name: Aristoi
summary: Aristoi is a social-deduction & role-play game. There are 9 different roles with two different teams. Players use their roles, voting suspicious to win. Players using communitication skills to convince others.

name: ArsDoom
summary:
An attempt for an artists project using the wellknown doom engine and
wellhacked internal formats. No blood-feast!
About 20 artists have been invited to exhibit in the virtual museum located
in the Brucknerhaus in Linz, where every year an exhibition for the worlds
greatest computer art contest, the prix ars electronica is celebrated.
So people around the world who cannot come to Linz this time participate at
the exhibition in the virtual Brucknerhaus. All the artists are there
virtually (at least there heads and projects). Some personally, some
computer generated. Max. 4 of them on the net, the other 20
as monsters. And have fun interacting with the different projects, be an
artist like Arnulf Rainer, Hermann Nitsch, Baselitz or Nam June Paik.

name: Art of Not Getting Found
summary: Sometimes the only way of getting to your destination is by getting lost...

name: Archery Club
summary: Archery Club is an archery game with multiple exciting game types and an extensive upgrade system. Become a master archer, collect the best equipment and win!

name: Arcade Archives: Black Heart
summary: Black Heart is a shooter released by UPL in 1991. Taranith, absolute ruler of the Dark Forces, has kidnapped Jeanne. Zil must mount his dragon and take to the skies, assaulting the enemy castle to save her. In order to defeat the boss, work together with the fairies that accompany you and the pixies that allow you to fire powerful attacks when you collect them.

name: Arcade Archives: Libble Rabble
summary: Libble Rabble is an action puzzle game released by Namco in 1983. Control Libble and Rabble to bashishi various characters. When you bashishi all the Topcups that pop out of treasure chests, a miracle will occur that allows you to enter a bonus stage. Remember treasure chest locations and aim for a high score.

name: Arkfront
summary: ARKFRONT is an arcade shooter with beautiful pixel-art graphics, RPG upgrades, and a rogue-lite style progression system reminiscent of FTL. Battle your way across the galaxy in search of a new home for mankind.

name: ARD: Anomalous Research Department
summary:
In the basement of a local community college, a forgotten computer sits.

The last relic of the Anomalous Research Department.

What was their purpose? What did they find?

Was it the solution? Or was it the cause?

name: Arcticmind
summary: You wake up in an abandoned hospital, not knowing what has happened to you or where you are. soon noticing that you are not alone and must find out what happened to you and the world while trying to survive that nightmare..

name: Arcade Galaxy
summary: Arcade Galaxy is a game made in 2D-hand-drawn graphics, which is a space arcade in a retro style. In it you have to shoot hundreds of different types of enemy ships, collect various bonuses, dodge bullets, and also make sure that your combat arsenal does not end.

name: Arc
summary: A cyberpunk adventure.

name: Architect
summary: Architect is a VR puzzle game, peaceful but brain-teasing !

name: Arcadea
summary: Follow Maisie on a quest across the fantastical world of Arcadea to find someone precious to her....

name: Arashi
summary: 2017 Graduation Prototype - Racing-Platformer Video Game

name: Arktonis 13
summary: Story driven narrative experience with unique time mechanic

name: Are you human?
summary: It's a 2D puzzle platformer in a world of robots where you attempt to finish the level with everyone alive!

name: Ardilous
summary: Uncover international spies in this investigative text puzzle game inspired by the classic Carmen San Diego.

name: A Red Sky at Dawn
summary: An interactive murder mystery set in 1941 Singapore.

name: Arapuca
summary: A Puzzle game with a mode7 like rotation effect for Mega Drive

name: Arthorse Exhibition
summary: covid-safe dose of culture! Explore the 3D exhibition of the ArtHorse Comic collective

name: Area 51: Running Ninja Raid
summary: Play as Crossette from SL:DL and storm Area 51 to find out what's really inside!

name: Artificial
summary: Delve into the dangerous depths of Vardus, in this indie dungeon crawler and discover it's secrets.

name: Arches
summary: A colourful, accessible, turn-based first person dungeon crawler.

name: Arachne
summary: A roguelike set on a dynamically deforming spiderweb

name: Araignees
summary: Atmospheric First-Person Horror Adventure. Follow the feverish dream of an industrial worker plunged into a nightmare after a small spider bite...

name: Arachnotron
summary: A 3D shooter where every surface is traversable: Just like a spider (with guns)

name: Arthur
summary: Not all chosen ones must be just and noble. Sometimes it just has to be a crook.

name: Ariel Cleanomancer and the Eldritch Sweep
summary: Ariel has to vacuum the basements of a weird-ass hotel to become a certified cleanomancer.

name: Artificial Immunity
summary: Fight off infection from incoming pathogens

name: Arnaud Thion's Dragons
summary: Destroy the land as a dragon!

name: ARC Raiders
summary:
ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure, set in a lethal future earth, ravaged by a mysterious mechanized threat known as ARC. Enlist as a Raider and scavenge the surface to thrive in a desolate world. But beware of the machines. Beware of Raiders preying on others.

ARC Raiders blends the tension from extraction shooters with atmospheric settings from the adventure genre.
