Lurking threats—from deadly machines to other Raiders—create a constant ebb and flow of intensity, where every moment is charged with the thrill of high stakes. Extract valuable loot and explore the unfolding mysteries of a vibrant, lethal world.

ARC Raiders supports seamless social play across PlayStation, Xbox, and PC. Play with your squad and thrive as a team, or rise in the ranks as a lone ranger.

name: Arcade Archives: Orius
summary: Orius is a shooting game released by Konami in 1991. Pilot the cutting-edge fighter craft, Flintlock, and solve the mystery of what happened on planet E-Square. In this game, in addition to your usual shots, you can use the mysterious Flint life form for attack and defense.

name: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M.
summary: The Game Boy Color port of the Nintendo 64 and PlayStation game based on the Valiant Comics Armorines.

name: Armis
summary: We invite adventurers to the world of Armis, a fantastic mobile MMORPG with a different dimension to enjoy in 3D high definition!

name: Arthur's Thinking Games
summary: Arthur's Thinking Games is the perfect combination of learning, fun, and helpful features. With 6 different fun-filled activities and 5 levels of difficulty, Arthur's Thinking Games will entertain your child with hours of learning and fun!

name: Argonauts Agency: Glove of Midas
summary: The Argonauts Agency – Experiments with a magical glove lead to a hilarious blunder!

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Buster
summary: Dragon Buster is an action game released by Namco in 1984. Become the hero Clovis, and use your sword and magic and make your way to Dragon Mountain. Battle through demon-infested graveyards and ruins to defeat the mighty Dragon and rescue Princess Celia.

name: Arcade Archives: Liquid Kids
summary: Liquid Kids is an action game released by Taito in 1990. Take control of the young hero from the hippo tribe, Hipopo, and battle against the Fire Demon to protect the peaceful Woody-Lake. An adventure of danger and excitement is just beginning.

name: Arcade Archives: Mappy
summary: Mappy is an action game released by Namco in 1983. Players control Mappy, an enthusiastic, committed police officer on a mission to reclaim stolen goods from a mansion. Avoid getting caught by Nyamco and Mewkies while you take back the goods!

name: Arcade Archives: Mirai Ninja
summary: Mirai Ninja is an action game released by Namco in 1988. Control the cyborg ninja, Shiranui, and rescue Princess Saki from the cyborg ninja army that kidnapped her. Pick up the orbs in the stages to activate various effects that will help Shiranui.

name: Arcade Archives: Phozon
summary: Phozon is an action game released by Namco in 1983. Control a nucleus called Chemic and merge with Molecules to complete specified formations. The formations get increasingly complex, but that only makes completing them more satisfying.

name: Arcade Archives: Raimais
summary: Raimais is an action game released by Taito in 1988. Drive the Organizer through different stages of the labyrinth to rescue your captured brother. The ending will change depending on what items you get and how you get through the labyrinths, so try out different patterns.

name: Arcade Archives: Rally-X
summary: Rally-X is an action game released by Namco in 1980. Players control a car and dodge pursuing red cars while collecting flags. Stall the red cars using a smokescreen when they get too close.

name: Arcade Archives: Sky Kid
summary: Sky Kid is a shooter released by Namco in 1985. Players control Baron and Max to fight enemies with bombs and machine guns, fly in loops to dodge enemy attacks, and make their way to the base. Use bombs to defeat massive fortresses and battleships from above! Supports two-player simultaneous co-op.

name: Arcade Archive: Vulcan Venture
summary: Battle resumes! Shatter GOFER's ambitions!!

name: Archipelago
summary: Archipelago is a roguelike tower defense game about defending randomly generated islands. Setup your defenses, manage your income, and find powerful charms to repel the enemy. Archipelago introduces tension and strategy to the tower defense genre.

name: Arpsic
summary: Arpsic is a casual musical rhythm game. With Arpsic, you can train yourself with intuitive lessons, learn the treble clef, bass clef, and more!

name: Argonauts Agency: Missing Daughter
summary: The Argonauts Agency – Find out how the family turmoil of the gods has affected common mortals and how it all ends!

name: Arcadebnb
summary: Get carried away by the real estate fever in an arcade way.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Pac-Man
summary: Super Pac-Man is an action game released by Namco in 1982. It’s an additional power-up to Namco's flagship title, Pac-Man! Eat Super Power Pellets to become invincible and get a speed boost! Eat a Power Pellet after that and become Super Pac-Man to take out all the ghosts at once!

name: Arcade Archives: GunNail
summary: GunNail is a shooting game released by NMK in 1993. This game has a feature called the Multiple Shield System where you'll get a higher score the fewer shields you have. Experience hardcore gameplay mechanics typical of NMK, and an intense scoring system!

name: Arcade Archives: Hopping Mappy
summary: Hopping Mappy is an action game released by Namco in 1986. You've escaped Nyamco's mansion, but now you must avoid Nyamco and the others with your new pogo stick weapon as they chase you. Collect the targets on the ground while avoiding Nyamco and Mewkies.

name: Argonauts Agency: Chair of Hephaestus
summary: Argonauts Agency—See how a regular chair can be the beginning of a whole investigation and amazing adventure!

name: Armor Clash 2022
summary: Armor Clash 2022 is an old-school modern warfare RTS game with base building, customize factions and navy units.

name: Arghh, There's a Killer Chasing Me!
summary: Arghh, There's a Killer Chasing Me! is a comedy survival horror game where you play as Adam who is being hunted by a killer in the woods. Your objective is to escape…preferably with your insides still on the inside.

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers!
Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - New Voyager Ep. 1
summary: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - New Voyager Ep. 2
summary: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - New Voyager Ep. 3
summary: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - New Voyager Ep. 4
summary: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - New Voyager Ep. 6
summary: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Neue Voyager Ep. 5
summary: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Arre Unicornio
summary: A new concept of the board game Arre Unicornio now driven to the madness that it can regale us with in video game format. Arre Unicornio is an online multiplayer video game for 2 to 8 players. Frantic party game of hidden roles in a madhouse. Mix of point and click and use of cards.

name: Arsenal
summary:
Arsenal is a 3D First Person Shooter multiplayer game for the Fabwelt Gaming Ecosystem and Metaverse. It utilizes in-game NFTs as assets, collectibles, and utilities. In-game assets are all blockchain collectibles that users utilize in playing the game. As blockchain-based items, in-game assets can be freely withdrawn from the game for other uses such as collateral on decentralized lending protocol, staking, gifting, or passing it down as an inheritance. In-game assets can be seen as a commodity.

It’s fully playable as a WebGL game on your browser. It has a “battleground” look and feels and it’s fully integrated with blockchain technology. Pay to Play and Play to Earn is integrated in such a way, it attracts everyday players as well as professional players around the world, to get incentives and fun. Many different types of maps are included like big maps for sniping, and small maps for fast close combat.

name: Arizona Derby 2
summary: Thrilling, action-packed, racing game. Drive the world's top tuners through locations that are hidden gems across the globe. Ascend the leaderboards, race against the gangs and their allies. Tune the car into endless customizations and show up to the world. Hit the pedal, heat out the offroads!

name: Army to Army
summary: Army To Army is a strategy game with physics and mountains of non-disappearing victims. In the game, you can collide with each other from 2 to 4 armies, in total on the map there can be more than 500 fighting different classes and characteristics.

name: Armchair Racer
summary: Race against your friends or AI in this top down arcade racer!

name: Arrows
summary: Arrows is a puzzle game with a minimalist and modern visual that consists of aligning the colored blocks

name: Arcante: Definitive Edition
summary: A Fantasy Action RPG. Create your party and head off on an adventure. Playing Turn-Based or Real Time is up to you.

name: ArrowBase
summary: ArrowBase is a Versus platform game where the objective is to send your arrow on your opponent. You can slide, dive forward, attack your opponent in close combat to propel him into the air.

name: Arm Wrestling Reborn
summary: The ultimate arcade button smasher. Experience the life as a professional arm wrestler. Play on desktop PC or in VR. Single player campaign or 2-player VS.

name: Arboreal
summary: Play as a lizard climbing to the top of the tallest tree in the forest!

name: Artisan
summary: A young man finds himself trapped in an otherworldly museum where he is forced to fight in a battle royal using strange ghost-like creatures called Artisans.

name: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks
summary: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks is a unique combination of tank design and tycoon game. It puts you in charge of an arms trading company specialized in tanks from WWI to the modern era. Research, design, sell and follow your tanks in battle to make your own history!

name: Arksync
summary: Wired from the ashes of twin stick Shooters, Arksync evolves the genre with breakneck player movement and lethal enemy AI. Kill for energy to buy weapons, utilities, and upgrades; risk it all as you enter the depths of the evacuation facility. It's the only way to take this robot teddy bear home.

name: Armed and Armoured
summary: Armed and Armoured is a historical action & strategy RPG. The game dedicates to recreate the most realistic ancient sword fighting battles, with an immersive army organizing simulation system. The story background is based on the late Ming dynasty of China (late 16th Century).

name: A.R.D. Alien Removal Division
summary: Alien Removal Division is a fast paced, action-packed first-person shooter, set in a military research facility during the 1950s. The base has been overrun by aliens and you find yourself, as the only survivor, at the center of the invasion. Your escape will be challenging, but you'll have an array of weapons and movement abilities to help you during your fight and on your getaway.

name: Argonauts Agency: Captive of Circe
summary: The Argonauts Agency – An invitation to a wedding sets in motion an incredible investigation with an unexpected twist!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spooky Rush Ep. 4
summary: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 5
summary: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 2
summary: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 1
summary: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

summary: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

summary: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

summary: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 4
summary: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Aquaris Planet
summary: Welcome to the water world! Paint by numbers and uncover the secrets of the oceans!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Esprit de Noel Ep. 3
summary: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spooky Rush Ep. 1
summary: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spooky Rush Ep. 6
summary: Halloween is coming! Paint by numbers and take portraits of mythical characters!

name: Arcana: Heat and Cold - Season 2
summary: New adventures of the unskilled magician, his friends and Miley. Fun events, hentai scenes and unique turn-based combat await you.

name: Armageddon: For the Crimson Glory
summary: Armageddon: For the Crimson Glory is a real-time strategy game in a sci-fi universe developed and published by Mips Soft.

name: Arabians Doubt: The Engagement on Desert
summary: Set after the normal route in Arabian’s Lost where you win the bet but don’t get a husband. Eileen finds herself forced to act as ruler after her parents take off one day on a trip.

name: Ardenfall
summary: Ardenfall is a first-person RPG set in a world of intricate politics and ancient cultures. Explore rain-drenched wetlands and forgotten dungeons full of danger. Meet countless interesting characters with unique dialog and quests, and leave your mark on this mysterious world.

name: Arcana Twilight
summary: "Arcana Twilight" is an 'otome' card battle game with six charming wizards!

name: Arcade Archives: Dangerous Seed
summary: Dangerous Seed is a shooter released in 1989. You pilot the Moon Diver fighter, which is made up of α-Ship, β-Ship, and γ-Ship, to fight off the mysterious aliens. If you can keep all of your ships running through the battle, they can also combine and transform into an ultimate configuration.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Dragon 2
summary: Thunder Dragon 2 is a shooting game released by NMK in 1993. Let's aim to defeat the boss by using aircraft with different performance in 1P and 2P. It is an exhilarating work that defeats enemies that appear one after another with shots and bombs.

name: Arcade Archives: New Rally-X
summary: New Rally-X is an action game released in 1981. This work is a full model change from the previous Rally-X. Experience the same thrilling car chases against red cars, now with easier gameplay.

name: Arcade Archives: Highway Race
summary: Highway Race is a racing game released in 1983. Run each course while avoiding obstacles and other vehicles. The goal is to make a big jump toward the opposite bank at the end of the course and land safely with a parachute.

name: Arena of Octos
summary: Arena of Octos is a single-player, turn-based combat video game for the Apple II and TRS-80 computer families. It was created by Steve Kropinak and Al Johnson in 1981 and published by SoftSide magazine. The player assumes the role of a human space pilot, captured by an aggressive race of green-skinned aliens known as Octons after straying into their space. To win freedom, the human must become a gladiator and engage in physical combat with numerous Octon warriors.

name: Arena Drift Master
summary: Your main goal is to destroy all the objects in the arena while drifting.

name: Arcade Archives: Pistol Daimyo no Bouken
summary: Pistol Daimyo no Bouken is a shooter released by Namco in 1990. Players control the young lord Pistol Daimyo on an adventure as he battles, spirits and evildoers. His energy bullets have 3 tiers of strength, determined by how long you hold the button. Use helpful items you find along the way and triumph over the enemies before you!

name: Aria
summary: Aria is a narrative-driven adventure game following a young girl - Aria and her travelling companion, a “Dolki” (Half Dolphin, half Kiwi). A recent tragedy has left Aria adrift in her own imagination where corruption has begun to intrude upon the lands.

name: Artificial Entanglement
summary: Uncover the mysteries of your existence in an abandoned robotics lab, using precision platforming, magnetism, puzzle solving & death. *hacking sounds* ₲łVɆ ₥Ɇ ₳ ₵Ⱨ₳₦₵Ɇ *hacking sounds*

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Spirit
summary: Dragon Spirit is a shooting game released by Namco in 1987. Control Amul, a hero who's been transformed into the Blue Dragon, and save Princess Alicia of Midgard who was taken by the dark lord Zawell. Battle enemies on the ground and in the air, and use power-up items to progress through the areas.

name: Aracnidium
summary: Earth has been invaded by android spiders. Bob's family is in danger. Spiders are getting into houses from all sides. Find the right angle and shoot the spiders. Help Bob in this mission.

name: A Rat's Life: The Cat Conspiracy
summary: Play as a rat in this first-person action-adventure. Overcome enemies and obstacle with your rat skills. Sneak and run away from horrifying cats. Ultimately explore and meet different rats to confirm or debunk conspiracy theories in this story-rich world.

name: Arcana Famiglia: Festa Regalo
summary: Arcana Famiglia: Festa Regalo is the third instalment of the La storia della Arcana Famiglia games released for Playstation Portable. It is a spin-off cooking game.

name: Arcade Archives: Qix
summary: Qix is a line-drawing puzzle game developed by Taito in 1981. Players control the Marker to draw lines, closing off and controlling areas. Avoid the hostile Qix and Sparx that roam the stage, and work to control at least 75% of the stage!

name: Arknights: Endfield
summary: Arknights: Endfield is a 3D real-time strategy RPG developed by HYPERGRYPH. You will take on the role of the Endministrator of Endfield Industries, set out across Talos-II to uncover its secrets, and defend and expand the frontiers of human civilization.

name: Arcade Archives: USAAF Mustang
summary: USAAF Mustang is a shooter released by UPL in 1990. Players pilot a plane and take on enemy squadrons. Use power-up items to enhance your weapons and gain the advantage as you clear stages. The key to victory is the Strike Forcer attack, which makes you temporarily invincible in a pinch while continuing your attacks on enemies.

name: Arabian Nights Love Story
summary:
You're working as a nurse in a hospital.
One day, you come to say good bye to one of your patient, Fujishima, who's about to leave the hospital.
To thank you for all your good work, he offers you a lamp.

Back to home, you rub the lamp to burn it incense, but you're sucked in it by force !

When you open your eyes...
A man you don't even know is facing you.

The genie of the lamp tells you that you have to fulfill the real wish each character made if you want to go back to your world !?
What does it mean ?

While you're doing your best to find out how to fulfil theirs wishes, a new love story begins ?

name: Arabian Nights Desert Heart Love
summary:
Has the jewel chosen me as the maiden of destiny? As the future queen of this Arabian country, it is your choice who will be the next king…

Should you fail to choose one of the three princes by the next solar eclipse, you will pay with your life. What lies ahead of you, at the hands of such a fate?

name: Arcana of Paradise: The Tower
summary: Choose from 20 children and perfect your deck as you battle against The Tower's bizarre inhabitants in real time! Time your guards, combo your attacks, charge up powerful magic, and collect legendary relics in your search for food, as you guide the children to the bottom!

name: Are You Smarter Than the Crowd?
summary: You think you're a smart little fella, huh? Well, come on down and prove it in the "Are You Smarter Than the Crowd?" -gameshow! Compete with or against the crowd in a fun I.Q game, hosted by our lovely host!

name: Arrival of the Punnu
summary: Arrival of Punnu is a story about Punnu from outer space, explorers who make a crash landing to a planet called Earth. In their mission to fix their broken ship they get an ally of a little child, whose imagination will open up a whole new perspective to our homeplanet.

name: Armored Firestorm
summary: Armored Firestorm is an intense top-down shoot'em up action game in a futurist environments. At the controls of your Hovertank, survive against the attack of the machines in the orbital city of the federation.

name: Artifact Hunter: The Lost Prophecy
summary: After the disappearance of his father, Jason grew up into a treasure hunter willing to risk life and limb to find rare and valuable artifacts. When he finds his father’s old journal, he learns that he disappeared while on the trail of an artifact he referred to as the Lost Prophecy.

name: Arkheim: Realms at War
summary: Experience a new take on the competitive 4x genre with Arkheim - Realms at War: Team based strategy in a free to play MMO fantasy world, played in game rounds of 10 weeks each!

name: Arcade Squad
summary: Arcade Squad is a classic arcade shooter with 15 levels and 6 different spaceships, each with 6 different skins. Rise to the challenge and free the galaxy.

name: Arhaekon
summary: Become an Arhaekon and recover lost treasures & knowledge, bleed your minions and forge them into something more, rebuild what has fallen into decay and lay waste to the abominations holding the world captive, in our Tactical turn-based dungeon crawler.

name: Ark Defender
summary: Roguelike missile command. Survive as long as you can aboard the Ark, humanity's last hope, in a hostile galaxy.

name: Arboreal
summary: Answer the call of the Nature Spirits in this peaceful tree growing simulation. Cultivate and cook various fruit species to receive help from the forest inhabitants. Automatize production with ingenious tracks and machines. Find your equilibrium to let life flourish!

name: Archero
summary: Dear archer hero, it's time for using your skillful archery skills, different arrows and the blessings of the bow gods, to easily destroy all kinds of enemies and complete a variety of challenges! Don't forget to beat your challengers, they don't want you to become a god!

name: Arcade Archives: Rolling Thunder
summary: Rolling Thunder is an action game released by Namco in 1986. Control the hero and infiltrate the secret base of the Geldra secret society as they plot to dominate the globe. Experience a hard-boiled adventure with a smart hero in the lead. This title contains three versions, each with slightly different content.

name: Arcade Archives: Wonder Momo
summary: Wonder Momo is an action game released by Namco in 1987. Control the hero, Momo, and take down the Warudemon Villain to keep the world at peace. Ride the whirlwind to transform into Wonder Momo and fight for your success as a costumed hero, using Wonder Rings and special moves!

name: Arcis Ultima
summary: Player finds himself in the war between human race and the invading creatures. You must train yourself, get the very best equipment, recall your past and help human efforts. Otherwise; as the time passes, you may find yourself in a hopeless situation.

name: Arcade Archives: Empire City 1931
summary: Empire City: 1931 is a gun shooting game released by Seibu Kaihatsu in 1986. Set in the United States in 1931. From the window, from the rooftop, while hiding, various enemies are aiming at us! Pull out the gun before your opponent and defeat the enemies that appear one after another!

name: Arcade Archives: Pac-Land
summary: Pac-Land is a side-scrolling action game released by Namco in 1984. The title follows Pac-Man on a quest to bring lost fairies home to Fairyland. What strange events will Pac-Man encounter as he leaves town, then passes through the mountains and forests? Pac-Man's charming adventures begin here!

name: Armored Sinner
summary: A short story and short journey. You awaken in a strange jail with no other living humans around. You vaguely remember being convicted for an unknown sin you committed in the past. You will reach the end of the path and find out why you're here.

name: Armor Heroes
summary: Pick from the Ten Heroes, each with there own Special as they tackle wave after wave of enemies, and discover the best combos to do it with! This is by far my best game so far and I realy hope you agree, have fun playing it, if you do that, I've succeded! P.S. Some enemies attack from behind and others apear in waves, so unless "GO" flashes on your screen, theres killing to be had!

name: Army Ops
summary: Army Ops is a spiritual successor to classic America’s Army and a realistic, team and skill based tactical multiplayer FPS with focus on small unit tactical maneuvers. Teamwork, unique classes, a challenging progression system are the core pillars for community and competetive PvP matches.

name: Arms Doll
summary: Arms Doll is a VR mecha action game where you become the pilot of a humanoid mobile weapon called an ARMS DOLL and fight against the enemy.

name: Artis Impact
summary: Artis Impact is a story-rich, adventure pixel RPG that features classic turn-based combat, upgrading your home, and exploring uniquely hand-drawn environments. Players will take on the role of official Akane, teaming up with Bot to unravel the mysteries of a future utopian world.

name: Arsenal Shock
summary: Arsenal Shock is a fast-paced singleplayer arena dual-weapon shooter. Use a multitude of weapons to fight off endless waves of enemies and achieve new high scores in 11 diverse mayhem-filled arenas. Also includes two Playground levels with gravity gun functionality.

name: Ark Mobius: Censored Edition
summary: This is a game containing "beautiful girl + rhythm game + multi ending GALGAME". In 2320, a huge monster appeared on the earth.Only magic energy can do harm to the monster.However,there is no more magic energy left on earth. So,you need to gain the energy from magical girls and save your world.

name: Arithmagic: Math Wizard Game
summary: Explore the world as a magician wielding the power of arithmetic! Practice your addition, subtraction, division and multiplication skills by casting, flipping and combining all of your math spells to defeat enemies.

name: Arabilis
summary: Arabilis: Super Harvest is an arcade farming puzzle game. You are planting, growing and harvesting vegetables in gardens filled with randomized challenges. Each season will provide a new garden for you to efficiently farm for points. Each year passing will increase the difficulty and amount of challenges you face, how many years can you last? How high will your score be?

name: Artisan Adventure
summary: Artisan Adventure is thrilling, innovative new Adventure/Role-Playing Game. Unlike the traditional adventure, here you are free to choose your adventures, featuring a non-linear storyline that will take challenge the Hero with tons of challenges. In the world of Artisan Adventure you are free to go train various skills or go slay the most powerful monsters that threaten the existence of your beloved town.

name: Areigna Tactics
summary:
Areigna Tactics is a top-down hex based strategy game taking place in the world of Areigna, a fantasy world of Humans, Goblins, Dwarfs, and much more. Play in this multiplayer real time strategy game online in ranked matches with people all around the world.

Unlike many strategy games which are based on resources held and build times, Areigna’s gameplay and balance focuses instead on cooldowns. These cooldowns vary across different units, and their attack and movement. You will need to balance these cooldowns and constraints in your building of new units, as well in the actions you command your units making their way to the enemy nexus.

name: Arcade Archives: The Legend Of Valkyrie
summary: The Legend Of Valkyrie is an action game released by Namco in 1989. Valkyrie No Bouken features the popular Valkyrie once again, for an even higher-power adventure! When the seeds of gold are watered by the northern spring, a miracle will spring forth in the doomed land.

name: Arena Brutal
summary: Shoot lead & blow heads in Arena Brutal, an action shooter that'll put your weapons proficiency to the test! You'll need to manage the uniquely simulated recoil of each gun, keep on top of ammo & avoid getting your face blown off while speeding to the exit for the highest score & the next challenge

name: ARCA Sim Racing X
summary: ARCA Sim Racing X (ASRX) is sim racing game that was created after updates to the XPatch were abandoned. ARCA Sim Racing X (ASRX) combines the original ARCA08 stock car with the TSF Trucks and other mods from Community members and make a stand alone game to accessible and include multiple class to race in Oval track.

name: ARCA Sim Racing 08'
summary: ARCA Sim Racing is a stock-car racing simulator that focus on 2008 ARCA RE/MAX season that happen on OVAL and road courses.

name: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Game Time
Arrow Spam
summary: One button real-time arrow spamming fun!

name: Area 51
summary: A game for the R-Zone based on the Area 51 arcade game.

name: Arcade Archives: Youkai Douchuki
summary: "Youkai Douchuki" is a side-scrolling action where players control "Tarosuke", a mischievous, playful boy who always troubled his village with pranks.

name: Arcade Archives: Gaplus
summary: Strike back with powerful Blaster Head weapons!

name: Arise: A Simple Story - Definitive Edition
summary: Your adventure of love and loss.

name: Armed Dragon Fantasy Villgust
summary: Armed Dragon Fantasy Villgust is a Role-Playing game, developed by TOSE and published by Angel (Bandai), which was released in Japan in 1993. This game is based off the anime of the same name that was released many years ago.

name: Art Mahjong 4
summary: Excellent entertainment awaits you in this latest version of the popular "Art Mahjong" series. The game offers many challenging levels and mahjongg boards that, once unlocked, reveal beautiful backgrounds.

name: Art of Rally: Collector's Edition
summary:
Art of Rally: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- OST download card
- Vinyl sticker sheet: Set of 11 unique stickers
- DIY papercraft car modeled off the in-game il Gorillona
- Illustrated poster featuring a compendium of the in-game cars
- 4-piece enamel pin set
- Set of 4 bumper stickers with unique art
- Set of 4 patches highlighting in-game locations
- 3D lenticular card featuring an action shot from the game

name: Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader?
summary: With over 6,800 multiple-choice questions, true-or-false challenges, and minigames, you'll have the chance to challenge your proficiency in 24 different subjects, with topics like animal sciences, vocabulary, math, and more.

name: Ardor
summary: A hex-grid puzzle-tactics card game. Outwit and outlive your enemies, while upgrading your deck. A lightweight game of bite-sized encounters.

name: Arkell
summary: Adventurer! Oh, how glad am I to see you here. Our world is destroyed, captivated by the Demon Lord Agatheus. You must help us, angel from the heavens. You must stop Agatheus, or we may never breathe again...

name: Arto
summary: Fight through unique biomes against challenging enemies and bosses as you piece together the mysteries of a broken world, in an action role-playing experience that paints a new path.

name: Army of One
summary: Army of One is a first and third person shooter style game based on teams and solo confrontations, with melee combat and objective-oriented multiplayer gameplay. Prove to everyone that you are the best, that you are literally a one-man army, for rewards and abilities.

name: Armageddon War: Old Era Wreckers
summary: This is a turn-based historical chess simulation game Players will experience major battles between 1840 and 1920 The game consists of four conquest scripts, each with three different modes and 60 free conquest years to choose from, where the player takes on the role of a commander

name: Arobynn: The First Adventure
summary: Shoot 'Em Up Collector with body tracking and an assortment of guns. Wander through levels of progressing size & difficulty while defending yourself from the AI that inhabit the desolate Geocubic Wastes.

name: Aria Chronicle: Necroknight Amazon Bundle
summary:
This bundle contains the following:
- Aria Chronicle
- Additional Hero, Necroknight
- Additional Hero, Amazon

name: ArcherCat
summary:
Raise your very own Archer Cat and build your character to become the world's number 1 hunter. Engage in an endless ranking battle against the top hunters from all parts of the world for the honorary medal.
And the second story that slowly reveals the interesting secret! Experience newly added items through an adventure in a network cooperation play environment with your friends.

name: Area 51
summary: An LCD game based on the Area 51 arcade game. It was released in 1996.

name: Army Wars Tactics
summary:
Make and manage your own troop.  Hire a mercenary and go onto the battlefield,   and take the honor of victory.  
This new Army wars series will give you the new experience of the modern reinterpretation of classic SRPG genre.

name: Arcane Vale
summary: Arcane Vale is an action packed open-world RPG. Embark on an adventure to discover a long-lost treasure in a vast and dangerous world.

name: Arcade Archives: Fighting Hawk
summary:
The Falcon joins the battle in the skies!

"FIGHTING HAWK" is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1988.
Players pilot the fighter plane FALCON and battle enemies through stages set on plains, icebergs, glaciers, snowfields, and cities, with the ultimate aim of taking down the enemy's latest bomber: the DRAGON BAT!
Build up your reserves of powerful missiles, then unleash them on high-powered foes!

name: Ari In Wonderland: Episode 1
summary: Ari after a long day falls fast asleep and goes back into wonderland. She has no idea why she is back. A lot has changed and the more she thinks about her past it gets more and more blurry. Ari meets some friends on the way to help her find what she wants and to restore wonderland, discover Ari's past along with her.

name: Arthur and the Invisibles
summary:
Directly inspired by world famous film director and writer Luc Besson's upcoming animated film of the same name, the Arthur and the Minimoys game will follow the film's storyline and feature eye-popping graphics and technical innovations.

By taking a very unique approach to its presentation of the Arthur universe and utilising the unique features of the DS hardware, the Nintendo DS version of Arthur and the Minimoys is a different kind of game to the versions for other consoles and PC. Arthur and the Minimoys for DS gleefully portrays the magical world of Arthur through a series of original and entertaining micro games and with an absorbing 'virtual pet simulator' where players are responsible for caring for and breeding 'Mul mull', small, fluffy, flying creatures found in abundance in the world of Arthur.

name: Arcmaze
summary: Arcmaze is a free-to-play browser 3D MMORPG with first-person view and grid-based movement set in dark fantasy medieval world with multiple dungeons. Develop your character and explore the fantasy world of Arcmaze. Learn professions, craft items, build factories and trade to influence the player-driven economy of the game. Solve quests, crawl dungeons, uncover secrets and find treasures. You can play alone or create your guild and siege castles and factories.

name: Arcade Archives: Pro Tennis World Court
summary: A large gathering of people who like tennis!

name: Arsilon
summary: Arsilon - the adventure of astronaut Alice on another planet. After a crash landing, she needs to find and collect the lost spaceship components. On spacious maps, mortal dangers will lie in wait for her. To get to special places, you have to find a non-obvious path.

name: Army Men: Sarge's Heroes 2
summary: Sarge's Heroes 2 starts where Sarge's Heroes left off. It is announced that the capture of Field Marshal Tannenberg will end the war. Since General Plastro has disappeared, it is suggested that he has become a victim of plastrification and been trapped in the real world. The game introduces Bridgette Bleu, a spy for the Blue Nation. She has developed a serum that reverses plastrification. Your job as Sarge and sometimes Vikki is to destroy the serum, eliminate Tan soldiers, and capture Plastro and Tannenburg.

name: Army Men: World War
summary: 16 missions await you and your green army as you wage war against the tan army through true world war environments including beaches, jungles, countrysides and war-torn cities. Each army man has a range of weapons to use, including pistols, flame throwers and the bazooka. You can also use heavy artillery such as tanks, jeeps and boats when normal attacks fail to breach the enemy line.

name: Archipelago
summary: A student project made by Team Patchwork, about sailing and exploring a group of islands.

name: ArmageDoom
summary:
ArmageDoom is a partial TC for Zdoom, GZdoom, Skulltag, or Zandronum.
It features 7 new levels, 12 new weapons, many new enemies (with older ones revamped), new gore, and many new stuff.

name: Arenas of Tanks
summary: Fire up for fun with Arenas of Tanks, a tactical toy tank game! Use skill and strategy to defeat enemy tanks and upgrade your team

name: Arclight Beat
summary: Arclight Beat is a minimalistic rhythm based 3D platformer in which you control various level elements by modifying the music.

name: Arruyo
summary: Arruyo is a 3D first person terror game, where the player is inside a farmhouse with different monsters that will try to kill him/her. To survive and discover the mystery of that place, the player will have to hide from these monsters while investigating the farmhouse.

name: Arsolid Productions
summary: Your dreams and wishes have come true in this immense new world of adventures and stories, in a game like never seen before.

name: Area Man Lives
summary:
Area Man Lives. Or does he? If you could join a radio drama already in progress, talk to the characters and interact with the environments the story painted in your mind, you might find yourself in the world of the area man.

A quirky radio drama unfolds around you in VR while you do your best to keep the radio station humming along as its new DJ. You record commercials, interview callers and try your best to piece together how your actions inside the station impact your listening audience in scenarios so wild they can only live in your imagination.

If it all feels like too much, don’t worry, you’ll have your lonely producer, the resident skeptic, to guide you on your way, not to mention the vaguely British female voice inside your head.

When an unusual area man calls into the station asking for your help, you have to act fast. Will you trust the area man, or do your best to thwart his plans? Is there anything you can do to save the area man from himself?

name: Arma Reforger
summary: Powered by the new Enfusion engine, Arma Reforger lets you fight for supremacy over 51 km2 of incredible island terrain in an authentic Cold War setting, or create unique scenarios in real-time with the Game Master curation mode. Return to Everon, the war-driven microstate from the hit game that started it all, Arma: Cold War Assault.

name: Arrow Match
summary: A hyper-casual match two game for Playdate

name: Archery
summary:
Archery for Playdate

This is a simple game. Can you hit the target with your bow?

When you hit the target, you don't use up any arrows. If you can keep hitting the target, it will speed up.

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 3 - Super Sonic Gold
summary: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 3 is a game console which is part of the Play TV Legends series. There is no cartridge port but four games are available which include: Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic Spinball, and Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine.

name: Arth Island
summary: Gather resources, set up a camp, choose your class, level up your skills, don't die of cold or starvation and battle the other failed experiments to survive as long as possible on this procedurally generated island

name: Ares Virus2
summary: The "Ares Virus" series of games is widely acclaimed for its unique combat and individual style of painting. Now that the sequel is back, it will give you an unprecedented experience.

name: Artigo
summary: "Artigo" is a daily browser game where your objective is to guess the subject of a random obfuscated Wikipedia article. Guess words to reveal all of their occurrences in the text. Figure out the article title to win.

name: Arcadia
summary: In this highly addictive top-down arcade shoot-em-up from 1982, originally for the ZX Spectrum, defend yourself from wave upon wave of deadly alien combatants using your Ion Thrust Drive and dual Plasma Disruptors.

name: Arcade Blast
summary: The Arcade Blast is a Sega Mega Drive console-on-a-chip created by AtGames. The unit is shaped like a Mega Drive controller and has 12 built-in Mega Drive games.

name: Arcade Archives: Trio the Punch
summary: Trio the Punch" is a 1990 side-scrolling action game featuring three playable characters navigating through surreal and comedic stages filled with bizarre enemies and unpredictable scenarios. Players punch, kick, and use special abilities to progress through unconventional levels that blend humor with chaotic gameplay. The game is known for its eccentric design, including transformations, mini-games, and absurd visual elements that create a unique arcade experience.

name: Arcade Portable
summary:
The Arcade Portable is a handheld Sega Mega Drive console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It was the second handheld to be produced by AtGames, following the Arcade Gamer Portable, and was bettered by the Arcade Ultimate.

Like many of AtGames' products, the true name for this handheld is not known. AtGames' website calls it the Arcade Portable, but the device was renamed by various distributors. Packaging calls it the Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player. The system was manufactured by AtGames who distributed across Asia. Blaze Europe distributed across Europe and Tectoy brought it to Brazil as the Mega Drive Portátil.

name: Arcade Ultimate
summary:
The Arcade Ultimate is a handheld Sega Mega Drive console on a chip created by AtGames. It can be seen as an enhanced version of the Arcade Portable.

Like its predecessors, the name of this product is disputed and varies considerably between regions and distributors. While AtGames call it the Arcade Ultimate on their website, most packaging designs call the system the Gopher, with Sega Mega Drive Arcade Ultimate Portable, Sega Genesis Ultimate Portable Game Player, Sega Genesis Firecore Portable Player, and Sega Mega Drive Firecore Portable Player also in use. In Brazil the system is known as the MD Play.

name: Arcade Ultimate Portable
summary: The Blaze version changes Ristar for Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball.

name: Arcade Ultimate: Street of Rage - Limited Edition
Arcade Ultimate Portable Video Game Player
summary: This version has 18 games instead of the original 20, having some of them replaced by Streets of Rage and Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
summary: The Arcade Gamer Classic is a Mega Drive "console on a chip" originally produced by AtGames for the Asian market with 10-20 built-in games and distributed in the UK by Blaze Europe and France by H&B. It is similar to the Mega Drive Twin Pads, except it consists of a single pad. The number of built-in games varies between releases.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
summary: The 15 games version of the Arcade Gamer Classic.

name: Arcade Gamer
summary:
The Arcade Gamer, also known as the Poga and as the Master System Portátil in Brazil, is a Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear console on a chip manufactured by AtGames.

The Arcade Gamer has been distributed by several companies under different names and colour schemes, in both 20 and 30 game variants. All share the same plastic shell - a controller (also seen with the Mega Drive Twin Pads) with an extra C button, despite no Master System or Game Gear games ever making use of it. The same shell was used for the Mega Drive-based Arcade Gamer Classic.

name: Arcade Legends: OutRun 2019
summary: The Arcade Legends OutRun 2019, known in the US as the Play TV Legends Outrun 2019, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys. It is a consolised version of OutRun 2019.

name: Arcade Legends: Menacer
summary:
The Arcade Legends Menacer, also known in the US as the Play TV Legends Menacer, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys. It is a effectively a consolised light-gun with the Menacer 6-in-1 Mega Drive cartridge built-in.

As with prior light guns, the Arcade Legends Menacer only functions correctly on a CRT television.

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis
summary: The Arcade Legends Sega Mega Drive, known as the Arcade Legends Sega Genesis or Play TV Legends Sega Genesis in North America and the Mega Drive Play TV in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.

name: Arcade Archives: Flipull
summary:
"FLIPULL" is a puzzle game released by TAITO in 1989.
Match up blocks with the same pattern within the time limit to eliminate them!
Bring the number of blocks on each stage below the clear condition limit to proceed to the next stage.

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 2
summary: The Arcade Legends Sega Mega Drive Volume II, known as the Arcade Legends Sega Genesis Volume 2 or Play TV Legends Sega Genesis Volume 2 in North America and the Mega Drive Play TV 2 in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.

name: Arcade Legends Sensible Soccer Plus
summary: The Arcade Legends Sensible Soccer Plus is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys and Codemasters. It contains the Mega Drive versions of Sensible Soccer, Cannon Fodder and Mega Lo Mania.

name: Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition
summary:
The Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition, known as the Play TV Legends Street Fighter 2 in the US and the Mega Drive Play TV 3 in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.

The system contains Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition and the Mega Drive version of Ghouls'n Ghosts built-in. It also comes with two controllers.

name: Arcade Master
summary: The Arcade Master is a console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It is a console built into an arcade stick, with a directional stick, six face buttons and 26 built-in Sega Mega Drive games. It has no cartridge slot, but can run games via SD cards.

name: Arcade Master Deluxe
summary: The Arcade Master Deluxe is a console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It is a console built into an arcade stick, with a directional stick, six face buttons and 26 built-in Sega Mega Drive games. It has no cartridge slot, but can run games via SD cards.

name: Arcade Nano Sonic
summary: The Arcade Nano Series is a collection of RCA jack "Mega Drive-on-a-chip" units manufactured by AtGames. The console itself is built into a very small joystick that can be carried on a keychain or keyring using the strap attached to it. The entire console is powered by only one AAA battery (sometimes included), and it comes in an assortment of eight different variations, each with its own color scheme and game selection. Each package contains only the console (which doubles as the controller) and a mini-USB mono A/V output cable. Like many other newer clones, they are officially licensed by Sega.

name: Arcade Gamer Portable
summary:
The Arcade Gamer Portable, also known as the AtGames Gear, is a Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear console on a chip. It was manufactured by AtGames, though has been distributed across the world by various companies, including Blaze Europe as the BlazeGear, and Tectoy as the Master System Portátil.

The console contains 30 built-in Sega Game Gear and Master System games and allows extra games to be played via the SD card slot. It uses emulation software to run the games, and does not have a traditional cartridge slot. It can also be connected to a television to play the games on a large screen instead of the built-in LCD screen, however it will only output a PAL signal.

name: Art School Pocket
summary:
Art, that world full of scoundrels.
But how does one become an artist? Is it enough to be a face and rich parents?... almost. That will be valid for some chosen people but the rest of the really talented people need to study and prove that they are artists with a degree.

Put yourself in the non-exciting role of an art school student and get your diploma alone and exclusively using your creative skills.

name: Arma 3: Art of War Charity Pack
summary: Admire splendid community artwork, recover priceless cultural property, and proudly wear your parade uniform in the Arma 3 Art of War charity DLC.

name: Arcade Archives: The Tower of Druaga
summary:
THE TOWER OF DRUAGA is an action RPG game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1984.
Go upstairs one after another while getting various items hidden on each floor of the huge tower controlled by DRUAGA, and rescue your lover KI who was trapped on the top floor.

name: Arcade Flight
summary: You're controlling a plane that is going forward in an infinite and randomized space filled with barriers. Use your reflexes to dodge the incoming barriers in high speed. Collect coins along the way to later spend them in the store section.

name: Arafinn Kontor
summary: The Arafinn Kontor is the central hub of the Arafinn Universe. Arafinn is a dark high-fantasy world full of epic tales and legends. Dwarves, elves, humans, giants, the orcish Uturi, and many other beings inhabiting a world in constant change, full of war, conflicts, and unexpected alliances.

name: Armed Zone
summary: Armed Zone is an intensive Third Person Cover Shooter game blended with team tactics and diverse gameplays. Experience the furious combat on ever-changing modern battlefields, you can play both Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes.

name: Arali
summary: Fight your way through hordes of enemies, rescue the five forest spirits and bring them back to their tree, and lift the curse plaguing the Enchanted Forest!

name: Arma 3 Apex Edition
summary: Experience the best military sandbox game the PC has to offer with the Arma 3 Apex Edition, which includes the Arma 3 base game, the highly-rated Arma 3 Apex expansion, and a variety of other DLC packs containing a number of additional weapons, vehicles, gear, and scenarios.

name: Arbiter
summary: Arbiter is an intense, multiplayer arena shooter in VR. Blast yourself around the battle grid with an assortment of weapons in destructible environments. Each round is a new arbitration with players representing a side procedurally decided upon by the all-powerful Arbiter AI.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle
summary: The return of the iconic block breaker game from prestigious Japanese video game company Taito!

name: Ara: History Untold
summary:
Build a nation and lead your people throughout history to the pinnacles of human achievement as you explore new lands, develop arts and culture, conduct diplomacy, and go head-to-head with your rivals to prove you are the greatest ruler ever known.

Featuring both familiar and innovative gameplay mechanics, Ara: History Untold delivers an evolution in historical grand strategy with no pre-set paths to victory, leading to endless possibilities. Your choices will define the world you create, your experience, and your legacy.

name: Art Girl 2
summary: Relaxing puzzle game, artistic photo beauty, let you have a good mood

name: Art your brains
summary: Art your brains - a puzzle game in which you have to play as a mysterious man who doesn't understand how and where he ended up. A painted world with the same drawn allies and enemies. Spend your free time mastering interesting mechanics, fighting and passing unique levels.

name: Around the World
summary: The Hidden Object Search Game for Kids and Toddlers

name: Arcade Archives: Motos
summary: "MOTOS" is an action game released by NAMCO in 1985. Take control of the MOTORSPANNER armored vehicle and ram all the SPACE BEES to knock them off the base. Choose from 2 types of power-up parts before starting a stage to increase your ability to push enemies, or to increase your jumping ability. Try to pick the one that suits that stage!

name: Armored Combat Tank Warfare Online
summary: Battle in a World War 2 setting against millions of other players and be the hero!

name: Arcade Archives: Space Seeker
summary: "SPACE SEEKER" is a hybrid strategy and shooting game released by TAITO in 1981. The game has you battling for victory against ever-approaching waves of enemy air forces in first-person 3D, and mobile fortresses in side-scrolling 2D. Use the map to track…

name: Arena of the Myths
summary:
"Arena of the Myths" is an action shooter fangame project to HololiveEN.

Features
Shooting through out 4 stages, fighting with the other team to gain morale points for victory!
5 characters available to play Kiara, Calli, Gura, Ame and Ina.
Fight Arena Boss to unlock new stages
Catch all the KFP members (Chicken) and save them for further in-game characters shop update!

name: Armored Battalion
summary: Armored battalion is a overlooking shooting game, which is different from the current tank battle mode. It is more inclined to the arcade. There are two battle modes: the battle mode. You can only use tanks that have fought in history. RPG mode. You can choose chassis and artillery freely.

name: Ara Ngc 6397
summary:
ARA NGC 6397 is an action-adventure game where you take the role of an undercover agent wh must unravel the plot of conspiracy of an un unpopular governing alliance that hast taken over the Earth.

Gameplay is mixed between rail shooter and classic point 'n click graphic adventure across three different levels.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Ceptor
summary: "Thunder Ceptor" is a shooter released by Namco in 1986. Your mission is to safely return to the Federation Base through the energy corridors that connect star systems.

name: Artifacts of Eyru
summary: Artifacts of Eyru is a rogue-lite first person shooter with RPG elements. Play as 4 classes as you delve into the dungeons of Eyru, claim powerful artifacts, and unravel the mysteries of the planet.

name: Aria and the Crystal Kingdom
summary: Wield cards as your weapon in this deck-building fantasy RPG inspired by Slay the Spire and Paper Mario! Battle against enemies in strategic turn-based combat, travel across a hand-drawn world, customize your deck, and grow strong enough to face whatever lies ahead!

name: Argument Wars
summary:
Argue real Supreme Court cases with Argument Wars!
Ever tried to win a disagreement? In Argument Wars, you will try out your persuasive abilities by arguing a real Supreme Court case. The other lawyer is your competition. Whoever uses the strongest arguments wins!

name: Archery Escape
summary: Use your best skills to deliver nice monsters from the ropes they are attached to. Throw arrows to cut ropes but beware not hitting monsters. You will have to develop strategies and overcome each levels tricks.

name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend - Treasure Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- The game
- Visual Book
- Original Soundtrack CD
- Crystal Frame Stand
- Cleaning Cloth

name: Arsonist Heaven
summary: Strap on a jet pack and grab a flamethrower to hunt down monstrous foes!

name: Arcade Archives: Rabio Lepus
summary: "Rabio Lepus" is a shooting game released by Video System in 1987.

name: Art7
summary: 1-bit Art Gallery for the Playdate console

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Saber
summary:
A powerful legend of immortal dragons.

"DRAGON SABER" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1990. This title allows players to charge powerful shots by leaving the shot button untouched, as well as switch to a variety of other dragons with change items. Use these to make your way through stages and take down bosses!

name: Arcano: El juego de Galicia
summary: Educational game about the 4 provinces of Galicia.

name: Arctic Zone
summary: A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

name: Arcade Archives: Roller Jammer
summary: Win your way up the ranks in a variety of races as you work to become a pro roller skater! The competition will call for more than just speed - you'll also need to be tough enough to hang in there and knock your opponents off the track!

name: Arcade Archives: Chack'n Pop
summary: Take control of Chack'n and race against the clock to take back the hearts imprisoned by the Monstas and hidden throughout the labyrinth! Use bombs to defeat the Monstas that chase you, trying to swallow you whole!

name: Arden: The World of William Shakespeare
summary:
Developed by an Indiana University team led by Edward Castronova, Arden was intended as a platform both for conducting research on economics and social systems in virtual worlds and for educating users about Shakespeare.

The project was discontinued due to inadequate funding and dissatisfaction with the gameplay, with a release of what had been completed as a custom Neverwinter Nights module primarily based on Richard III.

name: Aria's Melody
summary: Aria's Melody is a 2D action-adventure game inspired by retro classics. In this game you will travel across a vast world in search of answers to the darkness that plagues the lands.

name: Archetypes: The Rite of Passage
summary: Discover the depth of your personality while journeying along the path of initiation as the young Viking Olaf. Every choice will impact your environment, and contribute to a map of your archetypical psychology. Embrace your inner warrior, lover, chieftain, and druid - and change the world!

name: Archmage Ricka
summary: In order to retrieve the illegal property embezzled by the evil Lord, Ricka received a mission to capture the Lord. But it was a trap. She fell into a dungeon arranged by the Lord in advance. Although the demons in the dungeon are weak, the existence of various traps makes it difficult to escape!

name: ArcRunner
summary: ArcRunner is a beautiful Cyberpunk-styled action rogue-lite set in the far future on board a huge space station where the controlling AI has gone insane, and its up to you to traverse the Arc to find and destroy it.

name: Ardent Azur
summary: Join Azur and Selen in an epic journey to find who's spreading chaos in Lunocea in this simple but yet deep turn-based strategy game !

name: Armored Lab Force Vulvehicles
summary: Raze the road less traveled with your Vulvehicle, the ultimate all-purpose armored combat machine! Whether flying through the sky, or burrowing deep underground, these gals stop at nothing to blast through terrain and enemies alike in this comical action STG!

name: A Rum Case in Fogtown
summary: Puppet detectives Sherblock and Blockson are on the case to resolve a string of mysterious sabotage against Fogtown’s most beloved pubs. You control the story in this madcap comedy joyride!

name: Artsy Pixel
summary: Relaxing game about coloring pixelart images.

name: Artsy Pixel
summary: Color by number type of gameplay with over 280 unique images split into 7 categories is sure to make you relaxed. Achieve a ZEN like calmness, satisfaction and a simple feeling of fulfilment after each picture.

name: Arcade Archives: Dig Dug
summary: "Dig Dug" is an action game released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1982. Take control of Dig Dug and to spear monsters and pop them with your harpoon. Use rocks to beat multiple monsters at once, collect the vegetable score items, and work to set a new high score!

name: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
summary: Class is in session—how much have you forgotten since grammar school? Step up to the podium and put your smarts on the line to see if you’re smarter than a 5th grader! Enjoy game show excitement—just like the show, from the classmates’ peer pressure, to Jeff Foxworthy’s wisecracks. Test your knowledge with 28 tough grade school subjects with over 3,000 challenging questions, which you can answer with help from your 5 classmates.

name: Arcade Waifu
summary: A relaxing puzzle game with girls who love games.

name: Arc Intelligence
summary: Arc Intelligence is an adventure strategy game for the PC about an artificial intelligence that tries to take over the world. What would you do if your mind was inside a computer? Do you have what it takes to become the arch intelligence in this arced adventure?

name: Arcade Paradise: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: Welcome to Arcade Paradise, the 90’s-fuelled retro arcade adventure. You play as Ashley, and you’ve just been given the keys to the family laundromat. Rather than washing rags for a living, you decide to turn the laundromat into the ultimate arcade. Choose from over 35 games to be in the arcade inspired by three decades of gaming – all of which are playable with high scores to set. Stay one step ahead of your father, manage and invest profits, and build your very own Arcade Paradise!

name: Arcade Archives: Gun & Frontier
summary: Gun & Frontier is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1990. Pilot the earth's latest fighter plane, Desperado, against the space pirates, Wild Lizard!

name: Arcade Archives: Metro-Cross
summary: "Metro-Cross" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1985. Avoid obstacles and slip zones, and make full use of skateboards and springboard to reach the goal in time.

name: Ars Notoria
summary: Explore the fantasy world of Ars Notoria, a survival-action RPG set inside an open-world sandbox that lets you hunt powerful possessed creatures. Strike out on your own or play together with friends to build a sprawling faction, utilizing deep crafting mechanics and strategic recruiting of allies.

name: Archery Land
summary: Archery Land is a single, multiplayer VR shooting game, and Enjoy the thrilling feeling of hitting the target in our Archery Land by aiming the bow at the wide land.

name: Arcobaleno! Portable
summary: Arcobaleno! Portable is a port of Arcobaleno for PSP.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Volleyball
summary: "Super Volleyball" is a sports game released by Video System in 1989 . It features techniques like delayed attacks and back attacks despite its simple controls, for high-level back-and-forth matches. A title that truly captures the fun of volleyball. The…

name: Armen Noir Portable
summary:
Port from PS2 with major scenario corrections and new endings added.
System voices, screenshot function, and auto save/load added.
New sprites added for previously unshown characters.

name: Armed Fantasia: To the End of the Wilderness
summary: Created by veteran game designer Akifumi Kaneko, Armed Fantasia is an RPG built as a spiritual successor to the classic Wild Arms franchise.

name: Arch Rivals
summary: The NES port of Arch Rivals.

name: Arcade Archives: Pac & Pal
summary:
"Pac & Pal" is an action game released in 1983. Turn over cards and eat fruit and special targets to earn score points.
Eat special targets to temporarily freeze enemies, and attack them.
The new character MIL will pick up fruit and cards, so touch her to get them back.

name: Arrow
summary: Move the arrows and collect the dots, but you can only move the arrows if their direction matches your moves. You will also find challenges such as teleporters and rotators that will put you thinking and make this game a real challenge for your brain.

name: Arithal
summary: Arithal: Chapter Ildsted is a classic adventure game combined with turn-based battle mechanics, set in a dark-but-lighthearted world wreathed in snow and beset by monsters from the depths of the ocean. Survive at all costs.

name: Armoured Cavalry: Operation Varkiri
summary: Double joystick / mecha / roguelike, 9 types of mecha with different characteristics, matched with 100 skills, drive powerful war machines!

name: Arise from Shadows
summary: Lost, isolated, you must find the truth by exploring the remains of an ancient extinct civilization. With your animal possession abilities, you have all the tools to find the answers to your questions.

name: Arena Clash
summary: Packed with epic characters and intense vehicle combat, Arena Clash places your Hero in 15v15 battles where you fight for humanity’s survival. The battle for tomorrow begins today!

name: Arcade Dungeon
summary: Arcade Dungeon is an exciting variety game where 1-4 players can enjoy tons of arcade inspired mini-games together online or locally.

name: Arcade Archives: Champion Wrestler
summary: Champion Wrestler is an action game released by Taito in 1989. Become a professional wrestler, intent on making obtaining fame and fortune on their way to becoming the champion! Choose a wrestler from the 8 available and utilize their own unique stats …

name: Arise + What Lies in the Multiverse Bundle
summary: Some games just tug on those heart strings. We’ve packaged two stories that touch on what lies in the past and what lies ahead. Join these characters as one tries to fix a world he's broken, while the other relives a past world to remember what once was.

name: Artificial Extinction 2
summary: Defend your base by strategically placing autonomous weaponry. Upgrade your defenses by mining resources. Unlock new tech to build more powerful weapons. Expand your territory to strengthen your defenses. When under attack from enemy Mechs, pick up your rifle and get in the fight!

name: Archenemy: Lunafall
summary: An era of "peace" just liberated from the powerful ruling of The Church, A doomsday prophecy of "the fall of the moon", A struggle and intrigue around the "last Saint". "Archenemy: Lunafall" is a romantic and suspenseful visual novel, which will tell a story about "self" and...

name: Arata Haunted Asylum
summary: Arata Haunted Asylum is a 2D Top Down Survival horror game based on the story of a haunted asylum located in Japan. You will investigate the asylum for the proof of the paranormal.

name: ArcheWorld
summary: ArcheWorld is the first seamless, open-world PC MMORPG that utilizes NFT(Non-Fungible Token) based on blockchain technology. Battle enemies and explore a wide world across a selection of classes and areas!

name: Archrebel: Tactics
summary: Archrebel is a sci-fi turn-based strategy war game, strongly inspired by the classic Rebelstar released back in 1986. In Archrebel, players can control a few dozens of units in a grid-based map, performing actions limited by a classic action-point system similar to the one found in the X-COM series.

name: Arid Jared
summary: A lone cactus sets out to save his desert and his friends. Take down bosses, gain and spend experience points, and uncover the mysteries of the desert in this whacky Arcade/RPG hybrid title.

name: Archery Simulator
summary: Your mission is to became a true professional in this sport. At first you will practice very simple shots to see your real skills. After some practice, all kinds of challenges await you that seem complicated even to some skilled people.

name: Arcade Archives: Rompers
summary: "Rompers" is an action puzzle game. Control the hero CHAP, and evade monster attacks and collect all of the keys in the mazes. Knock down the stone walls with all your might to beat the monsters.

name: Arthur Yahtzee: The Curse of Hell's Cheesecake
summary: In this comedic espionage game, you play as Agent Arthur Yahtzee of the Special Secret Service. Your mission is to stop the most evil and sadistic human in the multiverse, Doctor Diablo, from ever using Hell’s Cheesecake to return to his home dimension.

name: Arcane Arts Academy 2
summary: Return to the world of magic for another academic year!

name: Archeon CD-i Quiz
summary: Netherlands only CD-i quiz based on on the archaeological open air and living museum Archeon in Alphen aan den Rijn.

name: Arcana Famiglia: La storia della Arcana Famiglia - Ancora
summary: A port for PlayStation Vita with improved graphics and added scenes.

name: Arcana Famiglia Collezione! Piccola Amore
summary: An app available for purchase on iOS and Android.

name: Arcade Archives: The Return of Ishtar
summary:
The sequel to "The Tower of Druaga" is finally here!

"The Return of ISHTAR" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1986.
The story takes place after the overthrow of DRUAGA. The tower has lost DRUAGA's magic power and is now in its original ruins, and the monsters have become more ferocious. Take control of KI and GIL and try to escape from THE TOWER OF DRUAGA, where you no longer even know the way out.

name: Arcade Archives: Assault
summary:
Assault is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
The first title of the SYSTEM II game circuit board with new features such as "zoom in, zoom out, and rotate functions".
Take control of your tank and battle invaders to reclaim your homeland.

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.

name: Army of Ruin
summary:
Army of Ruin is an auto-shooter in which you guide legendary heroes on a quest to defeat the Armies of Evil.

Get hold of a deadly arsenal capable of slaying hundreds of enemies in seconds, and you may have a shot at defeating the deadly Army Generals!

name: Archaeogem
summary: Hats up and whips out; the jungle's mysteries await! Explore lush biomes, use your trusty whip to extract wild flowers' mystic powers, and collect rare gems in this dynamic precision-platformer. Unearth archaeological marvels and become a legend - if you make it out alive!

name: Arabia Palace Builder
summary: In Arabia Builder you will get the chance to prove yourself as the most skilled artisan in the medieval Middle East. Repair palaces, dig aqueducts, tend to beautiful gardens and make the realm fit for a sultan!

name: Arcade Classics: Pac-Man
summary: Tabletop arcade machine with a monochrome screen. Features the Eat & Run mode from the Pac-Man Coleco tabletop.

name: Arcade Classics: Ms. Pac-Man
summary: Tabletop arcade machine with a color screen.

name: Arcade Gold featuring Pac-Man
summary: Features Pac-Man, Pac-Man Plus, Pac & Pal, Super Pac-Man, Galaxian, Bosconian, Dig Dug, and New Rally-X.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Limited Edition
summary:
Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Limited Edition includes:
- Game: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle
- 3D Lenticular
- 16-Page Instruction Booklet
- Exclusive Taito Classic In-Game Background
- Digital Original Soundtrack

name: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?
summary: The Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? Plug-and-Play game is is based off the game show of the same name. It was released in 2006 by Jakks Pacific.

name: Are You Afraid of the Dark
summary: Are you afraid of the dark? you should be. Enjoy this horror game that thrives on your fear of darkness and unknown.

name: Arrogation: Unlight of Day
summary: Arrogation: Unlight of Day brings you a mysterious exotic horror adventure. You will play as a lone reporter searching for his lost family in an abandoned village from 80s China. Beyond darkness, you will find nightmarish creatures and secrets from the long lost Imperial Japanese Army.

name: Area: Zero
summary: Show your fighting skills and teamwork! In the new Slovak Sci-Fi game, you will find yourself in the shoes of an operator or a monster. Your work in the skin of the operator will fulfill various tasks on the map and avoid the bloodthirsty monster.

name: Arcade Archives: Toy Pop
summary: "TOY POP" is an action game released by NAMCO （Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1986. You control PINO and ACHA, who pop out of a toy box, and collect the hearts hidden in the box (stage) to open the door and advance.

name: Arab Drift Cars
summary: Start playing the Arab style, specifically Saudi Arabia, in the open world. You can explore, drift, race and much more

name: Ar Luminae
summary: Ar Luminae is a single-level PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port that was released in November 2020. It was designed by Aurelius and Kaito and uses several music tracks: "Wolverine" and "Atomic" by James Paddock (Jimmy), "Fission Dance" by Brayden Hart (AD_79), and a MIDI rendition of "Gerudo Valley" from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It received one of the 2020 Cacowards. The map integrates the gameplay changes of the Supercharge mod.

name: Arctic Incident
summary: The action takes place in a scientific complex, which is located somewhere in the Arctic. In the caves, scientists have found a new form of life, which is resistant to frost and incredibly aggressive to intrusion. The staff at the complex do not have sufficient means to counter it. As a consequence they are forced to ask for help from the military, but the military, apparently, have their own plans for the incident.

name: Arc Style: Sangokushi Pinball
summary:
Arc Style: Sangokushi Pinball is a pinball game set during the Three Kingdoms period in ancient China.

As well as a "Standard" mode where you progress through the stages, it includes a "Boss Attack" mode where you can go head-to-head with the mighty generals of the Three Kingdoms era who fought in "Standard", and "Library" where you can view information about unlocked events and warlords. High scores can be viewed in "Ranking" as well as an online leaderboard.

name: Arcade Archives: Touki Denshou Angel Eyes
summary:
The player must win fierce battles against powerful opponents for the title of "Archangel".

"TOUKI DENSHOU ANGEL EYES" is a fighting game released by TECMO in 1996. The player must win fierce battles against powerful opponents for the title of "Archangel".
You can use super special moves and special techniques to gain an advantage in battle when your emotional gauge reaches its peak.

name: Aretha
summary: Aretha is a top-down fantasy RPG in the Aretha trilogy, developed by Japan Art Media and published by Yanoman. It was only released in Japan.

name: Arcade Archives: Ordyne
summary:
"Ordyne" is a shooting game released by Namco in 1988.
Players take control of Doctor Tomari and his assistant CHIN to rescue the doctor's lover KANA from the villainous Kubota.
The key to the game is using the crystals you get from defeating enemies to buy powerful weapons.

name: Artifacts and Antiquity
summary:
After an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal from her previous line of work, our protagonist finds herself working security at the Stahl & Co. Shipping Company.
But soon a collection of strange artifacts cause the situation to take a dire turn...

name: Arcade vs Player
summary: For a long time the arcade machines were won and forgotten in the corners of bars, but the time for the arcade machines revenge has arrived. Prepare your coins.

name: Arena Chaos
summary: Arena Chaos is a 2D platform shooter where you have to fend off attacks.

name: Ariel's Daily Grind
summary: After falling miserably into debt, Ariel summons her resolve and starts working jobs to grind her way out of financial ruin.

name: ARK: Dinosaur Discovery
summary:
Take a journey through the epochs in this family-friendly educational experience that invites players to learn about the fascinating prehistoric creatures which inspired ARK: Survival Evolved.

Explore The Island across land, sea and air where you can discover 64 dinosaurs, all based on their real life, prehistoric counterparts. Ride a huge Tyrannosaurus Rex across the beautiful landscape, soar above the tree tops on the back of a Pteranodon, and even glide through the oceans while riding an ancient Megalodon Shark!

Unlock each creature’s Dino Book for fun-filled science facts and illustrations, all voiced by Madeleine Madden (ARK: The Animated Series, The Wheel of Time) as HLN-A. Cap off your adventure with a custom-built base, choosing from a variety of over 30 building pieces unlocked throughout your adventures.

Can you discover all of the Dinosaurs and become the Ultimate Explorer?

name: Arma 3: Art of War Charity Pack
summary: Admire splendid community artwork, recover priceless cultural property, and proudly wear your parade uniform in the Arma 3 Art of War charity DLC.

name: Armored Warfare: BMPT Standard Pack
summary: The BMPT Mod.2000 Tier 8 Premium Tank Destroyer is now available to improve your in-game progression

name: Armored Warfare: Falcon General Pack
summary: General’s Bundle: Falcon

name: Armored Warfare: Free Globalization Pack
summary: Claim your free Armored Warfare gift, celebrating the launch of the Global Server. Available for a limited time only!

name: Armored Warfare: K21 General Pack
summary: General’s Bundle: K21

name: Armored Warfare: Revolution General Pack
summary: General’s Bundle: Revolution

name: Arena Champion
summary: "Arena Champion" is a side-scrolling 2D arena shooter with frenzied dynamics and hundreds of armed enemies.

name: Arcadie: Second-Born
summary: In this interactive tale of love and war, carve a place for yourself in a world that has disregarded you for too long. Be the force of reason that your kingdom needs, or perpetuate its reputation as a force of destruction. Find love and weave friendships, or cast it away for the sake of retribution.

name: Artifice: War Tactics
summary: Artifice: War tactics is a turn-based strategy all about setting up tripwires and executing killer combos! A game of anticipation, deduction and outwitting your enemy at every turn. Play as one of four kingdoms in an epic campaign for territory, champions, relics and the throne of the Immortal king.

name: Arcanima: Mist of Oblivion
summary: Awake your anima in this action RPG combining Hack N Slash combat with JRPG mechanics! Join the anima user 'Juno' in her journey to clear the Mist of Oblivion, shape your anima through your actions and find answers before all meaning is lost. Willpower is your only limit!

name: A Role to Play
summary:
In A Role to Play, an armored fellow of varying potential names must escort a princess through a besieged kingdom to safety, accompanied by several colorful, non-human companions.

Of course, that's only half the story.

Our real protagonist, Danny, has spent the past year recovering from a life-threatening incident that left him severely injured. Nearing his 21st birthday, and with some pressuring from his father, he leaves the solitude of his home to meet up with a local group of tabletop gamers at his town's library. A newcomer to tabletop, Danny finds that his new friends are about as unusual as the characters they play in-game.

name: Arcade Archives: Itazura Tenshi
