summary:
Draw beautiful constellations in the night sky,
capture the heart of a celestial maiden in your hand!

name: Arcade Machine: Gopher's Revenge
summary: Gophers are here to avenge their brothers massacred by humans in cruel arcade machines! Your mission is simple: face the attack and take as many gophers with you as you can!

name: Arcade Paradise: CyberDance EuroMix
summary: CyberDance EuroMix is the rave focused follow up to Arcade Paradise’s smash hit dancing sensation, CyberDance - with updated graphics and next generation widescreen technology.

name: Arcade Paradise: Empathy DLC
summary: Time to grasp the handles and ascend the mountain whilst avoiding being hit by rocks from unbelievers. The longer you survive the more points you score. Forsake loneliness. Feel togetherness. Ascend. How high can you go?

name: Arcade Paradise: Smoke 'em DLC
summary: Aim. Fire. Reload. It’s time to test your sharpshooting skills against the clock in this supremely fun high scoring 2 player shooting range.

name: Arcade Archives: Baraduke
summary:
"Baraduke" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1985.
The peaceful, friendly world of paccet has been attacked by the evil Octy!
Make your way through Baraduke, the underground Octy citadel beneath paccet, and use your Wave Gun and Shield to take out the Octy!

name: Aren't You Overcompensating for Something?
summary:
I can't stop my mind from coming up with new ideas.

Constantly, be it during work or while trying to sleep, I have to stop what I'm doing and note down the new ideas that came to me out of nowhere.

Restless creativity. Never-ending tension for not creating more. The feeling of 'I could be writing right now' follows me at all times.

So why is it that I can't write?

name: Arcade Archives: Metal Black
summary: "Metal Black" is a shooting game released by Taito in 1991. Set on a world on the brink of destruction at the hands of interstellar invaders, players take control of the secret fighter Black Fly and take the battle to the enemy.

name: Around Us
summary: Around Us is a 2d party game centered around the childhood game “Hide And Seek” or also known as “Prop Hunt”. You can play among your friends where players are randomly selected to be a hunter or a hider.

name: Aroma
summary: This is a simple story about young people, about the aroma of youth and the smells of life, which can so easily be cut short by a fatal accident.Or maybe at the behest of a heartless fate.

name: Army of Tentacles: Assault on Rainbow Unicorn Island
summary: Classic story of monster boy falls in love with human girl, and then there's a war. Train and fight with the power of love and weapons in this party-based RPG!

name: Archwar: Heroes and Demons
summary: A 3v3 MOBA style game for mobile devices with dynamic combo attacks and innovative game modes that ranges from capture the flag style combat to round elimination. Play to unlock more heroes and earn gems to purchase costumes and content for characters. Be immersed in the lore and the universe of Archwar: Heroes and Demons.

name: Armed With Wings 2
summary: Embark on a journey to reclaim your lost throne, seeking out the 4 Blades of Eden. Its destructive power is the key to defeating the new emperor, Armed with Wings.

name: Arcade Archives: Galaxian
summary:
"Galaxian" is a shooting game released by Namco in 1979.
You control a Galaxip and shoot aliens that approach you in eerie curves. Aliens during the assault double your score, and the flagship (Galboss) can be shot at in turn, starting with the escort (red alien), for a higher score.
Deftly dodge enemy aliens and destroy the large formation.

name: ArduGods
summary: Your goal in this game is to gather faith and a cult following to become stronger and be able to battle the rest of the Gods, to reclaim your place among them as the most powerful ever, and it all starts by raising prayers with your Arduboy buttons.

name: Ardu-man
summary: Re-live the nostalgic glory of games like Pac-Man and Lock ‘n’ Chase (with a few less pixels…) right on your Arduboy!

name: ArduGolf: 18-Hole Mini Golf
summary: ArduGolf is a 3D Mini Golf game created for the ArduBoy.

name: Arduminer
summary: Mining, crafting and combat on your arduboy. Explore 64 procedurally generated levels, conquer dungeons and upgrade your kit to survive progressively stronger enemies.

name: Ariokan
summary:
Ariokan is an online card game in which the meta (= the most frequently played decks) is continuously evolving because players can create their own cards.
This means that all decks are different, as all players can create cards tailored around their strategy or that counter the mainstream ones.
It doesn't matter if you're a new player or a veteran: there's always something new to create and experiment in Ariokan. Craft your victory!

name: Ardusweeper
summary: A simple minesweeper game developed for the Arduboy.

name: Ardynia
summary: Ardynia is a Zelda-styled adventure for the Arduboy.

name: Arkero VR
summary: Arkero VR is an archery based fantasy series with items that you can trade, sell or collect forever. Players take on the role of Ranged, Melee, or Magic heroes to explore the dark dungeons and sweeping vistas of the realm all while defeating enemies and collecting valuable loot. We have a dragon!

name: ArenaMania
summary: Can you survive the challenges of the Arena? The progressively difficult levels and their hundreds of enemies are just looking for a way to hunt you down. Your only help is your experience and your spells leveling up after each level. If you can pick them up…

name: Arcade Archives: Tetris the Grand Master
summary:
Arcade Archives: Tetris The Grand Master is a puzzle game released by Arika in 1998.
Test yourself against players around the globe! This version features a rank certification system that analyzes your speed, accuracy, and technique to rank players into 19 skill levels!

name: Arcade Crossy Road
summary: Crossy Road Arcade is a 2 player video redemption game. Players must navigate their way across busy roads, train tracks, and over rivers to go as far as they possibly can. With each successful jump, players are awarded a ticket. Crossy Road is an arcade video game released on 20 November 2014. It was developed and published by Hipster Whale, with the name and concept of the game playing on the age old joke "Why did the chicken cross the road?" The game has been described as "endless Frogger."

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon
summary: By combining FromSoftware’s longstanding expertise in mech games and their signature robust gameplay, Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon will be a new action experience.

name: Armageddon
summary:
Armageddon is an online fantasy game in which players jointly inhabit a harsh, post-apocalyptic desert world. The game requires roleplay; while conflict abounds, the game is not about killing things. Rather, it is about living out a character's sometimes short and always difficult life in the harsh world, Zalanthas. It is a world where sorcerer-kings and their ruthless servants, the Templarate, govern the two main cities, Allanak and Tuluk. Any magick not granted by the Kings is feared and hated, and where the punishment of such a curse might be death. In this harsh realm, life is a constant struggle, and death may occur over a drink of precious water.
Sun of Fate. artist: Biscuits

Armageddon is an unparalleled roleplaying experience, blending worldwide socio-political intrigue with riveting interpersonal conflict and cooperation. Some players and staff have been participating in the Armageddon experience for two decades.

name: Arx, After the Reckoning
summary:
Arx is a game set in a low to mid-fantasy world, where magic is more legend and superstition than daily reality. The game itself is set in the capital city of the Compact, an alliance of the five Great Houses who hold sway over the continent of Arvum. The lands of Arvum are wild and sparsely settled, and away from the walls and settlements of the House-ruled fortifications there is great danger and mystery. Tribes of unaligned Abandoned (or shav'arvani) roam and raid the great forests and wildlands between the settled cities, and beyond the borders of the known lands even greater mysteries lie.

RP focused.

name: Arena Battle Champions
summary:
Adventure and victory await you! Champions from all over the land gather in the Battle Arena to fight and claim the title of Battle Arena Champion!

Battle solo or with friends, choose your powerful Champions and discover their unique abilities!
Fight your way through enemies’ minions and use strategy to destroy the enemy tower!
Unlock new Champions and special items to dominate the arena in PVP mayhem!

name: Arvoesine
summary: Arvoesine is a short platformer action game. As the protagonist you will face numerous challenges and defeat enemies until you claim the victory.

name: Arcade Archives: Pac-Mania
summary: Pac-Mania is an action game developed and released by Bandai Namco Entertainment in 1987. It marked the introduction of the 3D gaming experience in the series, seven years after the original PAC-MAN game was released in 1980. In this game, the player controls Pac-Man, who must evade pursuing ghosts while consuming Pac-Dots.

name: Arcade Archives: Metal Hawk
summary:
"Metal Hawk" is a shooting game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
Earn points by operating your aircraft while changing its altitude and destroying the targets displayed on the radar within the time limit.
Search for enemies at a high altitude, and if you find an enemy or enemy base, descend to range and destroy them.

name: Argol: Kronoss' Castle
summary:
Platformer action game, mixing gothic and mythological atmospheres.

Argol: Kronoss' Castle is a platformer action game largely inspired by 90s hits. Between gothic universe and mythological legends, it is decorated as it deserves with a rich and epic soundtrack to make you live an adventure in the purest arcade style.

name: ARVI Arena
summary: ARVI Arena is a dynamic and immersive multiplayer shooter with sci-fi elements. The rich variety of maps and weapons will excite every fan of action games. Prove yourself as a fearless gladiator of the modern world. Gather in teams and recall all the game tactics you know to conquer your enemies within VR. Use teleport features and explore the area to get bonus items. Only the most skilled players will make it through the game and get a victory. You can be one of them. Become the last survivor in the futuristic virtual battle!

name: A Red Boat
summary: A Red Boat is a short story told through boating and lost letters.

name: Art of Fighting: Trouble in South Town
summary: Art of Fighting Trouble in South Town contains several levels like fighting / bonus stages / interactive levels.

name: Arcade Archives: Galaga
summary:
Face down the ultimate alien invaders!

"GALAGA" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1981.
It is a sequel to GALAXIAN. This title has a new model of FIGHTER with rapid-fire missiles facing off with vicious aliens!
It also lets you rescue FIGHTERS captured by BOSS GALAGA tractor beams to form a Dual FIGHTER for linked dual missile fire.

name: Arkaik: Tales of Sarina
summary: Arkaik Online: Tales of Sarina is a mod of Ragnarok Online, adding new mechanics, unique lore, current interface, textures in full FULL HD and MVPs in 3D.

name: A Rum Tale
summary: In this platform game you will embody a drunken pirate in search of a lost cargo of rum. But will you be able to face the challenges that will arise before you?

name: Arqueiro
summary: A game usually released in Master System-based Plug & Play consoles.

name: Arcade Paradise: Kung Fury - Street Rage
summary: Kung Fury: Street Rage is the very first licensed game available as an in-game cabinet alongside the 35+ other games within Arcade Paradise

name: Arcade Motion Classic
summary:
The Arcade Motion Classic, known often as the Super Arcade is a console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It is almost identical to the AtGames Mega Drive Video Game Console in design meaning it can run Sega Mega Drive cartridges, but has a white plastic shell, 40-built in games and claimed support for motion controlled games, similar to the Wii.

Out of the 40 built-in games, 15 are Mega Drive games from Sega, 7 are motion-sensing sports games and 18 are "bonus arcade games". The console ships with two wireless controllers (which require 2x AAA batteries each) with a number of attachable accessories.

name: Arena Battle
summary: Arena Battle is a strategy skirmish in minimalist graphics. Thinking strategically, you will achieve victory and complete level after level, meeting more difficult challenges.

name: Artur's Pinball
summary: In this game the player will find several pinball tables joined in a single game, which turns the game into a big pinball table with locks, diamonds to be collected, passes, rotating crosses, springs and a few more things.

name: Arcade Archives: Senjyo
summary:
An amazing 3D sensation that invites you
to an unknown battle!

name: Arcade Paradise Coin-Op Pack 1
summary: Includes the ‘Empathy’, ‘Smoke ‘em’ and ‘CyberDance EuroMix’ DLC packs.

name: Around the World in 80 Days
summary: You have 80 days to circumnavigate the globe. Think that sounds easy?

name: Are You Smarter Than Mario?
summary: Are You Smarter Than Mario? was an online Adobe Flash game published by Nintendo to test player's knowledge of Nintendo trivia and promote upcoming games for the Nintendo DS and Wii.

name: Archer Hero Must Die
summary: ‘Archer Hero Must Die' is a casual game. Players control an archer and defeat one powerful enemy after another.

name: AR Flappy
summary: Play Flappy bird in AR. Simply use your phone to view the space around you while you play.

name: Arabian Princess: Dress Princess Match 3
summary:
Arabian Princess: Dress Princess Match 3
The Arabian Desert is full of mysterious treasures that are yours for the taking.
Uncover the mysteries of the Arabia, legend by legend. Match 3 tiles in a row to remove them from the grid. Collect special objects by removing the tiles beneath and letting them fall to the bottom. Clear all the special objects to finish the level, then claim your riches!
Swap to match 3 or more tiles in a row.Eject all items from the bottom of the plahying field to complete each level.
Match three or more tiles to reveal the picture hidden behind the game field.

name: Arcade Archives: Tank Force
summary: Tank Force is a 2D top down arcade game. It is a sequel to Battle City, with different graphic and various details, like bigger stages or new enemies. The player controls tank and must protect the base (with eagle). He must destroy all enemy tanks on screen. The tank cannot pass through water. All buildings are destroyable, but metal walls are invincible.

name: Ars Nouveau
summary: Ars Nouveau is a magic mod for Minecraft inspired by Ars Magicka that allows players to craft their own spells, create magical artifacts, perform rituals, and much more.

name: Arcade Machine: Clown Hunt
summary: New Arcade Machine for 1 or 2 players! Hunt for the clowns is wild! Hop in for a rollercoaster of action!

name: Arcade Bank 3 Minute Tetris
summary:
Arcade Bank 3 minute Tetris is a miniature arcade piggy bank which takes 100 yen coins to play.

Along with the main 3 minute mode typically known as ultra, it also has 40 lines and marathon.

name: Arcade Game Piggy Bank: Atari Breakout
summary: This piggy bank is shaped like an arcade machine, and it even lets you play a mini-arcade game every time you insert a coin.

name: Arcade Archives: The NewZealand Story
summary:
"The NewZealand Story" is an action game released by Taito in 1988.
Take control of the hero TIKI on an adventure to rescue your darling Phee-phee from the leopard seal.
Each stage is a sprawling maze. Fight your way to the goal, using balloons for floating action gameplay!

name: Arena of the Mad King
summary: Arena of the Mad King (AotMK) is a fast-paced bullet-hell boss rush game. Touhou meets Realm of the Mad God.

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: S.O.G. Prairie Fire
summary: Experience the intensity of the Vietnam War on a monumental scale. Featuring three vast terrains, a new co-op campaign, single/multiplayer scenarios, and dozens of weapons and vehicles, players can quell uprisings, run recon missions, and wage war in a historic take on Arma 3’s military sandbox.

name: Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader?: Extra Credit
Arctic Cat Snowmobile Racing
summary: Become king of the mountain! Arctic Cat Extreme Snowmobile Racing allows players go on an epic snowmobile journey. Travel as far and fast as possible through endless scenic winter environments. Conquer hills, maneuver moguls, pound though powder, and clear mountain gaps. Upgrade real Arctic Cat sleds to catch big air and pull off sick tricks. Unleash your inner cat with customizable sled skins and characters.

name: Aria: Genesis
summary: Blast, bomb and bang you way to finding a cure that can save your boyfriend from dying. After all, how else will you be able to enjoy his di- I mean, his amazing personality for years to come?

name: Arcade Archives: Phelios
summary:
Games first took up legendary tales in February 1989! Fight to rescue your lover Artemis!

"PHELIOS" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1989. Players (the knight APOLLON) mount a pegasus and use items to power up while fighting to take down the bosses of the seven temples and rescue Queen ALTEMIS.
The game also features gorgeous animation and engaging messages for players. Immerse yourself in the world of PHELIOS!

name: ArcSine
summary: ArcSine is a challenging first-person VR precision puzzle platformer with a physics-based jump & dash locomotion system. It contains over 300 stages of linear gameplay that increases in difficulty as the player progresses. The stages are arranged into levels grouped by the mechanics they contain.

name: Artillery Live
summary: Artillery is a tank battle game where you use various tactics to shoot down your tank opponents. Move your tank, decide how powerful your weapon will shoot, and decide how many degrees the thank should point to the other side.

name: Arcana Heart Full!
summary: The full version is an update to the regular Arcana Heart PCB. Full version includes engine tweaks, different character colors and a few more...

name: Arcade Basketball Blitz Online
summary:
Arcade Basketball Blitz Online brings the excitement of the live arcade game to mobile!
It's basketball like you've never seen before — featuring beautifully rendered HD graphics and realistic physics, this game will be sure to knock your socks off!! Play against the timer or a friend in an all-out shootout, Arcade Basketball Blitz Online provides hours of entertainment!

name: Ares Fighter 2
summary: 'Ares Fighter 2' is a vertical scroll flying shooting game. The player controls the protagonist's aircraft to fight with the enemy in the air.

name: Army War: Shooting Simulator
summary: You must take back the previously captured base in this military war game. As a commander, you must complete all challenging missions.

name: Archer
summary:
Have you ever wanted to try yourself at archery?

Have you ever dreamt of becoming a hero of the Middle Ages?

In Archer, you are to fight hordes of orcs, goblins, and trolls attacking your fortress, and in the end — defeat the main boss! You can either fight off alone like a true hero or call your friends for help and shoot monsters together.

Hurry! Grab a bow and defend your castle against uninvited guests!

name: Artificial
summary: Dig into the truth hidden in the artist's strange paintings through the puzzle.

name: Argh!
summary: Play as one of the legendary captains in the world of Argh! Compete against 6 other players in an arena and become the greatest threat to the Seven Seas. Prepare your arsenal by looting nearby islands, sink your opponents, and brave the Oblivion to win and sweep the board!

name: Araka: JK Exorcist Horror RPG
summary: Manipulate the main character with power of telepathic, looking for the trace of Araka, an Exorcist imprisoned in the other world.

name: Architect
summary: Relax while building mind-bending structures and populating them with strange entities

name: Arclight of City
summary: in the future, the crime rate of the city was high. The increase in the rate of crime had brought huge costs to the prison and the discipline system, and a large number of criminals would commit crimes again not long after they were released.Until someone proposed the "prison city"

name: Arms Race 2
summary: Arms Race 2 is PC strategy game based on the historical conflict between the USA and the USSR taken place in 20th century.

name: Army Troop
summary: Army Troop is an old-school PvP World War 2 online first-person shooter. Reminding you of the good old days World War games.

name: Art-O-Ween: Night at the Gallery
summary: Spooky Playdate Adventure Game

name: Arcadia
summary: Enter into the world of Arcadia, a 2.5D Anime-style Metroidvania. Play as the three unique characters with their unique abilities and world's interactions. Save your homeland from the troubles caused by the huge bird-like Puppets and reveal hidden truths in the underground!

name: Arcane Tower Defense
summary: Build your own towers by choosing and combining randomized upgrades. Would you like an anti-air tower that leaves its targets with a burning effect? Lightning attacks that deal Splash damage and bounce from enemy to enemy? There are over 25 million possible combinations!

name: Arcane Wilds
summary: Arcane Wilds is a western themed fantasy RTS with a unique twist on resource management. Resources can be harvested or stolen and then transported to the battlefield to enhance combat. Play cooperative missions for 1-4 players or competitively with up to 8 players or AI.

name: Arcade Archives: Magical Speed
summary: Magical Speed is a 1994 card game where players control Nicole or Claire in a quest to find the legendary Rainbow Card. The gameplay centers on a variant of the classic Speed card game, where players race to empty their hand and field cards before their opponent. Strategic card sequencing triggers demon attacks that hinder opponents, adding a competitive twist to the traditional Speed formula.

name: Arcade Racer Evolution
summary:
Bringing back the lost arcade feeling that racing games once had.
Select the Car, select the Track, enjoy the music and the sound of the engine's rpm rising, listen to the screeching tires when you drift, see the rubber on the asphalt, overtake your opponents, finish the race, earn your rewards and unlock the next Grand Prix.

name: Arcade Archives: Grobda
summary:
A colosseum for laser battles!

"GROBDA" is a shooting game released by NAMCO (currently Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1984.
Fight through all of your rivals' machines in arenas as you work to become the top-ranked fighter in the "BATTLING" arena.
Blow up multiple enemies with a single explosion for bonus points!

name: Ark: Ragnarok
summary: Journey through an expansive 144 sq. kilometer environment where elements from The Island, Scorched Earth, and all new biomes are combined to bring the ultimate survivor experience. Whether tackling the extreme cold atop the highest mountains, harvesting resources from an active volcano, or just searching for that perfect base location, Ragnarok plays host to explorers and base builders alike. But survivors beware, Ragnarok houses such creatures as Polar Bears, Ice Wyverns, and a mystical creature many have yet to tame in the ARK universe. Ragnarok boasts many unique features such as: custom explorer notes, challenging dungeons, dungeon bosses, active hot springs, unique pickup-able/harvestable resources, new biomes, an active volcano, unique tree platform locations, environmental traps, unique ruins, and so much more combined with a beautiful world to explore.

name: Arsonist Heaven Remastered
summary: Arsonist Heaven is a retro-styled action platformer where you as a mercenary equipped with a jetpack and flamethrower will incinerate mutants in dangerous locations.

name: Artifact Conquest
summary: Artifact Conquest is a turn based strategy game, were you fight a vast collection of monsters. While learning about the lore the game is set in. After a long time an evil artifact has resurfaced. You and your team need to stop people from accessing it.

name: Archeholder
summary: Evil robbers continue to seize territories and scare civilians the nearest village. The brave archer volunteered to liberate the nearby forests from enemies and bring peace to their native lands.

name: Arthas: The Game
summary: A great game about a Great man!

name: Armechgeddon
summary: Armechgeddon is a chaotic action rogue-lite with a minimalist control scheme. Pick the right mech and pilot for the job, and lay waste to hundreds of enemies with your custom arsenal.

name: Arbeiten Spiel!
summary: This funny game is a groundbreaking invention.

name: Artemis: Book One
summary: Artemis is a visual novel intended for the adult audience. You begin your road to recovery three years following a traumatic event, where you'll eventually find yourself shaping the technological future.

name: Arcade Paradise: Summer of Sports
summary: On your marks, get set, go! Compete in the Summer of Sports to become the most decorated athlete in the arcade. Break and set new records in this button mashing and joystick waggling classic.

name: Arcade Paradise: Penguin Push
summary: Waddle and hop your way around your enemies, utilising power blocks and platforms to flip the script on the invaders and stop them in their tracks, just be careful of stray birds, cold waters, and angry walruses that haven't been disposed of - there's no fury like a walrus scorned!

name: Arcade Paradise: Coin-Op Pack 2
summary:
Level up your arcade with the Coin-Op Pack 2! Featuring three BRAND NEW cabinets to put in your arcade, with new daily challenges and arcade games to keep your customers pumping quarters!

Includes the ‘R.O.G.E.R', ‘Penguin Push' and ‘Summer of Sports' DLC.

name: Arcade Paradise: R.O.G.E.R.
summary: Strap yourself in and prepare to enter the danger zone! You are Rocket and Ordinance, Guidance and Evasion Robot 2.0 (Or R.O.G.E.R for short) - your mission? To survive waves of deadly missiles and push your aerial evasive abilities to the limit!

name: Arcade Archives: Don Doko Don
summary: "DON DOKO DON" is a fixed-screen action game released by TAITO in 1989. Take control of the old lumberjacks Bob and Jim to progress through a variety of tricky stages. Pick up items to power up, beat the boss at the end of each ROUND, and rescue the captive king and princess!

name: Arms Evolution: Zombie Destroyer
summary: "Arms Evolution: Zombie Destroyer" is a unique Roguelite tower defense game. You will slaughter thousands of zombies in the game and enhance your weapon towers through build character in the RPG way. and , the game also offers an idle mode, so you can enjoy building weapons anytime and anywhere.

name: Arena Story: Rouge And Princess Knight
summary: For various reasons, they come to the gladiatorial arena where they can get their wishes, and they keep fighting! The gladiatorial arena is filled with people of different races, demons, or anything else. If you lose, you lose everything, and if you win at the end, you can get everything.

name: Armoured VR
summary: Armoured VR is a Cooperative Multiplayer tank game. Crew up one, or a whole platoon of tanks as a Commander, Gunner or Driver; Alone or with friends and fight through combined arms missions, working with infantry to win one of the most important battles of WW2.

name: Army of Ninjas
summary: Command your army of ninjas in this addictive strategy board game through battles to locate and capture the enemy's treasure box. Your ninjas are well equipped with big rocks, pieces of paper and pairs of scissors to be able to crush their opposing army. The game blends elements of strategy, anticipation, deceit and luck to provide you with a unique gaming experience.

name: Arcade Archives: Sky Kid DX
summary: Baron and Max take to the skies, fighting to protect Birdland!

name: ArrowMongers
summary: ArrowMongers is a top-down, pixel art, 2D shooter roguelite!... Or actually more than that!? Fight through the procedural dungeon, clear the floors of the colosseum, solve the puzzles in the puzzles dungeon, and become a legendary archer in the ArrowMongers village!

name: Arcade Party
summary: It is a fun 4-player party game that supports online co-op.

name: Arcade Archives: Turbo Force
summary: A frantic aerial battle against the fastest, strongest enemies yet!

name: Arcade Video Games Quiz
summary:
Get a handful of quarters, prepare yourself to take a trip back to the most amazing arcade parlor ever and accept our challenge:
How many Arcade Video Games can you name?
Find it out in the most comprehensive Arcade Gaming trivia game ever!
Write the name of the pictured arcade classic to clear a level. Do it as fast as you can and earn high scores and Video Game Quiz coins!

name: Arcade Basketball 3D Tournament Edition
summary:
Arcade Basketball 3D Tournament Edition
Prepare to be blown away by the most realistic and addictive arcade basketball game to date. You'll soon be challenging your friends for the crown. Why head out to the arcade, when you now have it in the palm of your hand?! Great for all ages!
Play fun challenges, share gifts and chat with your friends and other ballers! Sign up and play more with HeyPlay!

name: Armored Us
summary: Armored Us is an epic adventure that will immerse you into a stunning sci-fi world. As a young technician, you will face dangerous obstacles and fight against insect-like creatures made of ore and rocks in your quest to survive on this unknown planet.

name: Are We Thawing
summary:
An ex-detective stumbles upon a crime he wasn't supposed to know about and is now complicit in the death of a God.

You play as Noelle Blanche, an ex-detective belonging to the Kingdom of Winter. As times begin to change, the seasons find themselves at war. The Winter Kingdom's biggest enemy the Summer Kingdom is advancing. And Noelle never thought he himself would be at the center of this conflict...

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Ceptor II
summary: Take a seat in the cockpit and blast off into space!

name: Arcade! Classic Arcade Pack
summary: Experience the original sights, sounds, and gameplay that made these games classics in the arcade. Every roar and flash is identical to the original. Arcade Classic Arcade Pack includes nine games: Asteroids, PacMan, Frogger, Hexxagon, Pong, Snake, Space Invaders, Tetris, and Tic Tac Toe. The software includes online score-keeping capabilities so you can compete against players worldwide.

name: Armored Heroes
summary:
We need you, Commander!
World War II is one of the most significant events in the history of human kind. Thousands of heroes fought these battles with aircrafts, ships, as infantry or with tanks. We remember them to this day on different ways with memorials, statues, maquettes or with dioramas. As children we often Imagined that these monuments come alive and we could play them. Inspired by such a diorama, in Armored Heroes we commemorate the most important tank battles of World War II.

name: AR Race Car
summary:
Augmented Reality just got real. From life-sized race cars out on the street, beach or backyard to toy-sized cars on your desk or living room floor, AR Race Car gives you the thrill of tire-smoking burnouts, drifting and cornering wherever you are.
AR Race Car is Augmented Reality like you've never seen it before! Take it out into the street, drop a car, scale it up to full size and lay down some tire smoking burnouts! Or scale it down and rip it up on your desktop or living room floor!
Realistic high-res models, shadows, and engine-revving and tire-spinning sound effects will make it feel like the cars are right there with you! Fasten your seat belt, start your engine and prepare to be blown away as you drive your Augmented Reality

name: Arrows Left
summary: You have one action: Hold space to turn turn left. Protect the village from the onslaught of goblins.

name: Arcade Archives: Bonze Adventure
summary: Bring your buddhist beads on this journey to hell and back!

name: Ark Bubble
summary: Ark Bubble is similar to brick breaker genre with some cool adaptations. Instead of moving a paddle, you draw lines on the screen to avoid the ball to scape in the bottom of screen. You can not draw infinite number of lines, they are limited but you can buy more ones with your points.

name: Archery Tournament
summary: Discover this top free archery game with tournament mode, great performance, small install size, and amazing features!

name: Armed Air Forces
summary: Armed Air Forces offers all-embracing combat flight simulation experience on mobile devices. Finally you can play PC quality combat game anywhere and anytime you wish.

name: Artist Life Simulator: Cakes and Guns
summary: Adds 200+ new events, 14 Cakes, 9 Pistols, ~100 illustrations & other new content to the base game. Fully save compatible.

name: Aries Driving Game
summary: Aries Driving Game is an in-browser minigame based on the Aries Music Video. You play as Noodle driving her Buggy, trying to complete the race in Morocco before 2D and Murdoc. The game was released on September 4th, 2020, along with Lyric Video for Aries.

name: Arcade Archives: Navarone
summary:
Take control of a fighter plane on a mission to destroy enemy targets of various sizes scattered across a peninsula.
When you take down a major target, all of the minor targets around it will be destroyed with it. You get a bigger bonus from taking out the targets with fewer shots, so aim carefully!

name: Archery Battle VR
summary: Archery Battle VR is a virtual reality archery game that allows you to experience real archery movements in the game.

name: Arcanika
summary: Travel to a storybook world and help its denizens bring life back to the glade. Their world is in danger. The life force that once made things grow has disappeared and they need your help to restore it. Complete exciting Match-3 puzzles while earning treasure and achievements along the way.

name: Arcana Heart
summary: Arcana Heart was released on PlayStation 2 in Japan by AQ Interactive, featuring the option of playing characters in their "Original" or "Full" modes, reflecting the original and patched versions of characters from the arcade original, while voice acting was also added to all story segments.

name: Arcade Archives: Rezon
summary:
Set on Earth during an extraterrestrial invasion, players take control of an SR-91 fighter ship equipped with a VAWS (Variable Armor & Weapon System) and take on the invaders.
Pick up items and equip Arms, a key feature that gives you the ability to attack behind you or block enemy shots when used well.

name: Arkos II
summary: Arkos II is a first-person fantasy shooter with destructible voxel environment inspired by the classic retro shooters from 90's.

name: Arc Seed
summary: Face the interstellar Archangels in a turn-based tactical game with deckbuilding elements and destructible environment, where you pilot powerful mechs to save the Earth from destruction.

name: Arcane Assembly
summary: Arcane Assembly is a fantasy metroidvania where you create spells using a visual programming language. Unlock new instructions, upgrade your powers, and fight epic bosses on your journey to becoming the most powerful wizard who ever lived.

name: Arkem
summary: Arkem is a genre mashup historic game set in Medieval Times, where strategic building and third-person action RPG combine to form a seamless, fascinating experience.

name: Arisen Force: Vonimir
summary: "Arisen Force: Vonimir" is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels, it combines the engaging RPG adventure storyline with the 2.5D combat experience.We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, collect and develop business, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .

name: Arcade Archives: Dig Dug II
summary: "DIG DUG II" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1985. In this game, you must rid an island of the familiar POOKA and FYGAR. In addition to defeating monsters by inflating them, you can now jackhammer fault lines around the island that can weaken the ground enough for it to collapse, taking enemies down into the water below. Defeat all monsters to advance to the next stage.

name: Arcanists 2
summary:
Arcanists 2 is a captivating online, turn-based multiplayer strategy fangame where you can create your own character and select a book of spells to bring in to battle with up to 24 people!

This popular game originally hosted on FunOrb by Jagex (creators of RuneScape) has been accurately re-created thanks to developer pur3 extreme.
We are a free to play, non-profit project, serving to bring the game back for the fans of the original. It is important to note that Jagex are the owners of Arcanists and all credit goes to them.

Arcanists 2 has been re-coded from the ground up using Unity as the game engine. Playable on Windows, Mac, Linux and Android!

name: Archesis
summary: Save the kingdom of Archesis in this unique 2D metroidvania game where you can freeze time! Traverse a vast kingdom packed with exciting encounters, unlock new abilities, and overcome its various obstacles! Skillfully harness the power of time, as time only moves when you move.

name: Arcade Legends: Space Invaders
summary:
Arcade Legends: Space Invaders is a dedicated console that contains five ports of Taito arcade games:

Space Invaders
Phoenix
Lunar Rescue
Qix
Colony 7

name: Arcade Classics
summary: Collection of a few arcade classics, remade with a fresh and friendly looking art style and a beautiful soundtrack.

name: Arcade Archives: Cosmo Gang the Video
summary:
Clear the stage by defeating all the Cozmo Gangs in the Gang.
If you hit the enemy's attack, you will lose one "Hyper Beat", and if you lose everything, the game will be over.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Spring + Summer
summary: The original Aru Kanrinin no Koi game released in 2011 for PC.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Spring + Summer Free Edition
summary: This was originally released with the bonus episodes, but they were later removed and rereleased in the Complete Edition.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Spring + Summer Complete Edition
summary: A port of Aru Kanrinin no Koi: spring + summer Free Edition with additional content.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Autumn + Winter
summary: A sequel to Aru Kanrinin no Koi: spring + summer currently in development.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Between the Seasons
summary: A visual novel currently in development.

name: Archer: Sheshou
summary:
Help the Archer (Sheshou) hunt the ducks flying overhead before the timer expires. Use the left and right buttons to move the archer, and tap on the screen to shoot arrows. The lanterns will block your arrows from hitting the ducks.
Try to beat the high score!

name: Arcade Archives: Galaga '88
summary:
Win the decisive battle in a massive galactic war!

"GALAGA'88" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1987.
The GALAGA forces have returned, and you have to cross dimensions and fight your way to Planet Galaga to end the war.
This title lets you power up with 3 linked FIGHTERS for a TRIPLE FIGHTER. Use its massive firepower to mow down enemies!

name: A Rocket's Intensity
summary: Experience high-speed, multiplayer battles across various environments in this action-packed game. Use rockets to take down enemy UFOs and conquer multiple challenging levels. Upgrade your ship and unlock powerful weapons to dominate the skies and emerge victorious in this epic war.

name: ArchiHexago
summary: ArchiHexago is a casual puzzle game which takes inspiration from match-3 genre and takes it one step further. Each tile type has unique pattern which you need to match in order to gain points. And each level has different tile sets and obstacles to give you a variety of challenges.

name: Arcane Revolt
summary: Arcane Revolt is an action role-playing game with pixel graphics. Lead a revolution as a powerful mage against tyrants in a fantasy medieval world. Customize your spells and make decisions that will benefit your cause in battle. Improve your spells, start the rebellion, and bring down the order!

name: Arcane Warlords
summary: Arcane Warlords is a tactical auto-battler featuring mass units, where the kingdom's fate is shaped by your choices and strategies. Upgrade your skills, legion and stronghold to prepare for epic battles unlike any you've seen before. Your legion awaits – can you gain control of the kingdom?

name: Argumentum Ad Culpam
summary: Argumentum Ad Culpam is a gothic visual novel about the world of eternal agony. Capricious dance of principles and death. Take part in twisted battles of wits where morality is only an instrument to survive and decide what future that world will have.

name: ArchOlden
summary: ArchOlden is a meditative puzzle-city-builder.

name: Arrow War
summary:
Collect, Upgrade, Dominate
Defend your castle from endless enemies

name: Arcade Fishing
summary: Arcade Fishing is a classic fishing game.

name: Arcade Archives: Tecmo Knight
summary: Kick the beastman away!

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Launch Edition
summary: In Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon, players will assemble their mech from a wide variety of parts and weaponry to soar freely through mission locales that redefine three-dimensional mobility. Face down overwhelming opposition by outgunning and overrunning your enemies with dynamic movement that makes full use of ranged and melee combat. Players can experience frenetic and fast-paced action that can only be truly achieved with mechs.

name: Arcazoid
summary:
Join the new generation of Arcazoid. 320 exciting levels of 20 theme sets!
Twenty four hours of thrilling nonstop game play! We won’t let you sleep!
C'mon, old timers, do you remember how it used to be?

name: Arlequin
summary:
Relax while playing Harlequin, a fun and addictive free puzzle game about colors and mazes.
Your goal is to connect dots so that the route passes through all cells centers on the board.
You can move the path from one cell to another only if the colors of connected sides are the same.
Try to create a route and to solve the puzzle in the minor number of moves and rotate properly the cells on the board.
If you get stuck and the game gets hard you can always use your Hints and when you finish them you can get also more for free or get infinite ones for a small price.

name: Arcane Audit
summary: Arcane Audit is an IRS themed souls-like. Fight wizards, monsters, and middle managers. Explore the offices of a corrupted business and uncover the secrets hidden there. Grow in power and discover new weapons and arcane abilities.

name: Arobynn: Below The Surface
summary: Finally, the multiplayer VR dungeon crawler we've all been waiting for! Complete with floor bosses, traps, and a glowing immersive environment. Dive into the depths, upgrade your gear, and work your way farther into the unknown dark below the surface!

name: Artificial Wings
summary: The game focuses on the storyline and flying shooting. The protagonist's journey to explore the old world is cut short when her flying ship crashes on Whale Island. While repairing the ship, she encounters Lilliana and Ryan, caught in their conflicts, and uncovers causality and secrets.

name: Arcticide
summary: Explore dangerous procedural cities and landscapes in this gritty survival FPS with roguelike elements. Face harsh environments, hostile mercenaries, and mutant horrors as you navigate a dying near-future Arctic.

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Collector's Edition
summary:
Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Collector's Edition, exclusive to Bandai Namco Store, comes with the full game, plus the following items:

Armored Core Figurine - Size 19 cm
Steelbook - Original art Steelbook case
Pin Badges - A set of 4 pin badges featuring in-game emblem patterns
Stickers - A set of 45 stickers to personalize your computer, mobile phone, etc.
Artbook - An exclusive 40-page hardcover artbook. Dive deep into the world of the game with never-before-seen visuals
Digital Soundtrack - The complete original soundtrack

name: Aria and the Mysterious Mushroom
summary: Let's have some mushrooms together.

name: Aria's Small Adventure!
summary: Hello, it's Aria. I became small somehow, and I'm being tormented by a normal sized girl. What kind of cruel things will she do to me?? Let's find out!

name: Arcade Archives: Mazinger Z
summary:
"Mazinger Z" is a shooter released by Banpresto (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1994.
Take control of Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger, and Grendizer, and use shooting, punches, and super weapons to take on Dr. Hell's Underground Empire! Supports up to two players at once.

name: Architecture Zeitgeist
summary: Architecture Zeitgeist is a project that aims to popularize and make architecture education accessible. The game consists of 3D tours where the player will be able to visit and interact in real time with iconic architecture projects.

name: A Rare Encounter
summary: A Rare Encounter is a short visual-novel written by Raina Lilith Henlan, with programming and art by Sophie Le Blanc. This project was made to get something out there, while testing the waters for bigger projects down the line.

name: Arcade Classics
summary:
This prototype was never released (6 units are known to exist). If this game had been released on schedule it would have commemorated Atari's 20th anniversary. It has 2 games on offer, "Super Centipede" and "Missile Command II". They are both re-makes of the original classics but with enhanced graphics and sound.

After selecting "more new stuff" in the operator's mode; two kinds of spaceships will appear in the "Missile Command II" game. The "Mothership" that appears after a few levels is exactly the same as (except less detailed than) "Birdsnest", which is a spaceship on page 21 of the 1978 book "Spacecraft 2000 to 2100AD".

The spaceships in the "Invasion Wave" are probably ripped from another book in the series.

name: Arcadia
summary: An arcade shmup developed by NMK released in 1994.

name: Argus
summary: This caped superhero game is a very rare unreleased prototype. The game was originally called 'Protector' (the official test name was 'VideoMan'). Tom wanted Gottlieb to get the Superman license but they didn't. 'VideoMan' was too close to 'SuperMan' so they went with 'Protector', but the name was also changed at one point to 'Guardian', and then 'Argus' (designers' joke name became 'ProVidGuardArgus').

name: Arcade Paradise: Vostok Inc. Pinball
summary: Do you like money? How about Arcades? Then you'll LOVE Vostok Inc. Pinball!!

name: Arcade Paradise: High Score Edition
summary:
The Arcade Paradise High Score Edition includes
- Arcade Paradise (full game)
- All 8 Arcade Paradise DLC packs

name: Ark: Survival Ascended
summary: Ark: Survival Ascended is a next-generation remaster of our beloved ARK: Survival Evolved, harnessing the power of Unreal Engine 5. The base game will include SOTF and all the Ark: Survival Evolved DLC maps (which will be added to ASA over time).

name: Arizona Sunshine II
summary: Dust off your shotgun and sharpen your machete. Accompanied by an all-new friend, Arizona Sunshine 2 takes you back to the limb-strewn deserts of post-apocalyptic Arizona in this gory, next-gen sequel to one of VR's most-played games.

name: Arcane Survivors
summary: Arcane Passage is a rogue light action game that takes you into dungeons to explore magic. Choose a class, combine spells and runes, and master the art of magic.

name: Arcade Archives: Rolling Thunder 2
summary:
"ROLLING THUNDER 2" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1990.
Operate the hero of the Special Operations Forces and destroy the secret organization "NEOGELDRA" that plans to conquer the world.
In this work, you can control not only the main character "ALBATROSS", but also "LEILA BLITZ", who was captured in the previous game, on the 2P side.

name: Arcade Daze
summary: Re-live the good old days when you could go into your local arcade and throw some coins into the latest arcade machines!

name: Arcade Archives: Tetris - The Absolute: The Grand Master 2 Plus
summary: Tetris - The Absolute: The Grand Master 2 Plus is a puzzle game released by ARIKA in 2000. This work has been further enhanced with new modes added from the previous work. Challenge your own limits with "TGM+" where Tetriminos rise up from the bottom and "T.A.DEATH" where Tetriminos fall at a high speed from the beginning.

name: Arctic 51
summary: Astronaut's regular expedition turns into survival on a new planet: dig, solve physical puzzles, fight enemies, explore mysteries. Find out the reason for the disappearance of the population of an entire civilization and save the Earth.

name: Arcana: Heat and Cold. Stories
summary: The events surrounding the unskilled magician are heating up! Could an unusual way of curing the Arcane Fever have caused such a stir?! Or have we accidentally become involved in a story whose scale we cannot yet comprehend!? Comedy, hentai scenes, and new hilarious adventures await you.

name: Arcade Archives: Bravoman
summary:
Here comes Bravoman, an agent of justice!

"BRAVOMAN" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988.
One day, average office worker Hitoshi Nakamura encounters Alpha Man on his way home from a long day of work.
Alpha Man then entrusts him with ultra energy transformation material, asking him to use it to stop the mad scientist Dr. Bomb from taking over the world.
He transforms, becoming a hero of justice and courage...called BRAVOMAN!

name: Arcatron-Z
summary: Arcatron-Z is a 2.5D sci-fi mech-shooter with fast-paced action and multiple modes. You pilot the most advanced military guardian robot to defend against planet-ripping aliens. Defeat them with an array of weapons before they drain your planet's vital energy!

name: Art: Das Kunstmagazin Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
summary: Solve puzzles of art in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Arcade Cats
summary: Puzzles and much more await you with Arcade Cats.

name: Artificer's Tower
summary: Are you the master of the magical arts? Prove it in this new colony-sim wizard tower defense game. Build your base, keep your mages happy, craft recipes, research new magics, and defend your wizard's keep. Will your Artificer's Tower be the envy of all your magical friends?

name: Arashi: Castles of Sin - Final Cut
summary: Become one with the shadows with the award winning VR shinobi adventure. Master the art of stealth-action as you infiltrate castles across feudal Japan with your arsenal of weapons, tools, and techniques, outwitting all enemies on your quest to defeat the Six Oni of Iga.

name: Arcanox
summary: Arcanox was a fantasy themed blend of collectible cards, tower defense and combat strategy MMO released in 2015. You collected and crafted cards, built your castle, attacked castles of other players, stole gold, joined/created guilds and competed against other guilds in the dungeons. The dungeons were randomly generated levels which had to be solved with the least number of cards to get a high score. The game server was shutdown in October 2020.

name: Arcade Archives: Megablast
summary: Feast on a four-way firing frenzy!!

name: Arknights: Release
summary:
Arknights: Release is a fan-made game based on the Arknights IP using the Ikemen Go engine.

The game has various modes to choose from, such as arcade, two-player, online multiplayer, survival, lord conquest and so on. Currently, only arcade, two-player, survival and lord conquest are released in the test version.

name: Artificial Fright
summary: Artificial Fright is a tense horror survival game where you play as an assistant robot in an old, abandoned warehouse. Explore your surroundings, conserve your battery power, and manage your systems using a Unix-like terminal.

name: Arle's Travel Log
summary: Released in Disc Station Vol 13, Arle's Travel Log is a text-adventure game where Arle is confronted by Satan on her way to magic school, who wants Carbuncle back. The three battling together accidentally cause them to be sent back in time, with Arle and Carbuncle looking for a way to return to the present. The gameplay consists of exploration similar to the Madou Monogatari series, along with elements of an adventure game. Arle can talk to characters she meets or can click on various items to progress the plot. Battles can also occur in-game, and are fought by using a click-and-point system. The game casts various Madou Monogatari and Disc Station characters as Japanese historical figures.

name: Artemis Cosmos
summary: Cosmos simulates a spaceship bridge of up to six players, guarding your deep space stations against the menacing Kraliens and Torgoth. Immerse yourself in a modern space game with enhanced graphics and endless customization possibilities, guaranteeing countless hours of exhilarating fun.

name: Arm of Satan
summary: ARM OF SATAN is a tough precision platformer that carries the torch from the likes of Ori and Celeste, and sets it ablaze with a passion for co-op games. Featuring kick ass visuals influenced by the Hellboy comics, arcade-inspired gameplay, and a captivating narrative.

name: ArcRacer
summary: ArcRacer is a fast-paced, aggressive, and stylistic anti-gravity racer. Inspired by classic series such as F-Zero and WipEout, ArcRacer aims to provide a fresh new challenge for genre veterans, while also creating an accessible and engaging experience for newcomers.

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2 - DLC 2
summary: A free DLC that adds some extra EXP.

name: Arcadia: Arcade Watch Games
summary: Arcadia is a collection of 22 arcade games for Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad and Apple TV.

name: Arcade Archives: Splatterhouse
summary: An intense action-horror experience!

name: Archers Dream
summary: Welcome to the addictive world of archery! Immerse yourself in an epic video game adventure that will take you from one region to the next and challenge you through 30 exciting levels. Explore three breathtaking regions, each with its own unique atmosphere and challenges. Journey through majestic forests, steep mountain peaks, and a mysterious desert. Each region offers a rich visual experience and unique landscapes that will delight your senses.

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany
summary: Willkommen! It's time for you to return to the Cold War. With its bombastic amounts of new original content, the Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany Creator DLC for Arma 3 invites you to live and breathe the military conflict between the two Germanies in the 1980s. Ride into armored combat against a determined enemy that easily outnumbers you. Experience warfare from the perspective of infantry reinforced with APCs. Or breach the historic inner German border to force the enemy’s hand in battle. Which side of the wall will you fight for? Besides the West and East German armies, this DLC pack also includes Denmark as a smaller but viable military faction, whereas the Polish People's Army reinforces their East German comrades.

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Western Sahara
summary:
New and improved variants of existing vehicles in ArmA 3 itself are bundled with the DLC: namely, the Marshall IFV and Marid APC, both of which have been granted modular capabilities to expand their roles. Alongside this are enhancements to the Zamak truck which has gained (optional) anti-aircraft guns and ViVT-capable models. The Offroad pickup and the PO-30 Orca helicopter have also been outfitted with up-armour packages designed to increase their survivability.

Additionally, five new factions - some based on existing factions from the Armaverse, along with a slew of handheld firearms, a static gun turret, and new drones in the form of armed UAVs that can either be outfitted with improvised explosives or handheld small arms, are included in the DLC. Lastly, this is all accompanied by a wide selection of (both new and retextured) personal gear and vehicular assets that are camouflaged to suit the arid environment of Sefrou-Ramal.

name: Ariane in Paradise
summary:
Your character is a refugee of one of those war-torn regions who managed to swing a sponsorship to this city. You can play as a previous player character (DA/SITA or AiP) who Ariane sponsors or you can be a new character who won a sponsorship. Your character can be male or female.
You move into a house with three women: Ariane, Rachel, and Maya. The object of the game is to get a good job and become friends with all three roommates, and if you are successful you can help negotiate a plan to keep the city-state stay alive a little longer.
The game opens up in a refugee-holding area. It used to open up with long-winded exposition text until I decided “showing” is better than telling. You deal with an immigration agent in a military uniform, and then the first people you meet are people that hate refugees. The first friendly person you meet is Rachel.
Rachel gives you a tour of the house, then you meet Ariane, and depending on which origin you pick for your character, this is either a getting to know Ariane section, or a getting caught up section. There is a key point where Ariane asks what you are interested in, which is a key choice in the paths you can take.​

name: Arcade Archives: Cop 01
summary:
"COP 01" is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1985.
Players take control of rookie detective James with Police Precinct 1, infiltrate the secretive Specter organization's hidden base, and rescue their kidnapped partner Stacy as the goal.
Fight your way through the countless enemies in the hidden base using both your normal jump and the higher "Rocket Jump" performed using a limited gauge!

name: Art is Rifle
summary:
Unleashing the Chaos in Shooter Puzzle Genre!

Art is Rifle is an open-world, FPS puzzle game with rhythmic bullets and psychedelic art styles. Powered by Unreal Engine 5 and much passion.

Experience a psychedelic adventure through first-of-its-kind mind altering core gameplay mechanics, beyond visual and auditory designs!

Dive into a world of puzzles where tutorials are optional, and discovery is key! Your solutions, your style. Puzzles are your canvas, solve them your way!

Weaponize your art through a symbolic journey of cultural exploration.

The whole world is your drum kit!

Immerse yourself in a visually striking game that dances with a fusion of intense colors and mind-altering, psychedelic elements.

name: ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea
summary:
Welcome to "ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea" a thrilling platformer that combines the charm of classic 2D gameplay with a fresh, updated style. Embark on an epic adventure through five enchanting worlds, each with its own unique biome and a climactic boss battle awaiting you at the end.

In this captivating game, you'll have the opportunity to play as different characters, each possessing their own distinct skills and statistics. Take control of the agile and graceful Angel, an expert Archer with the ability to double jump, allowing you to traverse the treacherous terrain with ease. Alternatively, you can embody the cunning Spec Ops, armed with a trusty Pistol and Grenades, granting you swift movements and a penchant for tactical warfare. If you prefer a more resilient approach, choose the Desert Soldier, equipped with a powerful Rifle and boasting higher health, albeit at a slower pace. The swift and lethal Ninja wields a deadly Katana, making lightning-fast strikes against enemies a breeze. Finally, the valiant Crusader, though slow, compensates with a sturdy shield and a mighty sword, ensuring both high health and formidable defense.

Prepare yourself for a visually stunning journey as you explore five vibrant worlds. Traverse the lush grasslands of the default world, challenge the scorching heat and unforgiving sand dunes of the desert, venture into the eerie depths of the graveyard, navigate the dense and perilous jungles, and experience the wonders of a futuristic sci-fi realm. As you progress through each world, face thrilling encounters with foes specially tailored to the environment, ensuring that every battle is a unique and exhilarating experience.

Throughout your adventure, discover power-ups and collectibles that will aid you in your quest. Gather health and mana potions to restore your vitality and magical abilities, while collecting feathers that unlock new and potent skills unique to each character. Utilize these abilities strategically to overcome challenging obstacles and decimate your adversaries.

Prepare yourself for an unforgettable journey as you dive into the immersive world of "ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea".

Embark on a heroic quest, test your platforming skills, and unveil the secrets hidden within each world as you bring forth the resurgence of the immortal allegiance. Are you ready to rise above the challenges and embrace your destiny?

name: Arugisu no Tsubasa
summary: Arugisu no Tsubasa (Wings of Arugis) is a sequel for Miracle Warriors: Seal of the Dark Lord.

name: Arcadium: Space Odyssey
summary: Embark on an interstellar roguelite adventure set in a procedurally generated universe! Battle relentless alien horders, strategically enhance your build, harness planetary resources, and journey across the vastness of space to reveal its hidden secrets.

name: Arcade Archives: Pole Position
summary:
"POLE POSITION" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1982.
The game is divided into qualifying and grand prix. If you make a lap in the qualifying round with a good time, you will advance to the grand prix.
Use your driving technique to win the POLE POSITION!

name: Ark Saver
summary:
Animals come down the line one by one, and you need to rescue them to put them on the ark.
Challenge your brain with this awesome fast-paced puzzle!

name: Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore
summary:
Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore is a new interactive animated adventure, where players must help Arzette save the Kingdom of Faramore from the evil demon king, Daimur. It is a spiritual successor to a pair of infamous fantasy adventure titles, being developed by Seedy Eye Software and both funded & published by Limited Run Games.

The Kingdom of Faramore is beautifully realized by Rob Dunlavey, the artist behind the world map paintings from the games that inspired Arzette. Additionally, voiceover talent from the games that inspired Arzette will be featured in the game, including Jeffrey Rath and Bonniejean Wilbur.

name: Arcade Archives: Strato Fighter
summary:
"STRATO FIGHTER" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1991.
In the year 2135 AD, the Earth Military mobilizes Codename "RAIGA" after an attack by an unknown enemy.
The future is in the hands of the two MB-OG fighters, and they depart for the enemy colony.
Use the turn button and a variety of weapons to take down enemies that come at you from all sides - vertically and horizontally.

name: Army Defence
summary: It’s a desperate mission that only the brave and resourceful will survive: Your base is under attack and the enemy are pressing in on all sides. Only you and your tiny squad of special forces operatives can save the day, so parachute in and prepare to defend using everything you can get your hands on in this all-action tower defense game.

name: Arcane Pets: Plushie Empire
summary:
Arcane Pets introduces the sequel mini-game, Plushie Empire.
Become an overnight entrepreneur and build your empire into a business tycoon. Rake in the Empire Coins and Empire Cash. Compete against a plethora of online players to become the richest Empire out there. Swim in the Empire Cash and get empire-rich.
As a semi-idle game, your Empire will continuously sell the Plushies that you produce & ship.

name: Arcadia Demade
summary:
Typically when you ship a big game you get some time off to relax, take a step back and enjoy life.

Of course, I had to do something very silly with some of this time. So I did a remake of a BioShock level for… wait for it… Doom 2.

Inspired partly by TIGSource’s amazing Bootleg Demakes Competition, I used a modern Doom level editor called SLADE to recreate Arcadia and the Farmer’s Market, the sections of BioShock on which I was the primary designer. It’s a monster of a level, crammed full of weird little BioShock-to-Doom transmutations and symbolism.

name: Arrival
summary:
9 + 1 (+ 1?) limit-removing levels for Doom II. Designed with stock Doom II resources in mind, utilizing the lovely skies provided by Mek's "box o' skies".

You may see a familiar space or two I implore you treat them as if they were new For the love from which these lands are derived Has been waiting patiently for you to arrive

May your heart's true will Be ultimately fulfilled For eternity

name: Arceon
summary:
Arceon is a boom compatible mapset consisting of 6 medium length maps plus an epilogue map, mainly consisting of techbase themed maps, with different themes based on the light color of each map

Each of the maps was built with an emphasis on having layouts that encourage incidental combat from monsters and are easy to navigate, filled along with several combat setpieces.

name: Arcade Archives: King & Balloon
summary:
"KING & BALLOON" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1980.
Shoot down the swarms of balloons that are coming to steal the king!
The game will continue so long as the king isn't fully taken away into the sky, no matter how many times your cannon is destroyed.
You can also rescue the king as the balloons take him by shooting them down and rescuing him before he goes away.

name: Ar3na
summary: Ar3na is a top-down battle arena game that blends fast-paced action with strategic gameplay. Engage in heart-pounding battles against epic foes as you fight for supremacy in a variety of dynamic arenas. Use your wit, reflexes, and cunning tactics to outmaneuver your opponents and emerge victorious.

name: Archipelagates
summary: Archipelagates is an adult fantasy hack slash and loot game. Create your character and search dangerous islands for resources, weapons, and armor. Forge relationships with other inhabitants, friendly or romantic.

name: Artifice
summary: Adventure across two worlds, fight cyborg managers, learn magic, and save the world from a sentient AI in this turn-based RPG inspired by the classics of the genre.

name: Arcanum
summary: A Co-op 1-4 player horror survival which will have you searching for clues, items, aiming to solve the mystery of The Manor and running for your life... Discover what happened to the previous residents and escape whilst you can..

name: Arie: Moonprayer
summary: "Arie: Moonprayer" is a storytelling exploration game. Moon is falling, and the world is ending. Diallo, a man who can sense the memories of the gone, has one last mission on earth: Go up to the peak nearest to the moon with his mentor's daughter, find out the truth of this world.

name: A Risen Heart
summary: Court your favorite characters in this enchanting new dating simulator! Pay attention and make good choices, then maybe you can walk away with the man or woman of your dreams. Good luck!

name: Art of Golf
summary: Physics based 2D golf game. Play tournaments, beat challenges or compete for high scores. Many game modes, extra sports and mini-games.

name: Arcane Depths
summary: Arcane Depths is a 2D action roguelike dungeon crawler game with a magical world. Become a powerful sorcerer and dive into dangerous depths filled with enemies and treasures. Combine a multitude of spells and relics to annihilate your foes. Procedurally generated dungeons, intense combat, and powerful bosses awaits!

name: Argonavis: Kimi ga Mita Stage he
summary: Argonavis: Kimi ga Mita Stage he is a band-raising mobile game for the boy band project from ARGONAVIS. It features a new band, ST//RAYRIDE, and was released on February 7th, 2024 to Android and iOS devices.

name: Arcade Archives: Growl
summary:
"GROWL" is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Choose one of the four rangers to control and save the animals from the evil poachers.
Use weapons you can pick up along the way, such as swords, guns, and rocket launchers, as well as a variety of techniques that you can perform by combining buttons to defeat the poachers.

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - Spearhead 1944
summary: Grab your rifle and prepare to deploy to the fields of Normandy. This new addition will take you back to historic World War II, fighting alongside the US First Army in Normandy, and introduces new vehicles, weapons, clothing, gear, co-op campaign, and more.

name: Arcadia: Colony
summary: Enter into the world of Arcadia, a 2.5D Anime-style Metroidvania. Play as the three unique characters with their unique abilities and world's interactions. Save your homeland from the troubles caused by the huge bird-like Puppets and reveal hidden truths in the underground!

name: Arcade Archives: Baraduke 2
summary:
"Baraduke 2" is an action shooter released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988.
The crablike "Octy" were not fully eliminated from their fortress in the previous title, "Baraduke".
Rely on help from the Paccet you rescued in the last game as you complete your mission to finish off the vicious Octy extraterrestrials!

name: Artisan Story
summary: Aspiring to be the best artisan in the world, our young artisans are opening their own workshop complete with a monster ranch. Tame monsters from the dungeon, tend to your fantasy farm, collect materials and craft recipes, and experience a carefree story rich fantasy life

name: Artifact Seeker: Legend of Aurorium
summary: The Demon King invaded Aurorium. Heroes require legendary artifacts to save the world. Obtain them by defeating corrupted foes, collecting Vingold to trade with a merchant, or exploring altar chests. Level up to use skill combos and evolved skills against countless enemies. Defeat the demon king!

name: Ardem
summary: Prepare for an immersive open-world survival experience. Scavenge, collect resources, craft tools and build your own shelter to overcome the challenges of survival in this harsh environment.

name: Arrokoth
summary: Dark and Moody vanilla-compatible E1 replacement for The Ultimate Doom.

name: Armadosia: The Mad Corridor
summary: Armadosia: The Mad Corridor is a megawad for Doom II, meant for limit-removing source ports. It was designed by David Rivette (Arma Kero), and features 32 very large, exploration-focused levels, plus a host of new textures and flats, but no new music or story. It was originally released on March 1, 2005, and saw several updates containing bug and compatibility fixes over the years, with the latest version (2.1) being released in May 2016.

name: Arcade Archives: Mad Shark
summary:
Use a variety of power-up items to fight your way through the stages!

"MAD SHARK" is a shooter released by ALLUMER in 1993.
Players take control of a fighter craft facing off against countless enemies.
Use bombs and power-up items with a variety of effects for an advantage as you fight your way through the stages.

name: Ardaria
summary: Procedural building, crafting, RPG skills, resource mining, and dynamic NPCs. Master parkour moves, face hordes of enemies, and tame powerful mounts! Embark on an epic adventure in Ardaria!

name: Arcade FC
summary: Arcade FC is an arcade soccer game with skill-based gameplay, fast-paced graphics, responsive controls, accurate ball physics and that retro vibe.

name: Artificia Armata
summary: A classic tower defense game placed in a dystopic era where humanity is threatened by the machines that they built to protect themselves.

name: Ardent Passions
summary: Ardent Passions is an adult visual novel where Heroman uncovers his girlfriend and her friends' vigilante secrets on a camping trip. With the fate of these relationships at stake, the game unfolds through decisions that determine if these vigilantes become allies or enemies.

name: Arinn
summary: Arinn is a precision platform game with dungeons full of enemies and deadly traps. The only way out is to escape from the enemies and overcome all the challenges. Collect all the treasures and help Arinn pay off his debts.

name: Archer Pinball
summary:
Throw yourself into the spy life with the world's greatest secret agent and his coworkers at the Agency. Fight on top of a moving train, take part in a shootout at the local spa, and evade the yakuza in a frantic car chase. Ride into a zone of... Wait a minute, I swear I had something for this...

The Archer Pinball app features frantic and hilarious action, including authentic voiceovers and sound effects from the TV show, multiple mini-playfields with a unique progression system, unique achievements, and hotseat multiplayer so you can compete with your friends!

name: Arcana Noir
summary: Arcana Noir is an illustrated text-based Rogue-lite RPG using a D100 system, resource management, and decision trees inspired by adventure games and interactive fiction.

name: Arcade Archives: Dark Adventure
summary:
"DARK ADVENTURE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1987.
Our heroes in this title have been sucked into the Devil World after they opened an ancient coffin found in some ruins.
Now, they must set out on an adventure through the labyrinthine Devil World to find the demon king, defeat him, and make their way home.
This title includes a Japanese Version, European Version, and also a North American Version that allows 3-player co-op.

name: Arrow a Row
summary: Arrow a row is a game in which you shoot arrows (of course) in a row! or maybe two rows! (maybe three?) Choose your power-ups and defeat the Boss.

name: Arctic Outpost
summary: The map was designed to be SP only, for GZDoom (works fine in 3.3.1) and so jumping, crouching and freelook is allowed, the arctic setting was originally inspired by 'The Thing', however it soon evolved into a more traditional doom map. This was a submission for the Vinesauce Mapping Contest II.

name: Arrow Flick
summary:
Just in time for the holidays, Arrow Flick now includes an all-new game mode, Holiday Apocalypse. In it, you take aim at zombies hellbent on, you guessed it, eating your brains.
The good news is that you are armed with an infinite number of arrows to survive 50 waves of zombies. Each wave brings more zombies whose aggression and evasiveness grow greater and greater as well.
You aren’t limited to an old-fashioned bow and arrow, either. Holiday items littered throughout the scenario -- presents, stockings, ornaments -- unlock special weapons to combat the dead men (and women) walking. Weapons include bows capable of shooting three arrows at once and arrows that can be rapidly fired or tipped with explosives.

name: Archaeology
summary: Small strategy game created for GMTK GameJam 2023 in 48 hours. Take a role of an archeologist, but instead of digging treasures you put them back into the ground for others to find.

name: Archi-Tek
summary: Archi-TEK (also known as UVOLNIT) is a three level PWAD for Doom II designed for GZDoom created by Roman Suchomel (Romsu89). The WAD utilizes almost entirely stock Doom textures and is known for its lengthy maps and intricate detailing.

name: Arthas 2
summary: The continuation of a great game about a great man!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 2 - Battle For the Port
summary: The new season is set to introduce a ton of content such as the new Storm Warning mode, a new Port map, and a plethora of weapons. The upcoming season will also mark the beginning of a new series of seasons that have been planned for the game.

name: Arcane Arena
summary: Arcane Arena is an intense multiplayer action game chosen from diverse spellcasting classes, each with unique abilities. Engage in team-based combat, and dominate the battlefield. Unleash devastating spells, manipulate time, summon creatures, and harness elements to emerge victorious.

name: Arcade Archives: Bosconian
summary:
"BOSCONIAN" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1981.
Take control of a space patrol fighter and take down the space pirate BOSCONIAN!
Enemy bases can be destroyed by destroying all of their turrets or by firing missiles into the center of the base, which will cause a massive explosion.
Destroy all the enemy bases in a round to clear each stage.

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Premium Edition
summary:
Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Premium Edition is exclusive to the Bandai Namco Store and comes with:

Full game
Garage - A garage where you can park your Armored Core, inspired by the one available in the game. Size: 32 cm
Armored Core Figurine - Size 19 cm
Steelbook - Original art steelbook case
Pin Badges - A set of 4 pin badges featuring in-game emblem patterns
Stickers - A set of 45 stickers to personalize your computer, mobile phone, etc.
Artbook - An exclusive 40-page hardcover artbook. Dive deep into the world of Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon with never-before-seen visuals.
Digital Soundtrack - The complete Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon original soundtrack

name: Armored Core VI Fires of Rubicon: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full game
• Exclusive Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack
Allows players to view concept art and listen to in-game music.

A new action game based on the core concept of the Armored Core series that utilizes the knowledge and experience gained from FromSoftware's recent action game development.

name: Art&.. More
summary: Art&.. More is a 1-bit ART gallery for Playdate Catalog with Collecting and Arcade gameplay!

name: Arco
summary:
Three tales forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.

Enter the breathtakingly beautiful world of Arco, a unique tactical action game where your decisions shape the story. Journey through lush forests, sweeping plains, and scorching deserts as you guide four unlikely heroes in their vendetta against the Red Company gang.

Battle warriors of different nations, fend off greedy colonizers, and slay monstrous creatures as you voyage across this enchanted land. Change your fate, one move at a time.

name: Aria
summary: Based on the album by CMD094, Aria is an interactive homage to the themes of the original album and classic RPG games from which it took its inspiration. Aria aims to replicate the experience of the classic 2D top-down RPG from the age of floppy discs and humming CRT monitors. Explore the world of Aria from peaceful plains and magical temples to mysterious forests, talk to its residents, defeat enemies, discover its secrets... and most importantly save Aria!

name: Arcade Galaxy Builder
summary: Welcome to Arcade Galaxy! Race with cube-animals on obstacle-filled tracks. Use skills like lightning strikes and super jumps to gain an edge. Customize your Cub's look and abilities for a unique racing. Create your own tracks with our advanced editor. Unleash your racing dreams in our galaxy!

name: Arcane's Watch
