summary: After Returning to your hometown in search of your missing father, you find that the town has been abandoned, search for clues around the town to find your father, but be careful, you aren't the only one there.

name: Archetype Blue
summary: Archetype Blue is a rogue-lite deck building game where you form your own adventure team and deck before facing the challenges this fantasy world has in store for you. With all the options in front of you and the circumstances surrounding your expedition, do you have any chance of succeeding?

name: Armor Mayhem
summary: Armor Mayhem is a side-scrolling shooter game developed by Louissi. It features a full-fledged campaign, which is played both to progress through the story and earn money which is used to purchase new weapons and armor from the armory.

name: Art of Speed
summary: A game made for the speedrunning community. Fight through the enemies and parkour on platforms to finish the maps as soon as possible.​

name: Aries
summary:
A fallen angel studying in a "special angel school" to become independent has to go to earth to study the behavior of regular humans.

This particular angel doesn't understand love well, and comes to live a happy campus life with the protagonist to better her understanding of it.

name: Arcade Archives: Cadash
summary:
"CADASH" is an action RPG game released by TAITO in 1989.
The player chooses one of four heroes and sets out on a journey to rescue Princess Sarasa, who has been taken by the evil Barrog.
Buy key items and equipment at the shops along the way, and don’t forget to explore: NPCs are on hand to offer useful hints along the way!

name: Arch Rivals
summary: Arch Rivals is a one-in-the-chamber platform fighter where you duel your friends with your bow and arrow. Aim carefully and hope that you can pick your arrow back up!

name: Arctic's Adventure
summary: An action adventure game where you go on a journey to save your missing best friend. Play as Arctic the polar bear and explore the icy north in different ways. Meet new friends, overcome obstacles, and find clues about what happened to your friend.

name: Archons: Arena
summary: Archons: Arena is a deck builder with RPG elements. Manage your skills and equipment to survive another around.

name: Armored Souls
summary: Armored Souls is a 2D Soulslike Action game with Roguelike elements and challenging boss fights set in a machine-driven dystopia. Navigate a beautifully desolate world, scrap enemies for parts and return to your foundry to assemble a variety of game-changing skills, programs and mechanical upgrades.

name: Area93
summary: A journey through Area 93, where a zombie apocalypse occurred.

name: Arena Kingdoms
summary: Arena Kingdoms is a community battle game where Discord servers play together, compete, and represent their server's HOUSE in weekly Arena Tournaments.

name: Arcade Archives: Zing Zing Zip
summary:
"ZING ZING ZIP" is a shooter released by ALLUMER in 1992.
Operate the 1P aircraft with fast vertical movement speed or the 2P aircraft with fast horizontal movement speed to defeat the evil empire.
Aim to clear the screen by making full use of various items and rolling special moves that make you invincible or power up while activated

name: Ares Fighter 3
summary: "Ares Fighter 3" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Arena 9th
summary: Welcome to the AUTO-CARD Competition of The Ninth Universe. You can show your skills, enter a higher level of competition, and strive to win the glory of the universe championship.

name: Aradena: Battlegrounds
summary: A medieval fantasy turn-based strategy game

name: Argamasa
summary: In Argamasa you control Demetrius, a man who creates solidified fire walls. This power is used by an organization called FIRE, that makes him build things with that power. You need to figure out the best way to build those images that are proposed through challenges that resemble "pixel art". To build them you need to know to position youself on the screen and be careful to not get trapped in the walls that you create.

name: Arcade Archives: Jail Break
summary:
"JAIL BREAK" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1986.
Fight your way through Manhattan after it is taken over by prison escapees, and rescue the warden from the jail where they are holding him!
You have no chance against the lawless prisoners with just your sidearm. Rescue citizens in order to get new weaponry!

name: Arena
summary:
"Arena" is a game developed by Tom Madens for the "Net Yaroze", a PlayStation development kit and manufactured by Sony Computer Entertainment as a promotion to computer programming hobbyists.

It was featured on Official UK PlayStation Magazine's demo disc #108.

name: Around us: Zombie shooter
summary: Around us: Zombie shooter is a multiplayer cooperative zombie shooting game. There are various kinds of zombies and bosses. A lot of weapons and upgrades are waiting for you to unlock via waves. Try to survive the highest wave that no one ever reaches!

name: Art Heist
summary: An escape room inspired adventure. A stormy night, a secluded villa. A precious artwork has been stolen during a heist. Will you track down the missing painting before the culprit escapes?

name: Archer Hero
summary: Take aim, and let your arrow fly in this randomly generated, top-down rogue-like. Choose your path wisely, as you traverse the mysterious isles that lay before you... Plenty of loot and hardships await.

name: Arcade Archives: Strike Gunner
summary:
"STRIKE GUNNER" is a shooter released by ATHENA in 1991.
Manipulate the "S.T.G. Strike Gunner" and challenge the aliens to a battle to recapture the earth!
Select from a total of 10 weapon unit types to find one for each stage, with each weapon unit usable for one stage only.

name: Armchair Commander
summary: A turn-based strategy game where you can experience historical campaigns or explore your own historical scenarios and those created by others in the mapping community.

name: Arcadia VI
summary: Arcadia VI is an unfinished multi-cart that was intended to be released on the NES with 6 games. The only known proto has 4 games. Of the 4 games, only one game (Tennis) has been completed. The 4 games on the cart are: Tennis, Xerxes, Ghurka, and Twin Cam Turbo

name: Art Reborn: Painting Connoisseur
summary: Dear curator, you are about to embark on a journey to captivate the audience! You will be in charge of an art gallery.Impress the museum curators around the world with these masterpieces, collect badges, apply for support funds, and learn the value of art!

name: Arouse
summary: Ignite your passion and explore a world of lust and desire. Create a character from your wildest dreams and fulfill your deepest fantasies with a realistic sex simulator. It's time to get aroused!

name: A Rushed Project
summary:
"A Rushed Project" is a mini SMW hack with 7 exits in total, but with a small twist.
Each of those levels grabbed a different gimmick, graphics and other things, and then were made a full complete level in under 1 hour.

name: Arkanoid: Amiga Alternate Levels
summary: This is a conversion of the 32 levels created exclusively for the Commodore Amiga version of Arkanoid, adapted into the NES port of the original.

name: Arkanoid: Chinese Edition
summary: ROM hack for Arkanoid with levels based around Chinese themes, originally it was made on a Chinese-language Japanese ROM for Arkanoid that was missing the second graphics bank needed for the DOH battle at the end of the game. To make it more stable, it has since been relocated to a US ROM with a few additional upgrades. It is now in full English, the levels are slightly altered, and it is now possible to have a black block.

name: Areas
summary:
No text, no colors, no clicks. What’s left?
A simple shooter. Or so it appears.

name: A Roach In Space
summary:
As part of an experiment, a roach was sent into space. But the ship was trapped in a cosmic ray storm and exploded!

The roach miraculously survived, losing two legs in the explosion, but also acquired the ability to fly through space and shoot energy blasts from his antennae! Your mission is to guide the stranded insect back to earth through a perilous journey infested with all kinds of evil space creatures.

name: Arcade Archives: Finest Hour
summary:
Pilot the newest robot "Sygnus" and reach the goal in time.

Use the three buttons, Vernier (jump), Marker, and Shot to run through the stage and defeat enemies.

name: Around the World: Travel to Brazil
summary: AviGames presents the first game in the series "Around the World: Amazing Brazil". Go on a trip to the sights of Brazil, search for various objects, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs.

name: Arashi no Yoru ni
summary: A DS game based on the anime film Arashi no Yoru ni (Stormy Night).

name: Arasuji de Oboeru Sokudoku no Susume DS
Arasuji de Kitaeru: Hayamimi no Susume DS
Arthur's Birthday
summary: Arthur's Birthday is adapted from the original storybook into an interactive animated adventure! Interact with the pictures and discover hidden scenes. Many surprising encounters await with your favorite Arthur storybook characters!

name: Arthur's Teacher Trouble
summary: Explore Marc Brown's "Arthur’s Teacher Trouble" in an interactive animated adventure. Join Arthur as he tackles homework, spelling quizzes, and school competitions. Relive this cherished classic with animations, voice narration, and hidden bonuses.

name: Arthur's Reading Race
summary: Arthur’s Reading Race centers around everyone’s favorite Aardvark. Arthur is trying to teach his little sister, D.W, to read. However, she insists that she already knows how!

name: Arthur's Computer Adventure
summary: Explore Marc Brown’s classic "Arthur’s Computer Adventure"! Arthur and his friends bring the story alive one word at a time, fully animated and voiced. Increase the challenge and the fun with an interactive at-your-own-pace option with lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

name: Arena Football '95
summary: Arena Football '95 is an unreleased arena football video game that was in development by V-Real Interactive and planned to be published by Atari Corporation on a scheduled August 1995 release exclusively for the Atari Jaguar. If it had been released before Midway Games' Kurt Warner's Arena Football Unleashed, it would have been the first officially licensed indoor american football game by the Arena Football League. Adopting the more faster and frantic style of play from the sport compared to american football, players would have the choice of playing across any of the game modes available against with either CPU-controlled opponents or other players, while including all the rules and teams from the 1995 Arena Football League season including the Miami Hooters, who make their only game appearance in the title and were not included in Electronic Arts' Arena Football. Originally conceived in 1993, the game was announced in early 1994 and showcased at SCES '94 but the project would be later cancelled in 1995 after various delays and expenses, despite being close to completion. Although unreleased, a playable prototype has since been released and sold online by independent groups such as the defunct Jaguar Sector II website and later B&C Computervisions.

name: Arcade Archives: Darius II
summary: Sample tuna sashimi in 3 screen glory!

name: Arthur & Susan: Almost Detectives
summary: Arthur and Susan, two inseparable friends solving mysteries together. Fun and cozy indie point&click. Don't miss it!

name: Arcadrome
summary: Dark time for the Human race has come. The Earth is in danger. Aliens are going to capture planet Earth (as they always are). It's clear to see that they are ugly, loathsome, vile and have the worst designs of all conquerers. Women will be eaten away, the brains of intelligent men will be worked into liquid assigned to wash their nasty spaceships, children will be taken away for terrible experiments.

name: Arcade Sundown
summary: Challenge the pinball people! Get shrunk down and play a mad points-scoring game inside pinball machines. Feint, travel, and tackle your way to high score glory — all’s fair under the glass.

name: Arcane Blast
summary: Arcane Blast is a fast-paced, action-packed roguelike brimming with sorcery. Master the seven elements, combine them to achieve powerful reactions and face swarms of enemies to help feline Mage Adrian find his way home from a time dungeon.

name: Arcane Survival
summary: Craft, build, survive, and defend against menacing monsters in this 2D survival sandbox game, Arcane Survival. Research, fortify and expand your base/combat capabilities using resources found in the world! Protect this flame that keeps you alive, feed the essence of your enemies and grow stronger!

name: Armageddon 2
summary: Small Metal level.

name: Arlyeh Center for Heart Diseases
summary: A rebalanced version of mfx's map from Retro Jam 1: a medieval building nestled in a rocky cavern and fronted by a lake of slime. Features traps and tough comba

name: A Roaming Wildebeest In Spain
summary: Based on Tronyn's scrapped Roman Wilderness of Pain maps, this level represents another sort of Metagyptian environment. It abounds with typical Quake monster fights and should give an experienced Quaker about 25 minutes of good quality fraggin'. A large open Egyptian temple framed by mountains

name: Arrogant Erratum & The Kuras Stronghold
summary: Two medium/large blue-themed maps plus a start map and a battle arena, featuring elements from some of the original Quake levels and certain old custom maps. Comes with three music tracks. The map sources are included.

name: Arcade Archives: Guttang Gottong
summary: A fun railway trip!

name: Are you yet Living?
summary: Medium sized, somewhat nonlinear map using Knave textures.

name: Arabian Nights
summary: An essential 3-map classic crafted in a sadlark-like egypt style.

name: Arcane
summary: Medium sized Metal/runic level.

name: Arcanum Bonus Maps
summary: Two maps originally supposed to be featured as bonus levels in Arcanum. The first one is a small mediaval/fantasy cathedral - a remake of Heretic's E1M6, complete with original textures and music. The second one is a medium-sized arcane industrial complex with a similar vibe as Towers of Wrath from Dissolution of Eternity.

name: Archery Red
summary: Dive into a futuristic world as an archer, aiming to hit targets and vanquish robotic foes. Experience advanced mechanics and realistic shooting in an engaging single-player campaign or endless mode. Ready for the challenge?

name: Argo
summary: Argo is a unique roguelite action strategy game in a minimalist style. Use combos to use abilities, dodge enemy attacks and defeat the Void, Hell and Pestilence bosses. You don't have to do it alone either, because you can play the entire game in online co-op mode!

name: Ara Fell & Rise of the Third Power
summary: Ara Fell & Rise of the Third Power comprises of both games on one physical cartridge

name: Art-O-Ween: A Ghost in the Gallery
summary: Explore the art gallery like never before as you join Bop and Ghostie in the search for their missing dog over Halloween Night!

name: A-Ressha de Ikou: The 21st Century - Limited Edition
A-Ressha de Ikou: The 21st Century - Perfect Set
A-Ressha de Ikou i
summary: Released on the DoCoMo 504i/505i/506i/900 mobile phones as a service planning game and distributed by Hudson Soft. Players had to pay a monthly fee to access the game.

name: Archery Showdown
summary: Archery Showdown is a local PvP platformer where you can challange with your friends in an archery-balistic 2D fighting!

name: Arcanora
summary: Step into the mystical realm of Arcanora, a rogue-lite magical adventure! where darkness shrouds a labyrinthine world. Battle hordes of ferocious spiders using an arsenal of diverse staffs. How many waves can you endure before the unyielding arachnid surge overwhelms you?

name: Arcane Fighters
summary: Arcane Fighters is 2D platform PvP where you can fight against your friends using magic, strategy and ... MAGIC! Choose from many unique spells and set up your build to outsmart opponents. Still early access so stay tuned!

name: A-Ressha de Ikou
summary: Port of A-Ressha de Ikou for the Family Computer.

name: Arcade Archives: Blandia
summary: Blandia is a 1992 fighting game where players select from six warriors competing to defeat a tyrannical king who hoards the world's treasures. Combat features an armor system where each fighter begins with protective gear that absorbs damage until destroyed through repeated attacks, adding a strategic layer to battles. Players must break through opponents' armor before inflicting direct damage, creating a unique mechanic that distinguishes it from traditional fighting games.

name: Argus
summary: Argus is a vertical shooter by Jaleco and conversion of an arcade game originally released in 1986. The players takes control of a space-fighter equipped with a front laser gun and ground bombs. Although the game features power-ups, they follow an unusual and unique formula - tiles on the ground must be destroyed in order to upgrade the main weapon or trigger special events. However, three of these tiles must be destroyed to activate such power-ups - B creates a temporary barrier around the ship,P upgrades the primary weapon and L gives the player an extra bonus at the end of each stage. Another interesting twist to the game is the Uoru armor; a shadow sometimes appear on the ground and if the player aligns his own shadow with it, then the ship transforms into a powerful robot for a short amount of time. Each stage ends with the same boss battle; a large Mega Argus fortress with a slow flashing core at its center, and the only way to destroy this pernicious mothership is to bomb its core when it is fully exposed. After the boss is taken care of, the player must successfully land on a runway and be cautious not to crash the ship. Argus features nine levels and includes a two-player alternating option.

name: Arkanoid
summary:
NES port of Arkanoid.

The original Breakout concept involves controlling a bat at the bottom of the screen and using it to catch and direct a ball so as to hit all the bricks which are arranged at the top of the screen. It was unpopular for over a decade, before Taito revived it with some new ideas in this arcade game. The game's plot redefines the bat as a Vaus spaceship, the ball as an energy bolt, and the bricks form a mysterious wall stopping the ship from progressing to safety. By the mid-80s, power-ups were popular in most types of arcade games, and Arkanoid features them. They are caught by positioning the bat below them as they fall (meaning that you risk missing the ball if you go for them at the wrong time). The power-ups include lasers (which are mounted to each side of the ship and allow you to shoot out the blocks), a catching device (so as to be able to fire the ball off at a different angle every time you hit it) and one that slows the bolt down.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Amstrad CPC Port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Atari 8-bit port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: ZX Specturm port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: BBC Micro port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Arkanoid is the official Coco version of the arcade hit of the same name. It is a Bustout type game, except much more advanced. Steve Bjork brought out a Bustout style game from his own company called Bash a little bit earlier, that introduced the bricks that have to be hit more than once, indestructable bricks, and brick that drop special energizers (like fat paddle, slow ball speed, magnetic paddle, etc.), but he didn't take it as far as the official Arkanoid, until this version sold on cartridge through Radio Shack came out. Then, he added the aliens coming onto the playing board from the top, and the laser powerup where you can shoot the blocks.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Apple II port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Atari ST port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: AppleIIGS port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Commodore 64 port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: DOS port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid
summary: MSX Port of Arkanoid.

name: Arkanoid II
summary:
Eons have passed... yet despite apparent annihilation in the original ARKANOID game, Dimension-controlling force DOH has come back to life, and occupying the huge spacecraft ZARG, has entered our universe. ARKANOID-type spacefighter MIXTEC runs through long forgotten computer data until it finds the answer to this threat... VAUS 2 is launched and speeds towards the threatening alien presence, before it can extract its revenge... "Arkanoid II"!

Unlike the original game, the sequel was released only in Japan.

name: Arkanoid
summary: Mac port of Arkanoid.

name: ARSP1
summary: A smallish city map with a few of your basic urban ammenities; movie theatre (entrance, at least), strip club, etcetera.

name: Arsenal Online
summary: High-octane 2D shooter. Put your shooting skills to the test with over 200 weapons and attachments. Play game modes solo or co-op online!

name: Architectural Madman
summary: This is a classic puzzle game.

name: Arcana Outcasts
summary: Switch between multiple arcane Shards to outwit and obliterate your enemies in this top-down shooter roguelike. Plan your path with a unique skill tree levelling system, and fight for survival against enemies wielding the same powers as you.

name: Art is dead
summary: Run, shoot, run, and keep running. This 2D top-down shooter doesn't forgive mistakes. Walls affect you and your bullets, but enemies can move through them without trouble. You will need all your senses in the game to win.

name: Arcade Archives: Burning Force
summary:
Pass the graduation exam
to become a glorious space fighter!

name: Arrows and Antiquity
summary: A fast-paced archery-based score-attack set in the crumbling ruins of antiquity. Hone your agility and accuracy as you smash targets across various challenges while wielding unique weaponry and godly powers!

name: Arcanamals
summary: Arcanamals is a narrative-driven, turn-based RPG centered on exploration. Journey across Lanthos, a realm on the edge of turmoil. For ages Arcanamals coexisted harmoniously with humans. But now, a sinister transformation is taking hold.

name: Arcade Archives: Daioh
summary: Arcade Archives: Daioh is a 1993 vertical scrolling shooter featuring traditional shoot-em-up mechanics with challenging gameplay. Players pilot spacecraft through enemy-filled stages, utilizing various weapon systems to defeat waves of opponents and large boss encounters. The game includes two versions: a Japanese version with 2-button controls where weapons switch by collecting items, and an International version offering direct selection from six different weapons using dedicated buttons.

name: Arts & Hearts Academy
summary: Arts & Hearts Academy: first dark academia romantic visual novel with a detective storyline, where you play as an architecture student, and your goal is to win an architectural competition, uncover a mysterious crime at the academy, and find love. Are you ready? Let's get started!

name: ArenaWar
summary: FPS Arena Competitive multiplayer

name: Art of Rally: Australia
summary: Jump back behind the wheel with the Art of Rally: Australia DLC, and buckle up for a memorable off-road adventure as we take you on a tour down under. 6 rally stages & 1 freeroam location. 4 new cars, 2 new tunes.

name: Arena Tails
summary: Arena Tails is a Roguelite 3rd Person Shooter. Players can control heroes with unique abilities and weapons which can level up to unlock rewards that change everytime you play the game. You can play the game alone, or join 4-player Co-Op.

name: Armored Tussle
summary: Armored Tussle is a roguelike twin-stick shooter where you control the elite tomcat battle tank pilots through a series of procedurally generated missions behind enemy lines, completing objectives, collecting upgrades and defeating any enemies that stand in your way.

name: Arriving Early
summary: Arriving Early is a sequel / spinoff of the Running Late series. Includes 15 levels of high octane, heart pounding action.

name: Arcade Archives: Shao-Lin's Road
summary:
"SHAO-LIN'S ROAD" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1985.
Take control of WANPYOU, a student of Chin-Style Shao-Lin martial arts who is being held captive in Jaken Temple, the base of the evil YAMUCHA Gang who assassinated WANPYOU's master, RAOCHUU.
Use your lightning-fast kicks to fight your way to freedom and victory!

name: Archive 1985
summary: Charlie and his childhood friend Jack go on a boat trip that turns into a nightmare. Trapped in a storm...Charlie washes up on an abandoned fishing island...

name: Arcade Asteroids
summary: An official mod of Asteroids for the Atari 2600. This mod changes the graphics to look more like the original Arcade counterpart. It was first released in Atari Flashback 2.

name: Arcade Pong
summary: A second port of Pong for the Atari 2600. It was released first in Atari Flashback 2.

name: Armor Blitz
summary: Armor Blitz is a perfect couch game with friends or go online to battle in various multiplayer modes. Destroy other tanks, grab boosts and navigate through dozens of maps in single player or co-op campaigns; fight other players in PVP or teams mode in this game that hearkens back to the classics.

name: Arcade Asylum
summary:
The Pirate Gamer has trapped you inside the Arcade Asylum with other gamers. Play through a variety of reimagined classic minigames from diverse genres with new-age graphics and unique twists. The catch? You have to be the best across all genres of games to beat out all the other inmates and escape the Asylum.

"Arcade Asylum" is the perfect game for online parties, and competitive gamers who crave a blend of chaotic fun and strategic gameplay. Can you prove your skills and smarts to be the first to escape the Arcade Asylum, or will you become another mad denizen of this bizarre world? The Pirate Gamer awaits your attempt to escape!

name: A-Red Walking Robot
summary: A-Red Walking Robot is a physics based toy robot simulator where you pilot tiny A-Red, a small clockwork operated robot that needs to overcome the trials it’s creator set in a workshop. A miniature nerve-wrecking/patience-proving journey where you are granted to fall… a lot.

name: Arcade Archives: Dinorex
summary:
Dinorex is a fighting game released by TAITO in 1992.
Choose from 6 available dinosaurs and do battle to win the amazoness queen, and the title of Dino Rex: the king of the land!
Acquiring various types of egg-shaped items and weapons can give you an advantage in a battle.

name: Art is Boom
summary: Let's create the art of explosions—different characters, different bombs. It's about the art of detonation and the creativity of crafting new bombs. Dive into the joyous game of various explosions!

name: Arena of Faith
summary: Win,Team up,Get Rewards and become the eSports King in Arena of Faith.

name: Arcane Blood: The Shattered Star
summary: PLAY as Verana, a young witch and master a variety of spells!! DEFEAT bosses sealed away in forgotten dungeons! UPGRADE Verana's health and magic at Angel Maiden Statues! EXPLORE a great forest, dark caves, sandy waste, and even quaint towns!

name: Armored War
summary: Armored War is a hardcore tactical first-person shooter set in the realities of modern conflict. Take part in ground battles using a full arsenal of weapons and equipment.

name: Aron's Adventure: Magic Reborn
summary: A 3rd person action game! Save the world of Elor from ancient evil. Master archery, melee, and mystical abilities with the guidance of an ancient spirit. Fight enemies, solve puzzles, and craft gear. Choose your weapon, face epic bosses, and decide Elor's fate!

name: Arcade Archives: Warp & Warp
summary:
"WARP & WARP" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1981.
Players travel between two worlds as they progress: a space world where they fight with guns, and a maze world where they fight with time bombs.
Try for a high score by taking down the MYSTERY BEM that spawn under set conditions, or by taking out multiple enemies with a single explosion!

name: Arken Age
summary: Arken Age is a VR action-adventure game set in the Bio-Chasm—a terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. Engage in full physics combat using Arkenite infused swords & guns—and freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion's neural corruption.

name: Armored Fox
summary: A first-person tank game.

name: Arkham Detective
summary: Arkham Detective is an immersive and captivating psychological thriller that unfolds within the eerie and otherworldly universe crafted by the master of cosmic horror, H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Ark Odyssey
summary: Ark Odyssey is a top-down arcade shooter that lets you command an army of starships to fight against the force of void! Gather your fleet into formations, and build your team of evolving synergistic compositions. Order your army of Starforce through space and protect the cosmos!

name: Arcade Archives: Scramble Formation
summary:
Scramble into the skies of Tokio! Master the formation change!

SCRAMBLE FORMATION is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1986.
Pilot your phantom jet into battle, capturing enemy planes along the way to enable formation change.
Formations can be air-to-air, air-to-ground or a hybrid of the two, and matching these to counter the enemy is the key to victory!

name: Arena of Taryon
summary: Arena of Taryon is a classic pixel roguelike experience with an immersive story and fun, challenging gameplay! Want to focus on the lore and discover the secrets of our world? Or do you prefer combat and action over dialogue? The choice is yours and you may pick both!

name: Archaic
summary: Stranded on an unknown island, you must quickly learn to survive. You will be hunted down by about 50 different prehistoric creatures roaming around the island and its waters! Strive by gathering resources to craft tools and defenses, and by taming dangerous dinosaurs alone or with your friends!

name: Arcade Game Zone
summary: Dive into the Ultimate Console Arcade Experience!

name: Arcade Paradise VR
summary: Transform the King Wash, a decrepit family-owned laundromat, into a booming arcade business. Get hands on managing the fully gamified day-to-day tasks, from manually picking up gum, doing the laundry, and scrubbing a toilet perfectly clean - to throwing out the trash in a basketball style mini game. Then, take your hard-earned money from completing these tasks to unlock your real objective… buying more arcade units!

name: Arcade Archives: Pole Position II
summary:
"POLE POSITION II" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1983.
The game is divided into qualifying and grand prix. If you make a lap in the qualifying round with a good time, you will advance to the grand prix.
In addition, new courses have been added to this title.
Aim for pole position on four different courses!

name: Artillery Blast
summary: Come and cum! The young ladies feel so uncomfortable, they are trapped inside and can hardly breathe.

name: Arena: Gameboy Edition
summary: Step into the pixelated realm of nostalgia with the AR3NA: Gameboy Classic Edition DLC! This remastered version takes you back to the roots of the original AR3NA, featuring 100 challenging levels that will test your precision and gaming prowess.

name: Arcade Archives: Aero Fighters
summary: The sonic guys are here, risking their lives on eight missions!

name: Arsenal
summary: A small survivors-like about a space girl fighting aliens on the moon.

name: Arlo
summary: Dodge, attack, face thousand of enemies and level-up to survive. 27 weapons with 11 different main attacks and more than 50 equipment. Customize your starter character and face hundreds of enemies rushing to you while you level-up and boost your stats or pick passive attacks.

name: Art Challenge
summary: A quiz game of famous painters.

name: Army Men: Mobile Ops
summary: The main focus of Army Men Mobile Ops is to complete missions by destroying objects, killing enemies, collecting intel from enemy areas, and more. Each type of soldier provides different stats and weaponry. The arena of combat is decently unique. Being soldiers, these hardened plastic paratroopers fight it out on a kitchen table, playroom, hallway, and bathroom, each battlefield littered with household debris that makes for useful cover, or just as obstacles. Crates are at many areas around those battlefields destroy one, and your men may find ammo, medical kits, and others. Crates also can be kicked open to save ammo.

name: Army Men Strike: Toy Wars
summary:
A brand-new version of Army Men Strike is now available: deploy defensive structures, protect your home base from enemy invasions, and experience the thrill of tower defending in the newly added Tower Defense game mode!

Play like a kid, fight like a man in a war without limits! Based on the toy army of your childhood, you must defend your flag against the enemy and attack using a powerful combination of tactics to win the miniature war between your green army and the evil toys! Lead an army of green soldiers, remote-control planes, robots, and many other toys in various epic battles! Defend yourself against the Tan Army invasion and put your strategy to the test. Using your best survival tactics is the only chance to win.

name: Arctic Eggs
summary: A Sci-Fi Cooking game where you take up the role of a Poultry Peddler stuck in Antarctica and longing for a way out. Sell your illegal eggs to those who look hungry.

name: Arc Doors
summary: Play as a prince magically turned into a frog trying to find keys and make it to the exit.

name: Army of Tactics
summary: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the world of Army of Tactics, where strategy and fortune blend into the best mobile game experience. Free to download and thrilling to play, your saga begins on mystical islands, with every battle a step towards glory!

name: Artisan TD
summary: Artisan TD is a Maze-style Tower Defense where you survive by building mazes on over 40 unique maps.

name: Arcade Archives: Solitary Fighter
summary:
GOGOON!
Struggle for No. 1 quarreler in the Violence Fight!

name: Arcade Archives: Mystic Warriors
summary:
Tranquil death and rebirth,
GOKURAKU OUJOU on a mystic night.

name: Arcade Classics
summary: Arcade Classics offers three classic Atari titles. It includes the following games: Missile Command, Centipede and Pong (Ultrapong: both Pong and Hockey). All games have selectable difficulty options. They contain a classic mode as well as a SEGA mode in the Game Gear version, which enhances the graphics and adds new sound effects.

name: Arcade Archives: Cosmo Gang The Puzzle
summary:
"COSMO GANG THE PUZZLE" is a puzzle action game released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
Make sure to line up the cosmos and containers that fall from above to eliminate them.
Containers disappear when lined up horizontally, and cosmos can disappear when hit by the blue ball.
The key to strategy is to rotate the parts well and create a good path for the ball.

name: Arkanoid: Revenge of Doh
summary: Eons have passed... yet despite apparent annihilation in the original ARKANOID game, Dimension-controlling force DOH has come back to life, and occupying the huge spacecraft ZARG, has entered our universe. ARKANOID-type spacefighter MIXTEC runs through long forgotten computer data until it finds the answer to this threat... VAUS 2 is launched and speeds towards the threatening alien presence, before it can extract its revenge... "Arkanoid II"! Unlike the original game, the sequel was released only in Japan.

name: Arcade Archives: Mighty Guy
summary:
"Mighty Guy" is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1986.
Use your PSYCHO GUN in addition to superhuman actions like punches, kicks, and beams to take down enemies and stop the massive supercomputer "ZELDA" in its schemes to genetically modify humanity and take over the world!

name: Arcade Archives: Super Contra
summary:
ALERT! ALERT!
The aliens are back!

name: Art Camion Geijutsu-den
summary:
A spin-off game in the Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu series.

Art Camion Geijutsuden let the player to doll his truck up with pretty paints, colors and designs and motor off into big-rig races against other decorated behemoths. The game features different game modes, the most important one is the story mode in which the player plays a truck driver and defeating different drives provide him with money that he can use to tune the truck, the game features day and night races. The game also features a 2 players Vs vertical screen mode.

name: Area 51: Beyond The Wall
summary: Join the top-secret mission to defend Area 51, the world's most enigmatic military base. With fast paced action, realistic combat, and a dynamic environment, 'Area 51: Beyond the Wall' will immerse you in a thrilling and challenging experience. Play now and see if you have what it takes!

name: Area 37
summary: Area 37 is a 16-bit retro action platform game, set in a post-apocalyptic world dominated by machines, where the protagonist, Pink, risks his life performing dangerous missions to earn money.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Battle Royale F2P Edition
summary: The Iconic Block-Breaker Returns! Embrace for free the intensity of the Battle Royale, thanks to the Eternal Battle Mode, up to 25 players online. Play now for free and try to reach the top of the leaderboard. Additional modes are available for separate purchase.

name: Archer Training
summary: It is an action shooting game from a third-person perspective. Aim for the goal while hitting the target.

name: Architech
summary: Explore a game you design! Team up with the game itself as the player-developer line blurs. Action? Adventure? RPG? Shooter? Tower Defense? Bullet Hell? Easy? Hard? Your game-Your rules. Fire arrows, slash halberds, deploy towers, shoot lasers! Upgrade yourself and the monsters and win your way

name: Archons
summary: Archons is a roguelite / survivor where you control two characters at the same time, the Archons. Upgrade your Archons with different weapons to blast your way through the hordes of parasites and gigantic bosses. Customize your upgrades to build your own unique playstyle.

name: ArcaneOutpost
summary: A strategy game that combines MOBA and Tower Defence, You would control guardians with different skills，building your outpost to fend off enemy attacks.

name: Arcane Weave
summary: Embark as an Apprentice Wizard in a spellbinding puzzle platformer. Engage in turn-based combat against the malevolent Queen Witch, solving puzzles, navigating enchanting landscapes, and using spells strategically. Unravel magical threads to bring lasting peace to your kingdom.

name: Archers on the Hunt
summary: In this game, you will have to fight off crowds of enemies that are coming in large numbers. You play as a ranger, who with the help of a magic bow shoots off the evil.

name: Armored Brigade II
summary: Armored Brigade II revolutionizes real-time tactical warfare in 3D, focusing on the intense combined arms combat of the Cold War era, from 1965 to 1991. Boasting a meticulously researched database and huge real-world terrain maps, this game offers an unparalleled combat simulation experience.

name: Arrowstorm Ascendant
summary: Defeat hordes of dragons and wyverns using your outstanding elvish archery skills. Create the most insane combination of upgrades and get your name into the leaderboards, showcasing all your might and glory!

name: Arsenal Online: Customization Pack
summary: Unlock all Target and Vehicle styles and automatically receive new styles in future updates!

name: Arsenal Online: Skins Pack
summary: Unlock all weapon and attachment skins and automatically unlock new skins in future updates!

name: Arsenal Online: Super Weapons Pack
summary: Unlock all Super Weapons and automatically receive new Super Weapons in future updates!

name: Arcade Archives: Rainbow Islands
summary:
Rainbow Islands is an action game released in 1987 by TAITO. A sequel to Bubble Bobble in which Bubby and Bobby, having returned to their human form, travel the Rainbow Islands using their rainbow magic to rescue the villagers from the clutches of the Boss of Shadow.

Rainbows can be used in various ways, like attacking enemies or as platforms to jump on. This game includes the updated Rainbow Islands Extra, featuring altered difficulty etc.

name: Arrowmania
summary: A low-res 4 key rhythm game inspired by games such as Stepmania & DDR.

name: Arsonate
summary: Outwit the HOST in a death game where fire spreads with each flip of a card. Be the last to burn. Do you fear death?

name: A-Ressha de Ikou II
summary: The second iteration of the A-Train series was released in July 1988 for the NEC PC-9801 and X68000. In the US, it was released under the name Railroad Empire.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou II
summary: The second iteration of the A-Train series was released in July 1988 for the NEC PC-9801 and X68000. In the US, it was released under the name Railroad Empire.

name: Arcade Archives: Silk Worm
summary:
A soaring threat!
Excitement that runs through the earth!

name: A-Ressha de Ikou II: Shin Map
summary: Add-on for A Ressha de Ikō II (a.k.a. Take the A-Train II). Includes maps for Australia, Nile River, Western Silk Road, Eastern Silk Road and Tōkaidō.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou II: 5th Anniversary Special Limited Edition
summary: Released to celebrate the 5th anniversary of Artdink and sold for a limited time. This compilation contains A Ressha de Ikō II and its New Maps add-on.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou III
summary:
Play the part of the head of a railroad company, with the aim of creating a railroad empire, providing a successful mass transit system that will be an inspiration to the rest of the world. Another goal is to provide the impetus for a chosen city to develop. There are a number of different places to set up business each with different layouts and existing houses and businesses.

The main money earners are passenger trains, that can be scheduled to pick up passengers at the times of day when the demand is high. However, in the long term you need the city to develop. This requires setting up trains that transport resources to where they are needed. These resources are used to build houses, and other buildings, increasing the number of passengers for commuter trains.

As the city develops, new businesses will spring up, such as stadiums, high rise office blocks, and ski resorts. The player may also build own businesses, the success of which will depend on the local population, the presence of competing businesses, and even the changes of the seasons, among other factors.

The stock market is also another way of making money. The player may also watch the seasons come and go, with snow visible in winter, and fireworks displays celebrating the New Year.

name: Art of Glide
summary: Embark on a serene and enchanting adventure with “Art of Glide”, a relaxing but captivating game that invites you to soar through an infinite number of idyllic forest environments as a paper plane.

name: Art of Stunt
summary: Art of Stunt is a motorbike game that challenges bike riders on thrilling stunt courses. You can complete some classic action stunts, including falling from the roof of a skyscraper, driving through the glass wall of a building, etc.

name: Army of Ages
summary: You are at war and there will be 50 different units and tower you can use. The task is clear, defend your home base and destroy the enemy. In the game, you can move between different periods in which there will be newer and better weapons. Use your weapons and special attacks strategically and try to eliminate your opponent before he becomes a danger to you. How long can you survive in this excellent defense and upgrade game?

name: Architect of the Union
summary: A tower defense RTS where you are in the middle of the army instead of just overlooking it. Based in an apocalyptic Soviet Union.

name: Artistic Girl 1
summary: Relaxing puzzle game, artistic photo beauty, let you have a good mood.

name: Arrowbound
summary: Bound through a painterly pixel art world on a quest to recover your flock of woodland friends from the clutches of giant eagles! Don't give up, it's only a little higher!

name: Arcade Archives: Master of Weapon
summary:
Master the weapons and take back the post-apocalyptic Earth!

"MASTER OF WEAPON" is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1989. It takes place on an Earth ravaged by a seven-day nuclear war. The supercomputer ‘N’, designed to lead the survivors to salvation, has run amok and the young protagonist, Yukiwo, must make a stand against it! Master a variety of weapons to defeat the mutant monsters and robotic weapons!

name: Ares
summary: A top-down vertical shooter that was released in 2003 for the Timetop GameKing

name: Artificial Life Simulator
summary: Artificial Life Simulator is a relaxing and colorful simulation game where you create artificial life forms based on particle interactions. The particles interact with each other through forces, resulting in unique emergent behaviors.

name: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure
summary: Find your way in a world of breezy, thoughtful puzzles, along a charming journey of self-discovery.

name: Arcade Archives: Jungler
summary:
"Jungler " is an action game released by KONAMI in 1981.
Defeat the enemies wandering around the maze-like stage.
If you hit the tail with a shot, the body will become one length shorter.
To defeat an enemy, either erase their entire body with a shot or hit your head against the head of an enemy that is the same length or shorter than you.
If you pick up the "strawberry" in the stage, you can make your body one length longer.

name: Artifact
summary: Find the Four Artifacts on each of their islands to unlock the secret of this strange and lonely place.

name: Arcana Dimension
summary: This is the story of two girls, Saki and Kaede, who have been transferred to the magic world of "Ecstasia". In order to return home, the girls engage in mortal combat against "magic weapons". Make use of a wide variety of magic and the cooperation between the two girls to defeat powerful enemies.

name: Arcanum Fortuna
summary: Arcanum Fortuna is a tarot-inspired roguelike deckbuilder set in a mystical world of wonders. Explore various enchanting regions, meet a compelling cast of characters and keep an eye on your fate during card battles with a unique karma mechanic.

name: Archie's Ribs
summary: Archie is a little dog on a big adventure. His favourite food is Ribs but he can't have them until they are cooked. Your mission is to pass the time by having fun, taking naps and finding his second favourite food, NugNugs. A game filled with mini games & adventures. Will you help him get his Ribs?

name: Aren't Grim Reapers Supposed to be Scary
summary: You woke up with no memory intact and greeted by two girls claiming they're Grim Reapers. What's more, they tell you you're currently in their world and you're no longer human.

name: Arkade Rush
summary: A game of fast paced cooperative mayhem, as you work to keep an arcade running.

name: Arcade Archives: War of Aero
summary: "WAR OF AERO " is a shooter released by ALLUMER in 1992. The aircraft can be fitted with pods on either side, which can be turned around to shoot up and down. In addition, when the 1P and 2P aircraft are stacked on top of each other, they merge to create a powerful attack.

name: Area 19
summary: First Person Sci Fi Horror Game. Set within a confidential Underground Facility, Navigate through this Abandoned Complex, Discover Government Experiments, Alien Beings, and the haunting aftermath of the Roswell Crash.

name: A-Ressha De Ikou 4: Map Construction & Power Up Kit
summary: Adds the Map Construction mode as well as some new locations.

name: Arena Survivors
summary: Arena Survivors - A bullet hell game about visiting interesting places and destroying everything in sight.

name: Art Inc.
summary:
Ever dreamed about building your own gallery? Maintaining and curating it, picking out which exhibits to show to the public?

You can do exactly that (and more!) with Art Inc - let your wildest art gallery dreams come true! Climb to the top of the world and show off your unique exhibits and world-famous artifacts for everyone to ooh and aah at.

Start as a no-name gallery and level up to become the most epic, first-class, famous place to be. Bid at celebrated auctions to buy famous artifacts: from Ancient Egyptian Mummies, Science Fiction Alien UFOs to Prehistoric Dinosaur Fossils - collect them all!

name: Ark of Charon
summary: Build a mobile fortress on the back of a giant and mysterious walking Tree and embark on a journey in this merge of tower defense and colony simulation.

name: Arcade Archives: Tank Battalion
summary: "Tank Battalion" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1980. Players take control of a tank and fight to protect their HQ from enemies in this predecessor to "BATTLE CITY" and "TANK FORCE." You get more points for taking down enemies at close range, head-on, making risky attacks the key to attaining high scores.

name: Arc TCG
summary: ARC TCG is a 3D fantasy card game. Build your deck and challenge other players in battles full of surprises. Play smart and crush your opponents with powerful abilities. This game is inspired by more successful TCG titles, but adapted to offer new game strategies.

name: Arsene Bomber: Cosmic
summary: With the Bomberman-inpired game dive headfirst into the chaos. Battle up to 4 players, and conquer 6 thrilling modes. The choice is yours! Play solo for a personal challenge or invite friends to join the chaos. – join the hunt now!

name: Around The World: Travel To Brazil - Collector's Edition
summary: An unforgettable vacation in Brazil.

name: Arcade Archives: Mouser
summary:
"MOUSER" is an action game released by UPL in 1983.
Take control of the tomcat Nyanta and rescue his lover Mariya from her mouse captors!
The tricky mice will come at you with all sorts of surprises.
Nyanta will need all your luck and help to make it back with his fiancée!

name: Argyle Manor, Book 1: Away From The Sun
summary: Explore a haunted mansion gallery filled with 3D animated art - and ghosts - to unlock a full-length illustrated audiobook

name: Arcane Chaos
summary: Immerse yourself in Arcane Chaos, the ultimate magic-fueled roguelike. Mastering chaotic spells to vanquish endless waves of foes. Level up, enhance your powers, and experiment with fusing spells to unlock a myriad of potent combinations. Can you navigate the relentless chaos and emerge victorious?

name: Ariko's Enchanted Forest
summary: It's a fun 2D jumping game for kids as well as for adults. The game takes place in an enchanted forest full of witches. Your mission is to collect as many coins as possible and get out of there.

name: Art of Blades
summary: Art of Blades is a hand-drawn top-down isometric simple hack-and-slash. The art is inspired by Japanese manga and anime. The gameplay is a very simple hack-and-slash based on rock paper scissors. Scissors to attack, rock to block, and paper to dodge.

name: Arena Worker
summary: People run, shoot, and obliterate each other in those battle arenas. Keep this place ready for the next mayhem by cleaning, repairing, and restocking its equipment in ever-changing scenarios. And nobody said that you are gonna do it between the rounds.

name: Arcade Archives: Surprise Attack
summary: " SURPRISE ATTACK " is an action game released by KONAMI in 1990. Recover the space station, shuttle, and moon base from the forces of " BLACK DAWN ", an international terrorist group that threatens the universe. The stage is cleared when all the bombs in the stage are recovered and the final location is reached. After defeating the stage's boss, there is a bonus quiz, and if you answer correctly, you will receive bonus points.

name: Arcadia Fallen II
summary: In this sequel to the award-winning roleplay visual novel, Arcadia Fallen, you play as a senior student at Seven Wind’s Academy. Choose from three different magical disciplines, and let your choices shape the personality of your character as they navigate school life during a time of great change.

name: Argus: Urban Legend
summary:
Argus: Urban Legend is an interactive horror thriller mystery game, it is YOUR story. Your decisions do not only affect the course of the game but also the ending of this thriller.

Communicate with different characters via a messenger. Unravel the dark secrets surrounding ARGUS and other urban legends.
It's up to you to collect clues, solve puzzles, and stop the horror.
But watch out because you can't trust everyone…

name: Ario
summary: A fantasy land plagued by nightmares, a common lad trying to rescue his missing mother and an evil forces conspiration to be unveiled. Join Ario in this thrilling adventure where your crossbow and skills will determine the fate of your people.

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - Reaction Forces
summary: When the call comes, nothing is more important than how fast you react. Make use of unique assets in several new game modes and let your quick thinking show while in the heart of action.

name: Armed Forces of Ukraine
summary: AFU game offers you to take on the role of a soldier of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and try yourself in a performance of various missions with a plot. Starting with a banal base defense, to the destruction of the legendary orc`s cruiser.

name: ARC: Antic Runes Combat
summary: Classic 2D Arcade with Gamepad available! You are "Shadow", a lost soul who has the mission to rescue other souls after the great apocalypse. New for Steam Launch, Events and FREE DLC "Underworld" includes in version 1.5.

name: Arms Remix
summary:
Arms Remix is a pseudo expansion for Nintendo's Fighting game Arms. Using the same base mechanics, this mod replaces every weapon in the game with a brand new one, changing the general flow of the game. It also gives new aesthetics for every stage and character in the form of new lighting and new alts respectively.

"Welcome to ARMS REMIX, A brand new way to experience ARMS! Featuring:

- A brand new ARM roster with more a more evenly spread element count!
- Remixed Stages (Stages with changed time of day and even colors!)
- Remixed Alts (A brand new alt for every character!)
- Revamped UI
- and much more!"

name: Arcade Archives: Volfied
summary: "VOLFIED" is a line-drawing action puzzle game released by TAITO in 1989. Pilot the Monotros to drive out the aliens from your home world using the ship’s laser to take back the captured territory. Retake 80% of a stage to win, but be careful the enemies do not come into contact with your ship or incomplete lines while your barrier is off.

name: Ark: Bob's Tall Tales
summary: Get ready for Wild West trains, steampunk airships, post-apocalyptic battle-cars and more in Bob's Tall Tales! Discover new story adventure content, new creatures, structures, items, and cosmetics across the ARKs - all brought to life by big-hero Bob (Karl Urban) and Meeka (Auliʻi Cravalho)!

name: Art-Therapy: Cross Stitch
summary: Perfect for all ages, Art-Therapy: Cross Stitch offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Whether you're a seasoned stitcher or a newcomer to the craft, our intuitive gameplay makes it easy to dive in and start creating your own masterpiece.

name: Arcane Bastion
summary: Embark on an epic journey as a formidable mage, tasked with defending your castle against relentless waves of monsters.

name: Ark: Scorched Earth Ascended
summary: Stranded naked, parched and starving in a vast desert, even seasoned ARK survivors must use all their skills to stand a chance of survival. Tame, breed, and ride the desert's mysterious new creatures including... DRAGONS!

name: Arena Constellation
summary: Fast Paced 3rd Person Skill Based Competitive Multiplayer Game. Arena constellation is bringing back what old competitive games have the best: The gameplay.

name: Arcade Archives: Exvania
summary:
"Exvania" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
The objective is to explode the orb, defeat other rivals, and rescue Princess Electra who is stuck in the final stage.
Break the treasure chests and take the items that come out to strengthen yourself and give yourself a leg up on your rivals.

name: Archer 3D: Bow Shooting Range
summary: Test your shooting and accuracy skills - become the best shooter in the target shooting simulator!

name: Arcade Bowling Go: Board Game
summary:
If you are crazy about ball games or arcade games, you will be attracted by Arcade Bowling Go!

Arcade Bowling Go is a 3D ball game that full of challenges and fantastic rewards. Arcade Bowling Go keeps the characteristic of original arcade game, and has some new game feature with modern. Let’s start Arcade Bowling Go now, enjoy the ball carnival!

name: Army Clash
summary:
Create the perfect formation, increase your army, and tap at the good time to win all against your opponents.
You will be the winner.

name: AR Studio for The Playroom
summary:
Ever wanted to have your own movie studio? Then AR Studio is for you.

Use your tablet or smartphone to create funky banners and holographic billboards, wear funny masks, add your own music and special effects and be the star of your own TV show. You could even start a regular broadcast, beamed directly to “Live From PlayStation”. What will your show be about?

name: Armless Samurai
summary: Your arms may be taken from you, but not your honour. Your legs have become your sword and shield. Run on walls, dive kick & dash into your enemies, parry bullets with your shins. Become a warrior of legend, Armless Samurai!

name: Arcane Array Arena
summary: Arcane Array Arena is a shooting auto-battler game that "Combines Offense and Defense". You summon items in a magic circle and shoot them against your opponent! Create your own unique item builds, compose the most powerful deployment, and defeat your opponents!

name: Arcane Lands
summary: Arcane Lands is an open world game dedicated to building, exploring, and unlocking islands. Explore the island, grow crops, unlock skill, collect pets, use rune to open the way to automation, defeat hidden super bosses, and unlock the secrets of the archipelago!

name: Around the World Mosaics
summary: A nonogram game with 80 puzzles set in 8 countries.

name: Around the World Mosaics II
summary: Another nonogram game with 80 puzzles set in 8 different countries.

name: Artificial Fashionista
summary: Fashion police, open up! Collect clothes, put together fashionable outfits, and impress your captors — for a chance to regain access to the outside world!

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Super Xevious Mystery of Gump
summary:
Decode the mysteries of GUMP!

"VS. SUPER XEVIOUS MYSTERY OF GUMP" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1986.
Take control of the SOLVALOU, a cutting-edge fighter craft, and fight off the XEVIOUS forces to save humanity.
Solve the secret puzzle in each area to make your way to the enemy fortress where their leader GUMP lies in wait!

name: Arrogue
summary: Collect, upgrade and unlock powerful arrows and relics to protect and restore your village. For that you’ll have to fight against procedurally generated hordes of enemies in this turn-per-turn, physics-based, roguelike! Explore the map, find the right path and make decisive choices in random events.

name: Archipelago: Island Survival
summary: Survival simulator on an archipelago of islands. Sandbox with a huge open world. Over 300 different items and resources, over 100 different enemies and NPCs. Elements of trade and RPG.

name: Ardency: Heart of the Rebellion
summary: A fantasy otome game full of love, friendship, and betrayal. In the heat of war, will your love turn the tides of battle?

name: Arena of Trophies
summary: Join the epic battle in an arena filled with gladiators and test your skills in a game where every move can lead to glory or downfall. Collect achievements, refine your strategies, and become a legend in the endless fight for survival and recognition!

name: Army Troop 2: Modern Guns
summary: Army Troop 2: Modern Guns offers intense old-school online PvP battles with customizable soldiers, weapons, and gear. Engage in dynamic combat across diverse maps, with advanced bot integration for non-stop action. Challenge friends or AI opponents for the ultimate FPS experience.

name: Arfgaldt
summary: Argaldt (アルフガルド) is a text-based role-playing adventure published by ASCII in 1984.

name: Arcade Archives: Emeraldia
summary: "EMERALDIA" is a puzzle action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1993. The falling cubes can be crashed by dropping them twice with the same color and bumping them together. The game has three modes: adventure mode to enjoy the story, normal mode to enjoy the puzzles, and head-to head play mode.

name: A Rite from the Stars: Remaster Edition
summary: When the stars descend on Kaikala they choose a young boy to leave childhood behind and become a legend. It’s time for Kirm, a mute but skilled boy, to overcome the challenges that await in the wisdom, courage & spirit paths in this touching story with several endings!

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite
summary: Arena Breakout: Infinite is an ultra-real immersive military simulation. Join a fight to shoot, loot, and raid your path to fortune.

name: Arkanoid vs. the Occult
summary:
Arkanoid is back to fight the evil occult powers in: Arkanoid VS the Occult

Every screen is more or less connected to occult symbolism (or conspiracies). Some of the symbols are quite distorted due to the limitations of blocks per screen
The game now has black blocks (instead of cyan) which do not exist in the original version
The balancing between the stages is a bit wonky, but all stages are completable. Easy mode recommended
Startscreen by Svambo (thx a lot!)
Full 99 level romhack (just the boss stages weren’t edited)

name: Armed and Gelatinous: Arcade Edition
summary:
Armed and Gelatinous: Arcade Edition is a fast-paced competitive multiplayer space-shooter that pits friends against one another in epic battles of blob warfare! Load up on firepower and blast your opponents by sticking weapons to your gelatinous body. But beware that your blob grows larger with each weapon collected making you an easy target for fully-charged Dash Attacks!

Two 4-Player team-based sports modes add some serious replay value to the mix! Trade off playing goalie and striker in Blob Soccer or really put your dash-tackling skills to the test in Blob Blitz! Additionally parties of 4 in Battle Mode can select 2v2 Team Tussle, which turns off friendly fire and combines player scores!

name: Arcade Archives: Numan Athletics
summary:
Four superhumans compete!
8 incredible competitions! !

name: Armalyte: Competition Edition
summary:
Armalyte: Competition Edition is available for the first time ever as a proper C64 commercial release!

One of the best shoot 'em ups ever to be released on the C64 featuring eight levels of frantic shoot 'em up action, requiring nerves of steel and a sharp eye for the invading forces. With stunning and original graphics, animation and tracks of superlative music and sound FX.

The Competition Edition features level-select, adjustable enemy bullet speeds, scrolling demo mode + more!

name: Arcadia Files: Clyde
summary:
The year is 1993.

Clyde Evansdale was murdered.

While it seems straightforward as to who did it and how he died (a bit like a game of Clue) there may, however, be more that's been left unsaid. With the spotty memories of a band ghost, a middle aged detective that needs all the help he can get, and your own intuition; put the pieces of Clyde's life and death together.

name: A Romantic Murder
summary:
You play as Mae (or the name of your choice), a detective pried out of London to investigate the suspicious death of one Henry Graves.

But when you arrive at the dead man's country manor, things aren't quite as you expected. Your clients don't take you seriously, the staff is behaving suspiciously, and the will reading is one step from becoming a brawl.

On the bright side, there's no shortage of handsome men about the place.

Less cheerfully, some of them may shortly become murderers. Or corpses.

name: Arabesque: Shoujo-tachi no Orinasu Ai no Monogatari
Arishia Tale
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting anime-style metroidvania, where each skill unlocks new areas and secrets on the vast map. Face powerful bosses, acquire unique abilities, and uncover hidden mysteries in this ever-evolving world, all with traditional anime-inspired animation.

name: Arcade Archives: Rastan Saga
summary: Save the kingdom of Ceim from the monstrous dragon!

name: Arcade Archives: Tutankham
summary: Seek out the lost treasure of Tutankham!

name: Archean
summary: Archean is a realistic, immersive engineering sandbox and full scale space sim. Featuring Earth 3 billion years in the past, in the Archean eon.

name: Arishihi no Watashi-tachi he
summary: 'Arishihi no watashitachi e' is a "reversed pastoral adventure" set in a world where only lush nature and remnants of civilization remain. In this world, a boy who has lost his memory and a girl dreaming of adulthood weave their future together.

name: Archipelago
summary: Shipwrecked and alone, you find yourself on a surreal reef strewn with mysterious items and bizarre devices.

name: Archer
summary: You play as a guy with a bow and arrow - an archer, if you will - who must search the ... mines maybe... in search of bombs to diffuse.

name: Archer 2
summary: Heavily inspired by Die Hard, Archer 2 takes place in a multi story office building overrun with terrorists! This time there are no bombs to diffuse, but there are a few to set off, and lots of hidden hamburgers to find to restore your health!

name: Arcade Archives: Legion
summary:
"LEGION" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1987.
Operate the "LEGION" an aircraft equipped with a new weapon, the "TIME BOMB", to defeat the Dark Empire.
The "TIME BOMB" can be used to stop time and rewind the enemy's movements.
Also, you can get bonus points if you can put a rescued soldier on the rescue aircraft during the area.

name: Aria Skies
summary: Soar to new heights in Aria Skies, a 2.5D indie fighting game featuring free-flying movement that anyone can pick up and enjoy!

name: Arena of Block Puzzle
summary: A puzzle game The game has no upper limit on points, no time limit, no operational requirements, just thinking about it As the score increases, the difficulty will also become increasingly difficult. Come challenge your brain's limits!

name: Archipelago Explorer
summary:
Your sailing ship has been drifting with the tide for weeks - there is no wind.

Finally you dropped anchor near a chain of islands that you recognise - the Biuso Archipelago. The only information you have about the area is an unfinished book from one of your former shipmates.

You have been chosen to go ashore, figure out which island you’re on, and scope out possible water and food supplies.

name: ArchWilio
summary: Our protagonist finds themselves stranded in a dense forest, desperately seeking your guidance to escape this verdant labyrinth.

name: Arsene Lupin: Once a Thief
summary: Witness the Origins of a Legend - Experience Arsène Lupin's transformation from humble burglar to folklore hero in Arsène Lupin: Once A Thief, a detective adventure game set in the early 1900s.

name: Arisen Force: HeroTest
summary: Experience stylish-action battles and beautiful pixel art, summon heroes across time and space, and challenge the magic tower to save the heroic spirits and goddesses!

name: Archipelago
summary: Archipelago is a fast paced movement roguelike set on a cluster of floating islands. Slash, slice, and dash your way through the sky to challenge the final boss. will skill alone allow you to prevail?

name: Arbo: Arena Tactics
summary: ARBO: Arena Tactics is a sci-fi-themed PvP turn-based tactical strategy/CCG hybrid that pits players in a fast-paced battle of wits and theorycrafting as they command Squads of futuristic Heroes to engage in combat in an interactive hextiled arena.

name: Arcade Space Survivor
summary: Arcade Space Survivor is a minimal Arcade-Styled Action-Roguelike. Fight against waves of different enemies. Collect Exp to upgrade your spaceship. Arcade Space Survivor offers an innovative and unique gameplay experience in the existing action-roguelike genre.

name: Arcane Treasures: Trading Card Game
summary: Build a whimsical deck of cartoon animals to battle foes & uncover special treasures in this cute but competitive online Trading Card Game! Collect trading cards, open booster packs, and complete challenges to expand your collection!

name: Archery Simulator 2
summary: Archery Simulator 2 is a thrilling game that is perfect for those who love to test their archery skills.

name: Architect Simulator
summary: Manage your own architecture firm! Would you prefer to design one skyscraper or many residences, or maybe all at once? Create buildings, beautify the city, sell land plots, manage a warehouse, hire employees, buy real estate, and watch your health.

name: Arcanterra
summary: Step into the mystical realm of Arcanterra and immerse yourself in a world of adventure! Forge bonds with loyal companions as you traverse through mystical lands. Equip yourself with legendary gear crafted through your journey. Engage in combat, unlock new skills and abilities as you grow stronger.

name: Art Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Like jigsaw puzzles? Hundreds of famous painting jigsaw puzzles welcome you to challenge.

name: Arenion
summary: Explore a giant interconnected world riddled with monsters and machines. Ensnared by the convoluted web spun by a dangerous criminal syndicate hailing from a distant land, you uncover a horrifying secret. Will you yield to their manipulation or rise up to fight for what’s right?

name: Ares Breathes
summary: Ares Breathes is a classic survival horror game in which you explore a recently destroyed Martian colony, given shape as a late 90s style low poly game complete with tank controls and static cameras.

name: Arising
summary: First person space combat and exploration in an open world in a variety of star systems. Pilot ships, fight, run missions and trade.

name: Art Diff
summary: Find the differences between the 2 pictures. Many public domain artworks are used to create the levels. Some levels have animation.

name: Art Dash
summary: A short Rouge Like game about shapes and colors, its a shooter about using color to your advantage to pop enemies. Inspired by games like enter the Gungeon and binding of Isaac!

name: Armored Suit Solgante
summary: Lieutenant Will, an armored suit pilot, works diligently to combat threats to the nation. Unfortunately, in his struggle to fight against terrorists, he's implicated in one of the very schemes he's fighting against.

name: Armadillo Assault
summary: Armadillo Assault is an online multiplayer, action-platformer shooter, inspired by the glory days of couch multiplayer fun. Re-creating the magic of local multiplayer in an online environment, Armadillo Assault offers a unique experience for players looking to have a fun online PvP experience!

name: Arkwhale
summary: Arkwhale is a new submarine casual simulator. As the captain of a submarine, you will devise tactics, navigate your vessel, and carry out dangerous missions to annihilate enemies. Experience powerful weapons and advanced underwater technology!

name: Arkhe
summary: Arkhe invites you into a visual novel adventure. Join the stoic warrior Derg and the passionate sorceress Agatha on their first joint mission. Step into the roles of both characters, unraveling mysteries and experiencing the story from dual perspectives.

name: Arcade Archives: Cue Brick
summary:
"CUE BRICK" is a puzzle game released by KONAMI in 1989.
The goal is to move the bricks that make up the ground to form a path for all of the balls to follow. There's no escaping this game once you get hooked. It has a total of 101 thrilling puzzles ready to entrance your brain!

name: Artovya
summary: Dive into the bizarre land of Artovya in a thrilling CCG! Master five distinct factions—Fantasy, Alien, Futuristic, Horror, and Interdimensional. Forge your strategy with unique mechanics and thrilling battles across fantastical realms. Unleash your creativity, build your deck, and dominate!

name: A Ruthless World
summary: Embark on an adventure through a ruthless, 80s-inspired platformer world.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Tetris
summary: Amazing clone of TETRIS from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Botanic
summary: Amazing clone of BOTANIC from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Anteater
summary: Amazing clone of ANTEATER from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Arabian Kid
summary: Arabian Kid is a Japanese Action-puzzle platformer game, developed by Yellow Horn Co and published by ASCII Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Arcade Archives: Fighter & Attacker
summary:
"F/A" is a shooting game released by Namco (now Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
Choose one of 16 mechs and conquer eight stages.
Each mech's attacks are broadly divided into six types, so choose the one that best suits your taste.

name: Ark: Fantastic Tames - Pyromane
summary: Introducing the first of a new series of Fantastic Tames for ARK: Survival Ascended: the Pyromane! Owners of one of this new class of creatures gain access to a wondrous array of useful abilities!

name: Ark: The Center Ascended
summary: The Center is a free add-on for ARK: Survival Ascended that includes a massive new map for survivors to explore. The Center is nearly double the size of The Island, making it about 70 sq. kilometers and featuring a rich, hand-drawn Tolkien-esque aesthetic.

name: Arbor
summary: Become an pioneer, overcome crises and colonize the island.

name: Arcade Archives: Rug Rats
summary: Don't let it escape, germs, suck it up and roll it up! !

name: Arena of Dreams
summary:
Arena of Dreams is a free multiplayer party royale packed with various mini-games.

Survive and Thrive: Be the last one standing! Survive, advance and win medals if you reach the podium at the end of the rounds! Ensure your survival by teaming up in Co-op mode to tackle challenges that can only be found in your wildest dreams. Dive into a surreal and thrilling universe full of fun, action-packed adventure challenges!

name: Armor Battle
summary: A simulator of the handheld game Armor Battle.

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Star Luster
summary: "VS. STAR LUSTER" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1985. The player uses the Star luster “G.A.I.A” to fight the invader “Battura” who is trying to cause a big bang. Defend your base from enemies by switching between Map Mode, where you choose which enemies to attack, and Combat Mode in the battle space.

name: Artificial Gravity Cat
summary: 2D physics platformer! Control a cat in space and gravity itself!

name: Armada
summary: Play as a slimebabe on her quest to face her nemesis, Armada.

name: Argus
summary: Medieval fantasy game about religion and philosophy, featuring yuri and ossan bromance.

name: A Room With a Ghost Girl
summary: Terau Mare is a shy girl moves to Tokyo to go to university, and her new house, Hakusan-so, is like an abandoned. As soon as she enters the room, Mare meets a ghost girl, Furuzaki Yuika. Yuika says, "I'm going to kick you out of here soon." But...

name: Arcade Archives: Rastan Saga II
summary: In a time when might was the only justice...

name: Art of Glide II
summary: Embark on a cozy, endless adventure across the mesmerizing desert landscape in Art of Glide 2. Glide gracefully through the sands, uncovering hidden landmarks as you go.

name: Arashi Gaiden
summary: Arashi Gaiden is a turn-based action game, with frantic combat, in the dash-and-slash style. Arashi is a Ronin from the Pocket Bravery universe, he was hired by his former master, Lobo, receiving the mission of defeating Ninjas and Matilha soldiers to recover 3 powerful relics from Japan.

name: Arcane TD
summary: A maze building fantasy tower defense game.

name: Aruku Rush
summary: Aruku Rush is a game created by Team Y of the Nintendo Game Seminar in 2014. Players control a dinosaur skeleton by moving its legs individually and maintaining its balance.

name: Arcade Archives: Ninja Emaki
summary:
"NINJA EMAKI" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1986.
Take control of the young hero Shinbei and fight to rescue the princess from the evil spirit army.
Pick up scrolls to gain access to 8 different kinds of Ninja Magic. Use them wisely, and they'll be the key to advancing through the game!

name: Art Appreciation
summary: Just another week at the museum for a friendly local connoisseur of beauty, who just so happens to be a ghost.

name: Arcade Archives: Tinkle Pit
summary: "TINKLE PIT" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1993. Your objective: Save Tinkle Land from an evil spell and restore peace to the world! Featuring characters drawn from NAMCO classics and deep gameplay for high score competition!

name: Arc Nova Base
summary: A huge space-station where things have gone awry

name: Art Shop Simulator
summary: Buy and sell art, manage employees, and grow your shop in this immersive simulator set in Europe. Curate a unique collection, attract customers, and become the premier art dealer. Transform your humble gallery into a thriving art empire!

name: Armored Shell Nightjar
summary: Operate Armored Shell Nightjar as you scale a mountain to deliver valuable data.

name: Arcade Archives: Jackal
summary:
"JACKAL" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1986.
"Jackal" is a special force that can survive under any conditions.
Control them and drive your armored vehicle into the heart of enemy territory to rescue prisoners.

name: Armor of Doom
summary: "Armor of Doom" is a TPS game with "tank vehicle" + "MOBA" gameplay. You will use famous active and retired tanks to compete on the battlefield. The game combines the strategic depth of traditional tank battles with the excitement of MOBA games, bringing an unprecedented gaming experience.

name: Arcade Archives: Football Champ
summary:
"FOOTBALL CHAMP" is a sports game released by TAITO in 1990.
Players select their team and star player from one of eight countries in a bid for victory through a series of seven matches.
In addition to playing against the CPU, players can also enjoy playing against each other.
It’s the beautiful game, with all the speed, drama, violence and referee knockouts that any fan would expect!

name: Arkanoid
summary:
An unofficial port of Arkanoid for the LowRes NX fantasy console.

The game includes the 32 levels from the original version, along with the final boss, who requires 20 hits to defeat.
