The levels are arranged to closely resemble those of the original game; however, notable differences exist due to technical constraints. While the original game supported up to 15×15 blocks per level, this version allows a maximum of only 6×5 blocks.

name: Argonauts Path
summary: A card-based combat roguelike. A fantastic adventure of growth and struggle for the future of humanity. You will help in different villages, fight against incredible creatures and fearsome demons until you reach the 7 divine ones and you will fight against them, if you are up to it.

name: Archipel Logic Infinite
summary: Explore archipelagos and chart the boundaries between land and sea in 「Archipel Logic Infinite」. Dive into grid-based puzzles by marking cells as land or sea. Immerse yourself in story-driven puzzles and endless AI-generated challenges for limitless brain-teasing adventures.

name: Arkhaanis One
summary: In this mechanically challenging 2D hack and slash game, survive through waves of enemies in an ever increasing difficulty, having the satisfaction of feeling your improvement as you learn the enemies and adopt new strategies to deal with them.

name: Artifact Seeker: Resurrection
summary: Artifact Seeker: Resurrection is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game. Aurorium continent is just a board of gods game. You can obtain artifacts by slaying enemies. How to use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods? To end the game ? Or just be a god yourself. Artifact Seeker, Your choice.

name: Arcade Archives VS. The Adventures of Valkyrie
Arcade Archives: vs. The Adventure of Valkyrie - The Legend of the Key of Time
summary: Defeat ZOUNA, the incarnation of evil, and restore peace!

name: Artus Against the Demon of the Museum
summary: Artus Against the Demon of the Museum is a point-and-click adventure game designed as an educational game to teach children about classical paintings, their history and creators with its main character Artus de mouse.

name: Arpongi
summary: A two-player competitive pong rpg! In addition to playing pong, both players also gain XP/gold that can be used to level up, spawn units, make buildings, cast spells, etc.

name: Archery Pro
summary: Archery Pro brings life-like, competitive archery straight to your living room through VR! There’s no need for archery equipment to experience the fun of Olympics style Archery with Archery Pro. Simply pop on your headset and experience all the thrills of real-life archery.

name: A Room You Can't Exit Unless You Find the Numbers
summary: You have been trapped in a room you can't exit unless you find the numbers. Let's find the numbers inside the room and escape.

name: Arctic Motel Simulator
summary: Have you ever been to the Arctic? Do you want to open a motel in the Arctic? With the company of aurora, blizzards, polar days and nights, primeval forests, and wild animals, can you turn a run-down motel into a landmark in the Arctic?

name: Arcade Archives: The Final Round
summary:
"THE FINAL ROUND" is a sports-action game released by KONAMI in 1988.
Train to become a boxing champion and win matches against your rivals.
If they hit you, hit them back! Hard Punchers covered in blood, win the hot fights and grab the glory!

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation

name: Arcade Tanks World: Tank Battle Simulator
summary: Welcome to the arcade world of battle tanks! Get into the tank, go to the battlefield and complete all combat missions!

name: Arcade Boot Camp
summary: You play a helmet with legs which wants to improve its arcade gaming skills. In order to achieve this you have to play through a series of mini games which are inspired by popular arcade games of the early 80s.

name: Arch Legends
summary: Arch Legends is a classic RPG full of stories and maps to explore, focused on hunting for treasure and killing monsters. Build your own hero by challenging your limits and join thousands of players on this journey into a dark fantasy world. No micro-transactions! No cash shop!

name: ArkCraft: The Rebirth of the World
summary: In this open-world crafting and building game, you explore an ancient world full of dangers and secrets. Collect animals and plants, build bases and master the craft as you build your ark and save civilization from destruction by the flood and then rebuild it.

name: Arcade Archives: Tecmo Stackers
summary:
"Tecmo Stackers" is a puzzle game released by TECMO in 1995.
Match the falling balls with the same color to make them disappear.
Balls near the disappeared ball will be surprised and stretch left and right, creating an unexpected chain reaction.

name: Arderico's Journey
summary: Arderico's Journey is an interactive fiction adventure that draws inspiration from the fascinating realms of fantasy tabletop RPGs and classic gamebooks, enriched with dynamic character interactions, meaningful choices, and content that reacts to your decisions.

name: Arizona Sunshine Remake
summary: Arizona Sunshine Remake elevates the original, award-winning game, completely rebuilt with GORE-geous VR graphics and next-gen VR combat and weapons. Face the undead alone or with up to three fellow survivors in a post-apocalyptic southwestern America overrun by zombies.

name: Arrival, or Attack of the B-Movie Clichés
Artifact Seeker: DLC 1 - The Legacy of Mortia
summary: New characters, new maps, new boss, new Synergy, new artifacts, new events, and many more new contents await everyone’s exploration!

name: Arcshu: Kagerou no Jidai wo Koete
summary:
Arcshu: Kagerou no Jidai o Koete is loosely related to the greater Arcus series. It is a visual novel created in the parody style, and in the process hits many common pop culture items of the day (movies, novels, comics, animation, etc.).
The story follows the main character, Jeda, through a series of still images and standard adventure-game puzzles and menu-based navigation as the player works through an overlaying mystery. As the story progresses, Jeda finds that there is a hole in his dimension, and the only way to repair this hole is to travel through other dimensions (and time) to seek out a mystical holy sword and a group of CDs that will restore things to their proper nature.
Throughout this journey, there are numerous cameos and other appearances by other Wolf Team and Nippon Telenet characters from various other media (The Valis Series, Midgarts, Final Zone, etc.). Musically, there are also numerous tracks that have been pulled from these same properties (and in some cases comically rearranged) and are used to good effect here.

name: Arcade Archives: The Ninja Kids
summary:
"THE NINJA KIDS" is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Our ninja-doll heroes must battle to save their town from the evildoers who are plotting to resurrect a great evil.
Take control of one of 4 characters, who might look similar, but are as individual as they are colourful, and slice and dice your enemies with justice in your heart, and ninja magic at your fingertips!

name: Arcade Archives: Knuckle Heads
summary:
Serious competition is here.

"KNUCKLE HEADS" is a fighting game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1993.
Join the battle royale “KNUCKLE HEADS” and win cash prizes and fame.
This game can be played by up to 4 players simultaneously.
Choose one of the six very unique and powerful players and survive.

name: Arboneer
summary: Welcome to Arboneer, a top-down survival game set in a verdant forest full of wildlife. Your adventure will consist of chopping down trees, building houses, crafting tools and venturing into deep dark caves to gather valuable materials.

name: Art for Snakes
summary:
ART for Snakes is a single player snake-ish game by Splerp, Cheeseness, and lcl. Be a snake, eat the most expensive paintings you can before the time limit runs out.
"Our gallery provides snake-friendly access to all floors. Please do not climb on or touch the exhibits (unless nobody is watching)."
Use snake-like controls to move through and leap from painting to painting across a branching 4 course campaign.
ART for Snakes is intended to become challenging as it progresses, but for players who'd prefer a more relaxed experience, there is a "zen mode" available that removes time constraints.

name: Arcade Archives: Finalizer Super Transformation
summary:
"FINALIZER SUPER TRANSFORMATION" is a shooter released by KONAMI in 1985
The objective is to operate the variable armor combat system "FINALIZER" and save humanity from the out-of-control "Odes-30i".
Fight while powering up by making full use of the shields, various weapons, and parts that appear during the stage.

name: Arcade Archives: Lead Angle
summary:
"LEAD ANGLE" is a gun shooting game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1988. You control the main character, GEORGE PHOENIX, and fight against gangsters.

Use pistols, grenades, machine guns, and shotguns to defeat the big boss "KING in the final stage.

name: Around The World: Travel To Canada - Collector's Edition
Archers Online
summary: Archers Online combines addictive gameplay, gorgeous graphics, and rewarding progression in one immersive shooter adventure. So, what are you waiting for? Dive into a world of endless multiplayer mayhem and bow-slinging fun, and show everyone who the true archer hero is!

name: Art Strikers
summary: Draw your path to victory in Art Strikers! A unique art themed bullet hell shoot-em-up that looks and plays like a beautiful work of art.

name: Ark: Aberration Ascended
summary: On Aberration, survivors face exotic and extreme challenges within a vast underground biome system upon a derelict, malfunctioning ARK. Survivors will uncover the ultimate secrets of the ARKs, and discover what the future holds in store for those strong and clever enough to survive!

name: Area 51
summary: Area 51, is a 3D singleplayer sci-fi first-person shooter game made with Xash3D engine.

name: Army Moves Overdrive
summary: Reboot of the 1986 classic from Dinamic. Aimed at modern players, in this reinterpretation of World War II, we take control of Derdal, a special operations team soldier, with a variety of gameplay types and many surprises.

name: ArduRogue
summary:
A traditional roguelike for the Arduboy.
Retrieve the amulet of Yendor from the dungeon’s lowest level and return with it to the surface.

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Battle City
summary:
Take down the enemy tank corps and hold your HQ to the end!

"VS. BATTLE CITY" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1985.
Take control of a tank and face down your enemies while defending your own HQ!
The key to victory is to break down walls, create your own routes, lead enemies to fight where you have the advantage, and use the terrain tactically.

name: Arcade Archives: Crime City
summary:
"Crime City" is an action game released by TAITO in 1989.
Crime City is rampant with evil organizations and criminal elements.
Serious crime is an everyday occurrence.
With the local police no longer able to cope, two plain clothes officers are called in: Tony Gibson and Raymond Brody.
Players take control of this duo to solve a series of crimes, defeating the criminals using with a variety of weapons and actions!

name: Armed Decobot
summary: Armed Decobot is a unique blend of Beat 'Em Up and Bullet Hell Shoot 'Em Up mechanics inspired by Treasure and Metal Slug. It seamlessly combines the crowd control & throw heavy melee combat of Beat 'Em Ups with the intense dodge & shoot gameplay of Shmups. It's fast paced, it's difficult, it's chaotic, it's a pure unbound arcade action game! A quick burst of adrenaline to start the day!

name: Areena 4
summary: Gladiator manager game, with goal to win the Riimukallio championship. Matches are turn-based. Gladiators can be equipped with weapons and spells, and their skills improve over time.

name: ArcheAge Chronicles
summary: Explore Auroria, a vast and vibrant world brimming with rich lore and thrilling action. ArcheAge Chronicles delivers an immersive experience that will capture players' hearts, whether they are newcomers to the setting or seasoned adventurers.

name: Aruruu to Asobo!!
summary: Aruruu to Asobo!! is the fourth installment in the Leaf Amusement Soft series.

name: Arcade Archives: Blast Off
summary: "Blast Off" is a shooter released by Namco in 1989. Use the four selectable types of equipment to defeat the resurrected Neo Bosconian. In addition, you can fire a piercing bullet by holding down the shot.

name: Arid Arnold
summary: Arid Arnold is a classic puzzle-platforming adventure, explore 9 unique worlds, travel in time, talk to racoons, go to hell and back in search of the fountain of water. In one world you might be rotating the entire level, but in the next you will need to travel in time, there’s even a few levels where you need to coordinate with a clone of yourself.

name: Arctic Flyer
summary:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a plane based on an Cessna 185 Skywagon.

Embark on an arctic mission and photograph wildlife. Maneuver the plane through the Arctic wilderness and take good photos to document the wildlife for scientists. Every photo counts, so use film wisely.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 1
summary: The beginning of Arena Breakout.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 3 - Enter the Vault
Arena Breakout: Season 4 - Into the Fog of War
Arena Breakout: Season 5 - Road to Gold
Arcade Archives: Moon Shuttle
summary:
"Moon Shuttle" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1981.
Players can enjoy alternating stages in which they destroy or dodge through groups of meteors to reach the goal, and stages in which they defeat enemies with wave motion cannons.

name: Artemis Lutea: District Defender
summary: A Ace Attorney fan game, with seasoned defence attorney; Artemis Lutea!

name: Arktwend: The Forgotten Realm
summary:
Arktwend is a total conversion to The Elder Scrolls 3: Morrowind.

The player begins his adventure in a monastery where he grew up, outside the monastery the whole wide world awaits him. But strange things have happened in Arktwend, shadows roam the land and long-forgotten, old forces are pushing back the power. The age of heroes has begun!

name: Arclight City
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey through a sprawling metropolis teeming with neon-lit streets, clandestine corporations, and an underworld shrouded in mystery. Arclight City combines the allure of retro text-based graphics with captivating modern pixel art, delivering a truly unique visual experience.

name: Ark Odyssey
summary: Ark Odyssey is a top-down arcade shooter that lets you command an army of starships to fight against the force of void! Gather your fleet into formations, and build your team of evolving synergistic compositions. Order your army of Starforce through space and protect the cosmos!

name: Archero 2
summary: The once-great hero has fallen into the Demon King's trap and turned into an even more powerful leader of dark forces! As a new-generation hero, you must master every skill you acquire to embark on your mission to save the world.

name: Archetype and the Four Winds of Hell
summary: Master the four elements, and kill demons. In this short Metroidvania, you play as the Archetype, a legendary elemental master, on a mission to close a portal to hell and end a demon invasion. Learn new abilities, fight demons, and if you fail, be reincarnated with mastery of a different element.

name: Arcade Action
summary:
Arcade Action is a collection of five games which include:

Overtaker: The aim of the game is to drive up the screen passing as many cars as you can in two minutes to get the highest score you can. You can move your car left or right, and increase your speed but you can't slow down and the faster you drive the quicker your score increases. If you hit other cars then you stop which also stops your score increasing.

Missile Man: Based on Galaxians, you must move your craft left or right at the bottom of the screen to blast and destroy the aliens above moving left and right. The aliens will drop missiles on you and occasionally an alien will move down the screen. If you are hit by a missile or an alien then you lose one of three lives.

Spacefighter Pilot: Your crippled Mothership is orbiting a planet but the planet residents are firing missiles upwards to destroy it. You control a crosshair at the top of the screen and you must move left or right and hit the missiles. If your Mothership is hit too many times then it is game over.

Greedy Gobbler: In this Pac-Man clone you must move about a maze eating all the dots while avoiding ghosts who are out to kill you. If you touch a ghost then you lose one of three lives but there are four power-pills that can be eaten to allow you to eat the ghosts for a limited time.

Extra Terrestrial: Your mission is to destroy the whole world before a timer reaches zero. You move across the screen to the right above a map of the world. Pressing keys 1 - 8 fires a missile and the number you press determines the range of the missile.

name: Arcade Archives: Power Spikes
summary:
The long-awaited second instalment of "Super Volleyball" with interesting competitive play!

"POWER SPIKES" is a sports game released by VIDEO SYSTEM in 1991.
This is the second installment of "Super Volleyball", and like the previous game, the controls are simple, but the battles are even more profound with techniques such as timed attacks and feints, as well as new serves added in this game.

name: Arcade Tanks World II: Tank Battle Simulator
summary: The arcade world of battle tanks is in danger again! Get into the tank, go to the battlefield and complete all combat missions!

name: Arcade Room Simulator
summary: STEP INTO THE PAST!

name: Artificial Nexus
summary: Susan has woken up in a strange, coffin-like device, with no memory of who or where she is. Uncover the answers as you solve puzzles to escape the building in this sci-fi mystery investigation!

name: Archery Legend
summary: Unleash your archery skills! Step into the world of precision and strategy with Archery Legend. With 5 unique bows and arrows at your disposal, conquer 50 thrilling levels spread across 5 beautifully themed stages.

name: Artificial Division
summary: Online co-op dystopian casual shooter game with some cyberpunk wibe that has some plot in it. A few quest lines that can be completed solo or with friends.

name: Arcade Archives: Violence Fight
summary:
"VIOLENCE FIGHT" is a fighting game released by TAITO in 1989.
The game takes place in America of the early 1960s . Fighters gather from all parts of the USA to get the winning money and the honor by defeating all their opponents in the VIOLENCE FIGHT!

name: Art Detective: Hidden Through Ancient China
summary: Unveil hidden wonders in masterpieces! Explore Qiu Ying’s iconic paintings with around 700 hidden objects. Relaxing, timer-free gameplay with hints, 6 hours of content. Discover art and mystery!

name: Arcade Manager
summary: Build and manage the Arcade of your dreams. Unlock lots of fully animated games, set their jackpots and build prize zones. Start with a humble local arcade and expand into an major arcade entertainment center!

name: Aria of Song
summary: This is a single player role-playing adventure game, where you need to play as a human and go to a different world to defeat four disaster monster bosses, obtain their disaster core, and ultimately win the game!

name: Arcade Archives: Face Off
summary: "Face Off" is a sports game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988. This is an ice hockey game played using the left and right sticks and the shoot button. Choose your favorite team from 8 types and win the tournament.

name: Arcade Archives: Metamorphic Force
summary:
"METAMORPHIC FORCE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1993.
Four young heroes arise as heirs to the goddess and divine beasts that once fought the dark lord to end his evil reign.
Transform into a beast and use your powers in battle. Unleash your wild side and destroy the enemy forces!

name: Arcane Quest
summary:
Once again, the Empire is in trouble. Obscure forces infest the underground dungeons and threaten the peace of the upper world.
Plunge into the depths of darkness with your team of heroes and fight evil creatures to reach your goal. Courage, bravery, and intelligence will all be needed if you are to succeed.

name: Arcane Quest 4
summary:
The galaxy is under siege as OmniCorp threatens to dominate every planet and harvest the precious Arcane Stones that power advanced machines and weapons.
Unite with heroes from across the universe to form the Galactic Alliance and stand against this formidable enemy in this epic turn-based RPG adventure.

name: Arcane Quest Adventures
summary:
This first spin-off in the Arcane Quest series brings a brand new gameplay style, while keeping the classic board game mechanics that you loved!

Enter this rogue-like adventure in a fantasy world populated with goblins, orcs, undead, and many other terrible creatures.

name: Arcade Archives: Riot
summary: " RIOT " is an action game released by TECMO in 1992. Conquer the stages while defeating the "THE MAGIC TIGERS", warriors armed with special weapons and magic that stand in your way one after another. Enemies appear in the front and back of the screen, so you need to shoot them separately. The key to success is to make good use of various weapons and shields along the way.

name: Artemis Blue
summary:
In 2040, a mysterious natural disaster causes all planes to stop functioning above 500 feet (150 meters) of the Earth’s surface, resulting in over 20 million deaths. The year is 2060 and it is forbidden to fly above this limit. Pilots call this stretch from 500 feet to outer space ‘Artemis’s hymen’. Now a group of people operate a transport agency from the abandoned building that was to be the New Third Tokyo International Airport (nicknamed Edowanzu). They wish to fly higher than what is permitted by aviation laws.

Haru is a cheerful, honest, polite and hardworking girl who always wanted to become a pilot. Following her dream, she went overseas after graduating from high school and earned her pilot license after two years in an aviation school in San Diego. She applied to become a co-pilot and got an interview with the Kubo Air Transport Agency. There she met Katsura Keima, the test pilot who had broken the impenetrable barrier in Project Ikaros five years ago.

name: Ark's Wonder Dungeon
summary: Explore looping halls, chat around the campfire with dungeoneering misfits, and learn to make the most of each turn in this JRPG dungeon crawler!

name: ArgenMu
summary:
Private MMORPG game. +20 years online!

ArgenMU seeks to give the best to lovers of this fabulous MMORPG-style adventure game.

We invite you to join a community with more than 20 years of experience. Whatever destination you choose, at ArgenMu we will always be with you and provide you with the support you need on your new adventures.

name: Arcade Archives: Vs. The Quest of Ki
summary:
"VS. The Quest of Ki" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988.
The objective of the game is to recover the BLUE CRYSTAL ROD that has been stolen by DRUAGA.
The main character, KI, is controlled to reach the top of the tower where monsters are roaming around.

name: Arcane Chaos
summary: Welcome to Arcane Chaos, built with Unreal Engine 5, a fantasy adventure that combines top-down 3D shooting and role-playing! Transform into a cute robot hero, defeat unique enemies, unlock a variety of guns and skill combinations, with light skill construction and roguelike elements.

name: Arcade Archives: Konami's Table Tennis
summary:
Show your brilliance at table tennis!

"KONAMI’s TABLE TENNIS" is a sports game released by KONAMI in 1985.
This title captures the fun and thrills of actual table tennis, where matches hang on split-second decisions that keep your reflexes sharp.
Don't miss your openings, and return the ball with a smash!

name: Arida: Backland's Awakening - Definitive Edition
summary: ARIDA: Backland's Awakening. A story of survival and adventure in the brazilian backlands. Face the drought to explore the more arid regions, gather resources and discover clues about the fate of the young Cícera.

name: Arcane Rush
summary: Arcane Rush is a digital card game developed by Gear Games. Immerse yourself in epic auto chess card battles, featuring a diverse array of heroes and creatures to collect, upgrade, and lead into battle. Build the ultimate team, summon powerful allies, and engage in strategic duels against players from all corners of the realm. With a unique blend of strategy, creativity, and dynamic gameplay, Arcane Rush delivers a novel experience for auto chess and CCG enjoyers.

name: Arcade Archives: Final Blow
summary:
"FINAL BLOW" is a sports-action game released by TAITO in 1989.
Players choose one of five boxers and compete against the remaining four to become champion.
In addition to weak, medium, and strong punches, you can also use switch between low and high blow to take advantage of your opponent's openings.
Step into the ring and face the most fearsome fighters in the world!

name: Ardente: La Grande Guerre
summary:
In 1917, the war is violent on the Verdun front. But you are not one of those heroes who take up arms and kill enemies by the dozen. You are on the front to save the lives of wounded soldiers in the trenches. Fortunately, the invention of the “Little Curie”, a car created to transport radiology equipment on the battlefield, will help save lives where the wounded are dying.

You will drive and move from tent to tent to help doctors on site. But be careful, war is all around and the number of wounded is significant. Most will die, whether you like it or not.

Now the real question is : who are you going to save?

War isn't won with feelings and your choices will have consequences. Everything is going very fast and the slightest hesitation can be fatal for you and others.

You alone cannot change the course of war, but you can change the fate of many families.

name: Arisen Force: Life Devotee of Wukong
summary: Enjoy a free-to-play, stylish action combat experience as you explore a chapter storylines from Journey to the West.

name: Art With Friends Free
summary: A mobile game to draw, guess, and share with friends. Similar to Draw Something.

name: Arobynn: Sword of Adventure
summary: [Sword Art Online]-Like | Welcome to the adventurer's guild! Fight, explore, and grow stronger in this VR world (keyboard and mouse support coming soon!).

name: Art Detective: Hidden in Gusu
summary: Step into the vibrant world of Qing Dynasty Suzhou with Art Detective’s latest chapter. Discover over 400 hidden objects as you unravel secrets and immerse yourself in a stress-free, artful adventure.

name: Arcade Archives: Fantastic Night Dreams Cotton
summary: Fantastic Night Dreams Cotton is a 1991 shooter where players control Cotton, a witch navigating through the fairy world to defeat beast hearts using shots, bombs, and magic attacks. The game features accessible gameplay mechanics designed for both experienced shooter fans and newcomers, with cute character designs that broaden its appeal. This arcade re-release includes adjustable difficulty settings, authentic arcade display options, and online leaderboards for competitive high-score challenges.

name: Arcane Beak
summary: This game was made for VimJam #5 by Róger Goulart. The Jam's focus was RACING and the theme was ESCAPE, with the following optional challenges: 4 color palette, only animal characters and mouse only. I couldn't do everything I wanted, but the game was fun and challenging.

name: Arcane: League of Legends - Ready to unlock the world of Arcane?
summary: Arcane: League of Legends - Ready to unlock the world of Arcane? is a promotional online quiz game by Red Bull based on the Arcane: League of Legends series.

name: Arms of God
summary: Gear up for an epic battle through hell in this next-gen autoshooter with Doom-inspired gore vibes, roguelite mechanics, and a deep, satisfying combat feel. Wield five weapons at once, upgrade and merge them to forge indestructible builds, and bring divine justice to a world on the brink of chaos.

name: Arcane Drifter
summary: In this real-time card battler, you arrive in a once-prosperous mining town where the children have vanished and folks who venture into the mine never return. Explore the depths, craft powerful card synergies and save the town.

name: Aris Arcanum
summary: Clyde Colergrave is a Librarian, laboring away in the Aris Archives. Bound by his Knowledge, he is trapped with the festering Ink among the occult stacks of Aris. A unique Victorian roguelite awaits, where a desperate scholar uses Atramancy, the Magic of Ink, to spellcraft his way to salvation...

name: Arenum
summary: The war between the Omega and Theta galaxies cannot be resolved in favor of either of the two contenders and so it was decided to have the two best pilots of their respective armies face each other in a duel to the death. These two drivers are you and a friend of yours who will have the courage to face you. The weapon supplied for both is a starfighter with two laser cannons. The location is the boundary between the two galaxies. The hour is twelfth. You can fight each other across the entire screen and the player who hits their opponent twenty times wins.

name: Are You Kidding Me?
summary: A slice of life adventure with a collection of narrative driven micro games all about the inhabitants of Nowhere Space - where all lost and forgotten things end up.

name: Arcade Archives: City Bomber
summary: It's a frantic chase scene to escape!

name: Archer Maclean's DropZone: 40th Anniversary Edition
summary: Celebrating a Retro Classic: The Return of DropZone in "ARCHER MACLEAN'S DROPZONE - 40th ANNIVERSARY EDITION"

name: Arena Warrior
summary: Jump, Slide and Wallride your way across a multitude of arenas fighting off waves of enemies using different weapons and movement equipment to survive. Fight epic bosses and gain new abilities to strengthen your run in this fast past rouge-like arena fighter.

name: Arcade Archives: Viper Phase 1
summary:
Heroes will surely return.
Carrying the hope of the entire galaxy.

"VIPER PHASE 1" is a shooter released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1995.
While the game system is orthodox, the extremely high quality of this popular title has made it a favorite among shoot'em up fans.
This title includes both the "OLD version" that was in operation in the early days and the "NEW version" that was rearranged later.

name: Arena
summary: This is an arena FPS set in a futuristic setting in which the objective is to decimate armies of robots.

name: Archaeology: Sand Fantasy
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Aritas: The Demon Lord
summary: Explore a world of magic and adventure in the world of Aritas and defeat the Demon Lord! Play alone in single player or with friends on LAN in this classic-inspired RPG!

name: Architect
summary: Architect is an unlicensed software utility released, apparently, for or with the Dr. PC Jr. (a Chinese Famicom clone system). The game plays like a drawing tool using pre-created bits of architecture. The building most commonly shown is a Chinese or Japanese-like pagoda or temple.

name: Arima Lodge
summary: Arima Lodge is a free, 5-minute, fixed-camera short story that takes place entirely inside an elevator. It features limited dialogue options from Kai's perspective, and on-screen QTE events to open and close the elevator doors when a new character enters.

name: Arkanoid
summary:
Port of Arkanoid for Amiga.

Arkanoid is an arcade game developed by Taito in 1986. It expanded upon Atari's Breakout games of the 1970s by adding power-ups, different types of bricks, and a variety of level layouts. The title refers to a doomed "mothership" from which the player's ship, the Vaus, escapes.

name: Arachne's Stone
summary: Arachne's Stone is a horror RPG Maker game about the backstory of a strange lad who wants to steal the "Wishing Jewel" from a house owned by the hungry arachne. There are seven endings, and you must clear them all to unlock the epilogue.

name: Arsenic & Absinthe
summary: Arsenic & Absinthe is a blend of a chill bartender simulation with narrative-driven story. The player takes on the role of "Sylene", a bartender who recently began a new life; making drinks, serving unusual recipes of art, and listening to the stories of working-class customers. A simple life, however, is merely a dream for her as her haunted past returns. The player has to explore the night city and solve the pre-midlife crisis while getting caught in the notorious "Snow White" murder case once more.

name: Arras.io
summary: Arras.io is a fan-made sequel to the 2D MassiveMultiplayerOnline game Diep.io. The gameplay is similar to the game it's based on; at the start of the game, the player controls a simple Tank, and can kill Polygons and defeat enemy players to level up, upgrade into stronger tanks, and get points to upgrade their Stats. However, there is a lot more content than Diep.io and is updated much more frequently. After the many years of development and growth, Arras.io has evolved into a totally different game that is no longer just a "Diep.io clone".

name: Archwizard
summary: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Dimension Fortress Macross
summary:
"The Super Dimension Fortress Macross" is a shooting game released by Banpresto (now Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
This title is based on the film "The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?".
Pilot the VF-1 Valkyrie, a variable fighter that can transform into three different forms using transformation items and equip optional parts. Use shots and reaction bullets to battle the enemy Zentraedi forces.

name: Arcade Archives: Warrior Blade
summary:
Hear the murmur of fate:
“Go forth hero, to the kingdom at the end of the earth!”

WARRIOR BLADE is a beat ‘em up game released by TAITO in 1992.
Rastan the thief and his allies set out for Depon, at the ends of the earth, in search of the treasure said to hidden there.
This is the third game in the Rastan series, released in arcades as a two-screen cabinet, allowing for an enlarged play area and driving soundscapes to enhance this spectacular action adventure!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 7 – Secured Gear No Fear
summary:
Arena Breakout is available for download worldwide with the new Season 7 update, ""SECURED GEAR, NO FEAR"". Download and enjoy the latest shooter with tens of millions of players around the world! Eliminate adversaries head-on, with stealth, or bypass the bullets altogether. Players have the freedom to fight however they desire. Escape the combat area alive for a chance to strike it rich, but be prepared to fight for survival.
Please note that your feedback will be processed by the Arena Breakout team for improving the game, responding to you, and/or providing support and troubleshooting, such as addressing and remediating technical issues and bugs.

name: Arcade Archives: Castle of Dragon
summary:
Go forth, with the power of love!

"CASTLE OF DRAGON" is an action game released by ATHENA in 1989.
Two young kings set out on a journey to a castle inhabited by dragons in order to save a princess kidnapped by a ferocious dragon.
Use your shield to defend against enemy attacks, or move between the two lines of paths at the front and back to create an advantageous situation in the battle.

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Family Tennis
summary:
Use a variety of shots to confuse your opponent and seize victory!

"VS. FAMILY TENNIS" is a sports game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1987.
Choose yourself and your opponent from 16 unique characters and start the match.
Toy with your opponent by hitting shots of different speeds and heights.

name: Arcade Archives: Escape Kids
summary: " ESCAPE KIDS " is a sports-action game released by KONAMI in 1987. ESCAPE KIDS has only one rule: run faster than everyone else. Use the “RUN” and “SUPER JUMP” buttons to win the future superhero race.

name: Arcanum: Theory of Magic
summary: This is an idle browser game based around improving as a wizard.

name: Arcane Afterfall
summary: A 2D MMORPG with turn-based combat, dungeons, PvP, PvE in a unique world with story driven content.

name: Arvis Punch
summary: Become the best boxer by training and fighting with all the boxers and immersive elements. Test your senses and enjoy real boxing simulation at your fingertips.

name: A Robot's Tiny Adventure
summary: A Robot's Tiny Adventure is a calming, short and peaceful game where you take on the role of a tiny robot created to help others. Explore a small open world at your own pace, interact with NPCs and help them solve their problems, while enjoying a relaxing experience focused on exploration.

name: Arcade Archives: Final Star Force
summary:
"FINAL STAR FORCE" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1992.
Two thousand years after the previous work, you will take on the final battle against the resurrected nemesis, GORDESS.
Your ship Final Star II will gradually power up over time. Strengthen it to the maximum to obtain unrivaled strength!

name: Artifact Seeker
summary: Artifact Seeker is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game.You can obtain artifacts by slaying enemies. Use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods or to end the game ? Your choice.

name: Ariana and the Elder Codex
summary:
The Librarian Ariana’s mission is to repair the Seven Hero Codices, which have been altered. Due to the terrible damages, magic has vanished from the world.

By utilizing special Librarian magic that allows her to enter Codices, Ariana seeks to mend the books to bring back magic. Can Ariana safely repair each tome and unravel the mysteries hidden within the Library?

name: Articrafty
summary: What will you create? Combine realism and fantasy. Combine characteristics with abilities. Create unique items. Achieve "Legendary" mastery. Breathe life.

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Fox
summary:
THUNDER FOX is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Become a member of the "THUNDER FOX" anti-terrorism team and join the fight against the terrorists.
Complete varied missions using flying kicks, somersault attacks, and multiple unique vehicles such as gyrocopters, jet skis and more!

name: Aralez
summary: This game is based on aralez from Armenian mythology, winged canines that lick the wounds of the dead in order to revive them. Explore each level and do minigames to revive the fallen.

name: Art Spotting Co-op
summary: Art Spotting Co-op is a casual game about spotting the difference between several art pieces together with a friend while listening to relaxing music. A controller is not required for local co-op play.

name: Armored Hongfeng
summary: "Armored Hongfeng" is a TPS game with "tank vehicle" + "MOBA" gameplay. You will use famous active and retired tanks to compete on the battlefield. The game combines the strategic depth of traditional tank battles with the excitement of MOBA games, bringing an unprecedented gaming experience.

name: Arcade Archives: Märchen Maze
summary: “MARCHEN MAZE” is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988. Control the main character, Alice, and take back the Mirror Country, which has been conquered by the evil queen. Use soap bubble attacks and jumps to advance through the area and defeat the boss waiting at the end.

name: Armored Core
summary:
ARMORED CORE marks the beginning of the mech action and customisation series.

Choose and freely combine from a huge number of parts, including head, core, arms, legs and weapons, to create your own original mech before taking it into combat.
The world has fallen to ruin in an all-out war known as the Great Destruction. With countries and governments extinct, and humankind driven to underground cities, corporations soon ignite a vicious battle to reinstate the surface. Play as Raven, a mercenary piloting the humanoid war machine, Armored Core (AC), and carry out a variety of missions.

name: Armored Core: Project Phantasma
summary:
ARMORED CORE PROJECT PHANTASMA is the 2nd entry in the mech action and customisation series.

A Raven operating out of Isaac City receives an unusual request. Not only is the request both vague and cryptic, stating simply: "Infiltrate the underground urban complex, Amber Crown,", but it also bypasses normal channels of communication and is sent directly to the Raven in question, without anyone else seeing the message. No sender name or corporate affiliation is mentioned, but the monetary reward promised is massive. Because of the amount, the mission will obviously be intensely dangerous, but Ravens aren't the type to shy away from any challenge. With interest piqued, the Raven climbs into the AC and heads toward Amber Crown.

name: Armored Core: Master of Arena
summary:
ARMORED CORE MASTER OF ARENA is the 3rd entry in the mech action and customisation series.

Behind the scenes in Isaac City, two corporations are embroiled in a vicious fight for control and supremacy over the general populace. During one of the most violent encounters between the corporations, a large number of innocent civilians are caught up in the chaos and perish. One survivor, a young man, loses his entire family. A few months later, the embittered survivor decides to take action and exact revenge; his target is the pilot of an AC. That pilot is simply known as "Hustler One", and he pilots the AC around which events on that tragic day played out. In order to discover more and track down his quarry, the young man seeks out recruitment with the Ravens' Nest. And so, another Raven enters the fold…

name: Ark: Bob's Bundle
summary: Two epic ARK adventures in one bundle? You bet! ARK: Bob's Bundle is the ultimate deal. Get ARK: Survival Ascended & Bob's Tall Tales now!

name: Arcade Archives: Kitten Kaboodle
summary:
"KITTEN KABOODLE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1988.
The main character is a cute cat! The objective is to defeat enemies, collect keys, and advance to the next stage.
Sometimes you can find the entrance to the secret stages. You may find various ways to play, such as shopping at secret stores or getting rich at the casino!

name: Ark: Survival Ascended - Fantastic Tames: Dreadmare
summary: Shrouded in darkness and whispered about in legends, the Dreadmare is a creature of myth and nightmare. Use its uncanny abilities to control the battlefield, weaken your enemies, and strike from the shadows, as you ride into the apocalypse together!

name: Arithmetic
summary: A revolutionary puzzle game combining box-pushing and math operations! Slide number crates, merge targets with +-×÷, and challenge your logic & arithmetic skills

name: Architekt
summary: Architekt is a compilation of 8 limit-removing maps for Doom II made by the French Doom Community during a special speedmapping event led by Astelan and Gromat! This event, which took place on the Discord of a Doomer called “Panzy”, brought together 8 mappers of vastly different skills with the main goals being castle themed and a cyberdemon must be your best friend.

name: Archery Simulator
summary: Take your bow and start the adventure to reveal the big secret!

name: Arcana
summary: The ultimate Power Fantasy for anyone who has dreamed of being a powerful wizard! Obliterate waves of deadly foes by harnessing the powers of Fire, Frost, and Arcane magic, while you build out your ultimate wizard arsenal to take on the armies of darkness!

name: Art of Evil
summary: Art Of Evil is a roguelike horde survival game set in the medieval Dark Ages. Use magic to burn, smash, electrocute, freeze, explode or turn your enemies to stone in tense single player or exhilarating on-line coop with your friends.

name: Around the World 2: Travel to Canada - Collector's Edition
summary: An unforgettable vacation in Canada.

name: Art of Glide 3
summary: Spread your wings and discover the beauty of a boundless world, one landmark at a time.

name: Arcane Dice Wars: A Villain's Heart
summary: Welcome, Transient One . Brought forth from another world and free of the gods, you alone hold the key to granting a person's deepest desire . If this person happens to be a villain, will you indulge their dark side or try to change their fate?

name: Arcade Archives: Othello
summary: Othello is a 1984 digital adaptation of Reversi featuring straightforward rules that demand strategic depth without relying on chance. Players flip opponent pieces by sandwiching them between their own, aiming to control the board through tactical positioning. The game includes practice tools such as move evaluation and undo functions to help players develop their skills. This arcade re-release offers adjustable difficulty settings, authentic arcade display options, and global leaderboards for competitive play.

name: Arthur Loves Watermelon
summary: Arthur Loves Watermelon is a unique 2D Platformer where you help a little squirrel named Arthur to recover the sacred watermelon tree from an evil witch.

name: Arcane Board
summary: Collect magical tiles and deploy them strategically on your Arcane Board in this Roguelike + Tetris-like Deckbuilder. Set up combos and unleash them at the right time—whether offensively, defensively, or to build your power. Master and learn the secrets of the board.

name: Argebe
summary: A deliberately simplistic strategy game about equal opportunities and outplaying your opponents with stone cold logic

name: Ardu-EZ Button
summary:
Introducing the latest and greatest in self-affirmation technology!

The Ardu-EZ button is the perfect way to relish your daily successes! Just one press and you’ll be greeted with a satisfying reminder of the ease with which you dispatch even the most pesky problems. But a veteran problem-solver like you won’t need only one press, so the Ardu-EZ button is built to withstand rapid dispensing of self-validation. And no matter how many quandaries you navigate, the Ardu-EZ button will keep a satisfying tally of each victory.*

Go forth and conquer your day!

*No more than 999 victories officially supported, tally not retained over power cycles.

name: Aralunis
summary: A princess in search of her hero and an epic journey against darkness. Uncover enchanting biomes in pixel art, from forests and mushroom fields to icy mountains and shadowy realms. A casual and relaxing experience for fans of 2D platform adventure

name: Armored Aces
summary:
ARMORED ACES is a free team-based multiplayer 3D online tank battle game for mobile devices.

Join the armored force of tens of thousands of real players and drive into ferocious team deathmatch and special Capture The Flag mode battles!

name: Arcade Archives: Dead Connection
summary:
Once you see, there’s no turning back!

"DEAD CONNECTION" is an action shooting game released by TAITO in 1992.
As part of a special team of law enforcement officers tasked with eradicating the evil that has infested big city, you must gather the evidence needed to take down the Nerozzia crime family.
Armed with only a badge and a gun, can you lift the veil of darkness that lays across the city?.

name: Arctis
summary: A turn-based survival strategy game where players must lead their group of characters through an arctic landscape while exploring and dodging or confronting threats. The map consists of a series of rotating concentric circles, so it is never static between turns.

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Mystery Tower
summary:
"VS. MYSTERY TOWER" is an action puzzle game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1986.
The Mystery Tower is an ancient structure full of secrets that stretches up to the heavens. You play as an archaeologist, seeking its peak on an adventure.
Stack blocks to stand on as you make your way to the goal. Can you solve all the puzzles along your way to the top?!

name: Arcanorum
summary: Fly around in medieval time and attack enemies by circling your ship with the mouse.

name: Art Gallery Tycoon
summary:
Art Gallery Tycoon - receive a palette of various kinds of arts!

Art Gallery Tycoon - a unique game, which allows players to receive a palette of various kinds of arts! You will get more than 400 art pictures!

You will also have an opportunity to create your unique picture by using your photo: just upload your photo and draw it!

After completing of your picture, the auction will be held and bidding for customers, which want to buy your works. Try to earn millions dollars and to become the most popular artist in a world!

You have your own artist room, which you can improve by earning money from sales of your works.

Buy instruments for drawing (canvas, paints, brush) and let's go!

name: Arcade Archives: Juno First
summary:
"Juno FIRST" is a shooter released by KONAMI in 1983.
Operate your own aircraft to defeat countless approaching enemy UFOs and conquer the WAVE.
In an emergency, you can use warp to evade enemy attacks.

name: Arcas Champions
summary: Apes with Fruit Guns! Train and collect ape champions, equip weapons and glide into epic online battles in a unique third person ability shooter. Combine totem abilities with friends and dominate the jungle planet in thrilling game modes whilst climbing the leaderboards for glory.

name: Arcade Archives: Senkyu
summary:
Aim for the winning SENKYU KING!!

"SENKYU" is a puzzle game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1995.
The game is played by connecting four or more balls of the same color and erasing them to create a chain of four or more balls of the same color, aiming for a high score.
In addition to the SKILL TESTER MODE where you can judge your own skill, you can also participate in the SENKYU tournament and aim for the victory in the NORMAL MODE, as well as engage in 2-player versus battles.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 8 – Frozen Frontline
summary: Arena Breakout's Frozen Frontline is coming to Season 8! A snowstorm has arrived in the Dark Zone, and an icy battle is about to begin in snowy Northridge. New modes like Gold Loot Drops guarantee red loot, Secure Ops is now permanent, and the new Forest Crisis event puts you in the boss's shoes!

name: Artifact Escape Room Bundle
summary: Play an epic escape room trilogy where puzzles, mystery, and adventure collide in the search for an ancient artifact.

name: Artificial Fashionista: Summer Collection
summary: A set of 35+ new Summer-themed items for Foris to wear!

name: A-Rabbit
summary: This is an original Japanese style slot machine! Reels are stopped by internal flag and your operation. BONUS will be hided at first when you get it. Find out BONUS by patterns, effects and navigation with knowledge and technique, like playing a puzzle game!

name: A Regular Store
summary: As a new staff member of "A Regular Store", you're job is to complete tasks such as locking the doors, filling sections of the store, grabbing cash out of the register, etc. But as you do so, horrific events occur, and you learn the horrors of the store's past.

name: Argonauts Agency: Gorgon Medusa - Collector's Edition
summary:
Jason and Medea are on a mission again: the famous relic collector Pelias asked them to retrieve the artifact that protects against Medusa's gaze. Without hesitation, the Argonauts set off on a journey to recover the artifact, save the cursed people, and find new friends. Explore the world, gather resources, and help the heroes lift the curse, using your time management skills and strategy to stop the curse and defeat the evil!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
Complete the exclusive bonus campaign!
View concept art and replay your favorite tracks on the music player!

name: Artifacts of Eternity
summary: Return to the past in Artifacts of Eternity. Something terrible has happened - most of the artifacts collected during your last time travel journey are missing. Your grandfather needs your help again in this match 3 game.

name: Aracore Astromining Ventures
summary:
Hailing from one of the many slum communes of Mars, a young pilot is given a chance as a mining pilot for an upcoming corporation. The chaos of unregulated mining in the outer asteroid belt has our pilot flying dangerous missions to collect precious metals, salvage debris, and explore space in order to earn enough to help their community back home. With fellow pilots, CEOs, rival corporations, and freedom fighters, everyone has their own agenda, but what path will our pilot choose?

Explore over 20 mission locations, discovering their riches and secrets. You'll find, mine, break down, and haul precious resources from asteroids into your cargo, earning commission, but will you use your pay to help your community, yourself, or something more? As you converse with your bosses, colleagues, and rival factions, you'll discover more about the world, but be wary: actions have consequences: what you do, or fail to do, in a mission will dictate future missions and the direction of the story

name: A Rally of Trust
summary: A Rally of Trust is a heartwarming story of teamwork, faith, and growth, both on and off the court.

name: Arthur Owl's Word Block
summary: Meet Arthur Owl and his clever game Word Block. With around 200 included puzzles and even more in downloadable packs, you'll have plenty to do! If you're addicted to games like Wordle and love VR, this is for you!

name: Artius: Pure Imagination
summary: Artius is a fast-paced, momentum-based 2D platformer where you play as four unique artists fighting to preserve creativity in a world on the verge of artistic extinction. Dash, swing, and smash your way through vibrant, hand-drawn worlds inspired by art!

name: Arcade Combat
summary: If the world of all video games collapses, who wins the battle between them? Protect your video game assets and destroy them.

name: Arcade Reflex
summary: Arcade Reflex blends classic arcade feel and modern twists. Control a paddle through fast-paced, evolving levels that start simple but quickly ramp up, testing your reflexes. With minimalist retro-inspired design and surprising depth, it's perfect for quick sessions. Ready to climb the leaderboards?

name: Arcane Ascent
summary: Build powerful decks to face the chaos unleashed by the Primeval Witch. With hundreds of combinations available, perfect your strategy in every battle, strengthen your cards and unravel the mysteries that await you - your rise to power begins now!

name: Arcane Raiders
summary: Team up with your wizard friends to pillage the magic tower! Create elemental synergies, defeat powerful bosses and claim the tower's treasure in this rogue-like dungeon-raider.

name: ArcArg
summary: It is a turn-based TCG game where the player participates in the "Arcarg" match held in the city of Lars. Become Mari and Betty and meet the characters in the cards!

name: Archaeology: Frozen Knights
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Frozen Village
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Frozen Wall
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Medieval
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Post-Apocalypse
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Sand Japanese
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Arcade Archives: Land Sea Air Squad
summary:
"Land Sea Air Squad" is an action game released by TAITO in 1986.
Players take on the role of Sergeant SARGY and advance through rounds destroying enemy fortifications.
In addition to hand grenades and machine guns, make full use of super mechs to break through the battlefield.

name: Around the World 3: Amazing Countries
summary: An exciting journey through the most scenic places in the world: hidden objects, mini-games, puzzles, and countless discoveries. Feel the spirit of adventure and explore new horizons!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Ridge Racer
summary:
"RIDGE RACER" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1993.
Experience the essence of virtual reality using the 3D CG system "System 22."
This game has four modes to choose from, including three difficulty levels - NOVICE, INTERMEDIATE, and ADVANCED - as well as T.T. (TIME TRIAL), where you compete one-on-one against a rival car to achieve the best time. Additionally, a DX version featuring support for an H-shifter and clutch is also included.

name: Arctic Wolves
summary: Arctic Wolves is an open-world action game that blends the charm of wolves with high-energy combat scenarios. Customize characters and homes for a fully personalized experience, giving you ultimate freedom to shape your adventure.

name: Are You Happy
summary: Short psychological horror experience

name: Arkadia
summary: Explore Arkadia. Confront the evil beings, uncover their schemes, and fight for justice. Strategize and strengthen your characters to achieve victory.

name: Ark Nova
summary: Plan and build a modern, scientifically managed zoo to support conservation projects in an acclaimed strategy board game.

name: Ars Goetia
summary: In ArsGoetia, a thrilling platformer, you must navigate through treacherous traps and perilous landscapes to rescue kidnapped children and escape a dark, mysterious realm. Can you overcome the dangers and save them all?

name: Arthur Owl's Word Block: Large Pack
summary: 20 large puzzles

name: Arthur Owl's Word Block: Adult Pack
Arthur Owl's Word Block: Hard Pack
summary: 20 hard puzzles

name: Arthur Owl's Word Block: Movies and TV Pack
summary: 20 movie/TV puzzles

name: Arthur Owl's Word Block: Video Games Pack
Arthur Owl's Word Block: Music Pack
summary: 20 music themed puzzles

name: Arthur Owl's Word Block: Unlimited Hints
summary: Grants unlimited hints! Also unlocks every puzzle you have available, including the player-created packs.

name: Arc Tracker
summary: Guide A.T. to the target, moving only in circular orbits. With various play modes and levels, it has challenges ranging from brain-teasing puzzles to challenging controls, and sometimes just simple fun. Easy to learn but hard to master, How about trying for a perfect clear for all levels?

name: Arete
summary: Arete: The Battles of Alexander the Great is a classic hex-and-counter digital wargame where you'll relive the Macedonian king's most epic battles, from fighting alongside his father in Greece to climactic clashes with Darius in Persia to battling warlords at the extreme fringe of the empire.

name: Argonauts Agency: Ares Games - Collector's Edition
Ark: Extinction Ascended
summary: An Element-infested, ravaged planet Earth filled with fantastical creatures both organic & technological holds both the secrets of the past and the keys to its salvation. Can you defeat the gigantic roaming Titans which dominate the planet, and complete the ARK cycle to save Earth's future?

name: Arcade Archives: Assault Plus
summary:
"ASSAULT PLUS" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988.
Take control of a tank and do battle with enemies! Using separate controls for your left and right treads, the game has a distinctive charm once you master its controls.
This title features minor upgrades over its predecessor, "ASSAULT," offering new stages to play while retaining the fun of the original!

name: Archetypal Destroyer
summary: What sets Archetypal Destroyer apart is its unique gameplay system that combines two genres: first-person shooter and tower defense, all enhanced by a spectacular destruction mechanism that allows for the demolition of environmental elements.

name: Arcane Path
summary: Unlock 12 ancient artifacts, each bestowing special powers and a unique starting deck. Battle relentless automatons on your quest to the heart of the enchanted city as you uncover stories of an ancient book.

name: Arcade Jumper
summary: Arcade Jumper is a simple but precise platformer in which you have to reach the finish line at the highest point of the level as quickly as possible. Whether you make it to the finish line is up to you.

name: Armored Suit Solgante: Expansion DLC
summary: The war may be won, but work continues for Solgante's pilot! Joint training exercises are being held with Tomzon Base, and only Captain Will can show them how it's done by demonstrating the techniques that brought Radulta victory. Through a sequence of training battles, help the other base's soldiers learn how to fight like champions! Alternatively, you can train using your neighbor Naji's home-built simulator, and prove yourself worthy of his admiration.

name: Archon: Initiator
summary: Strategically place blocks, clear lines, create combos, and complete diverse missions in an audio-reactive neon world. Unlock powerful abilities or unwind with endless, zen-like puzzle gameplay.

name: Ars Vox Arcana
summary: Cast spells with your voice in a fantasy world shaped by language and will. Originally designed for VR, but fully playable on PC without a headset. Your voice is your power—no matter how you play.

name: Arcade Archives: Gangbusters
summary:
"GANGBUSTERS" is an action shooter released by KONAMI in 1988.
Control SMITH & WESSON as they capture THE DAGRUS MOB, the gang that robbed THE GRANT BANK.
Use a limited number of bullets to catch THE RED GANG and replenish and power up your ammunition as you aim for the final stage.

name: Arcade Archives: Tatakae! Big Fighter
summary:
"Tatakae! Big Fighter" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1989.
In this game, you can switch between fighter jet and robot form during battle.
The key to clearing a stage is to strengthen your ship with power-up items that appear along the way and change its shape to suit the situation.

name: Army Bus Driving Simulator
summary: Your task is to safely transport soldiers between bases through difficult routes, overcoming off-road terrain, checkpoints and other obstacles.

name: Are You Awake?
summary: As a result of your insomnia, you can never sleep. You can only complete your work or kill time playing video games. With the inability to sleep for the past few days, you start hallucinating strange realities. Realities that aren't possible, yet feel like they make sense.

name: Arcane Investigations
summary: It's after midnight on the Quartzway Express, and there's been a MAGICAL CRIME! Investigate the crime scene, question suspects, and defend the accused through unique cross-examination puzzles in this "Phoenix Wright" inspired mystery comedy

name: Arkanoid
summary: A port of Arkanoid for PC-8800.

name: Art Book Paint Color by Number
Archa
summary:
As Archa, fight enemies with your scythe Anubis, use your cards, and collect items and shards to raise your score and get the Interdimensional Pumpkins or Carrots in this upcoming Bullet-Hell Platformer!

Archa is a 2D platformer all about movement, combat, exploration, and score! To complete a level, you must gather a certain amount of points, and find the exit. Points are given by collecting and attacking enemies.

name: ARCA-102
summary: Face logic challenges in this Escape Room game, where every second counts! Join Mirra, your mercenary partner, to uncover the mysteries of an abandoned colonizer ship on an unknown planet.

name: Arcade Archives: Pinball Action
summary:
"PINBALL ACTION" is a pinball game released by TEHKAN (KOEI TECMO GAMES) in 1985.
Try to clear all the features on all four tables, switching between them over the game!
Use tricks to shake the tables, control the ball, and seize any chance at a win!

name: Arcanard
summary: Enter the mystical world of Arcanard, a roguelike deck-building card game set in a universe shaped by nine powerful elements—Strike, Fire, Water, Ice, Earth, Wind, Electro, Holy, Dark, and Chrono. Assemble your deck, master elemental synergies, and face unpredictable challenges!

name: Are You Alone?
summary:
You have been accepted into a secret project.

Answer the questions on the screen, simple enough.

name: Arcane Tower Survivors
summary: Survive waves of enemies in this horde survival roguelite. Unleash devastating spells, master unique skills, and craft unstoppable builds. Between battles, fortify your tower and unlock powerful upgrades in a strategic meta-game. Will your magic outlast the chaos?

name: Arcade Archives: Super Xevious
summary:
"SUPER XEVIOUS" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1984.
Players pilot the SOLVALOU and face off with the XEVIOUS forces.
Defeat airborne enemies with the zapper, and terrestrial enemies with the blaster.
This work has various changes from the previous work, including additional characters and different placement of hidden items.

name: Arcade Archives: Punk Shot
summary:
"PUNK SHOT" is a sports game released by KONAMI in 1990.
Your goal is to defeat the rival team and win in a basketball game where all sorts of interference and attacks are allowed.
There are various gimmicks set up during the game, so you need to be careful not to get too distracted by your opponent and lose the ball to them.

name: Arcane Dice Wars
summary: Welcome, Transient One . Only you, brought forth from another world, unbound from the Elements and the Arcane Gods, can turn the Wheel of Fate. With the help of loyal servants, strategic deployment, and some lucky dice rolls of course!

name: ARSoccer
summary:
ARSoccer is the Augmented Reality soccer app for adults and children of all ages.

Simply point your camera at the ground and kick with your feet to juggle the virtual ball, it's fun and amazing!

"It's like Kinect for the iPhone/iPod"
Using your own feet to kick through the camera, you can now play a virtual soccer ball juggling game with any iPhone.

Play in Arcade Mode to try to beat your own high score. Or try out Free Play mode if you just want to kick the ball around.
Hone your skills to become a soccer world champion.

name: Ares
summary: Ares is an abandoned FPS project by Mancuso Raffaele that uses the Irrlicht Engine. It has odd gameplay and support for mods. It is currently only archived through a GitHub page.

name: Arcade Archives: Nebulasray
summary:
"NEBULASRAY" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1994.
Become a member of the Resistance Army and defeat the Suppression Army organized by the Unified Forces, which has staged a coup d'état.
The key to winning is to acquire items that appear along the way and strengthen your ship.

name: Arcane Assault
summary: A magic themed VR tower defense game. Face off against hordes of monsters as they descend upon you in waves. Place towers, cast spells, make quick getaways, and unleash total destruction to clear your path of all that comes against you!

name: Arcane Shores
summary:
The island is quiet now. The king s scholars worked desperately to repair the Tome but their efforts were for naught. Will the days of prosperity ever return?

That is for you to decide.

name: Aristocratic Potato
summary: Aristocratic Potato is an Action, Parkour, 3D-platformer Game.featuring Evil Peelers chasing you with their UNIQUE ABILITIES, and The Final Boss.This game is EXTREMELY difficult, recommended after a bad day in work :3

name: Aris
summary: Strategically clear your way of enemies to gather points, salvage killed enemies for extra points, all while avoiding and engaging in combat with other different types of enemies. Added effects and game mechanics make for challenging gameplay in a fast paced environment.

name: ARunner
summary: Welcome to ARunner! In ARunner you can play with friends and hangout. In the forest map, you can jump from tree to tree like a true monkey, or bounce off of walls. Thanks to the shop cosmetics, you can customize your player however you like.

name: Archimedes: Eureka!
summary: The great researcher Archimedes had been living in Syracuse when one of his experiments destroyed the entire city.

name: Archery
summary: Shoot targets that appear with a dragon boss at the end.

name: AR Shot
summary: A Mini-Golf like game with a dragon boss at the end. The player must move his system around the ball to shoot it with a pool cue and maneuver it through different stages with a hole that must be reached to advance through the stages.

name: Archery 2
summary: Same as Archery but with different levels. Length: Sort of long. Difficulty: impossible. Unlocks by: Buy in the shop for 3 Playcoins.

name: AR Shot 2
summary: Same as AR Shot but with different levels. Length: Long. Difficulty: impossible. Unlocks by: Buy in the shop for 3 Playcoins.

name: Architect: Land of Exiles
summary: "ARCHITECT: LAND OF EXILES" is an MMORPG set in a vast, seamless open world with photorealistic graphics built using Unreal Engine 5. The game focuses on dynamic battle action, a rich storyline, and free exploration with abilities like flying, swimming, and climbing. Players will encounter detailed NPCs and experience a compelling narrative, starting with the journey of an Assassin character. The game also features unique bosses and monsters, with the Unreal Engine 5 engine delivering a visually stunning experience

name: Arcade Archives: Ryukyu
summary: RYUKYU is a 1990 puzzle game where players strategically select and place cards from their hand onto a grid to form poker hands in vertical, horizontal, or diagonal lines. The objective is to maximize scoring by creating the strongest possible poker combinations across the board. The game features a mysterious element involving the Ryukyu card placement in the center square, which unlocks special content upon game completion. This arcade re-release includes the series' standard features such as adjustable difficulty settings and authentic arcade display options.

name: Arrow
summary: Move through the maze without hitting the walls. Collect points to grow your tail. Smash gems to unlock cool new arrow heads and backgrounds!

name: Arcade Boss Simulator
summary: Arcade Boss Simulator is an arcade store simulation where you profit from arcade machines and collect coins to expand your store.

name: Around the World 3: Amazing Countries - Collector's Edition
summary: An incredible and amazing journey, again!

name: Arachnophobia
summary: Arachnophobia is a VR application within the field of health and psychology, a - not too serious - self-controlled implementation of a virtual reality exposure therapy session, where you gradually expose yourself to spiders.

name: Arcade Archives: Super World Court
summary:
"SUPER WORLD COURT" is a sports game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1993.
It is the sequence to "PRO TENNIS WORLD COURT" and adds support for 4-player simultaneous games.
Featuring a roster of numerous distinctive players with their own specialties, this is your chance to pick your favorite and win your way through tournaments!

name: Arvis Knock Out!
summary: Fight our characters and throw punches like never before with this third-person boxing game. Defeat all of our fighters, and take the fight further with online and local multiplayer.

name: Arvis Punch 2
summary: Train in our virtual gym to become the best fighter. Defeat every one of our fighters, and get ready to face other players!

name: Arcadian Days
summary: A slice-of-life open-world game about the beauty and nostalgia of childhood. Play as a child in a non-linear sandbox where you can explore at your own pace and partake in wholesome adventures!

name: Arcade Management Simulator
summary: Build and manage your dream arcade! Purchase a variety of machines, set prices, maintain them, restock gacha machines, claw machines and vending machines. Collect and trade over 500 unique gachas. Upgrade your arcade, attract customers, and become the best arcade in town.

name: Arabian Gulf
summary: Arabian Gulf is a single-player survival action game set in a harsh desert. Face relentless enemies, endure tough conditions, and fight through dangerous terrain using basic tools and weapons. Survive, overcome each challenge, reach the distant castle, and claim the hidden treasure.

name: Arcade Galaxy
summary: A fast-paced party platformer where you race, jump, and outplay rivals as customizable animal Cubs. Create and share your own levels with an intuitive editor, or tackle hundreds of player-made maps filled with traps, boosts, and surprises.

name: Arcadie II: Cold Lands
summary: You are the Monarch. Protect your rule and your kingdom. Pursue the heart of your chosen lover, manage fragile alliances, or bring the world to heel, no matter the cost, in this character-driven interactive tale. The choice, and the crown, are yours.

name: Armada
summary: Arcade classic twist rogue lite survival shmup for playdate

name: Arcade Archives: Ridge Racer
summary:
“RIDGE RACER” is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1993.
Experience the essence of virtual reality with the 3D CG system, “System 22.” This title offers four game modes, including three difficulty levels—NOVICE, INTERMEDIATE, and ADVANCED —as well as T.T.（TIME TRIAL), where you compete one-on-one against a rival car to achieve the best time.

name: Art Together
summary: Art Together is a multiplayer drawing game where creativity meets chaos. Gather people online and experience the hilarious results of collaborative art creation!

name: A Right to Rule
summary: A medieval isometric strategy game where you manage regional economies, sway faction loyalties, and use cards to influence politics, production, and warfare.

name: Arcane Archer
summary: Arcane Archer is a 3D platforming FPS speedrun game where you must use explosive arrows to blast yourself across gaps and up walls to reach the goal! Use the power of your explosive arrows to parkour your way through an assortment of stages, and shoot for the top of the leaderboard!

name: Artisan Acre
summary: Master cheeses, wines, and various delicacies in your own culinary atelier. Craft refined artisanal food products through careful manipulation of temperature and fermentation from living cultures. Expand your operations as you progress through an immersive culinary adventure.

name: Arcane Eats
summary: A roguelike deckbuilder with a delicious twist. Think like a master chef, balancing resources as you strategically combo ingredients to subdue hungry hordes. Recruit a legendary kitchen crew, and rise through the heroic cooking guilds—before The Hunger consumes us all!

name: Arcadia: Cloudbound
summary: 3D Find Different A visual and auditory feast of the Ninth Art

name: Aroma Love Ready!
summary:
You run your own perfume store as the owner of a perfume store. A sudden accident has involved you in the investigation of your own resurrection from the dead.
The truth gradually emerges with three employees - a love affair about perfume. Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!

name: Arcane Seekers
summary: The game cleverly blends Minesweeper mechanics with RPG progression. Call a team of unique adventurers, each with powerful abilities, and collect magical energy across the field. As characters level up, you'll draw random skills, unlocking endless tactics and strategies in every playthrough.

name: Around The World
summary: What do birds like to do? Exactly, they like to travel around the world.

name: Arca
summary: News of the Great Flood has reached the South Pole, and rumor has it there's an Ark ready to help... but only one spot per species! Jump, slide, and sabotage your rivals as you race against time to secure your place. It's every penguin for itself and the world against them all!

name: Artis Impact: Meiji Spa
summary: Soak in hot springs, explore a snowy town, uncover secrets, and maybe even... save the world?! This pixel JRPG blends humor and adventure. Meet fun characters, enjoy relaxed turn-based combat, and defend the resort from mysterious AI threats. A journey full of surprises awaits!

name: A Regular Pinball Game
summary: You know Pinball, that's it... kinda.

name: Arisen Force: Life Devotee
summary: A challenging action combat experience on Journey to the West with your companions!

name: Arcade Archives: Spinal Breakers
summary:
“SPINAL BREAKERS” is an action shooting game released by VIDEO SYSTEM in 1991.
Players take control of Colonel WAFFLE and battle through stages by defeating enemies infected by the artificial lifeform known as “HILDROID.”
Dodge enemy attacks using the rotation button while aiming precisely to take them down. The game features three different endings, which vary depending on your performance throughout the playthrough.

name: ARPventure
summary:
Embark on a fun and educational 2D adventure with Network Quest, a game developed in Unity designed to teach the fundamentals of computer networking in an engaging and accessible way. Ideal for beginners and students in the early years of computer science, this game turns complex concepts into interactive challenges.

Explore a colorful digital world where each character represents a key component of a network. Talk to routers, switches, servers, and more to uncover the knowledge you need to advance. Learn while you play, and master the basics of how computers communicate — all while having fun!

Are you ready to connect the dots? Dive into Network Quest and become a networking hero!

name: Ars Demonium Invocatum
summary: The greatest book on demonology has fallen into your hands. Decipher the secret names of demons and subjugate them to your will.

name: Archon Soul
summary: Roll the dice but make your own luck in this 2D dicebuilding roguelike. Customize your dice using swappable faces, runes, and bodies with unique effects. ​Draft spells, create powerful synergies, defeat challenging enemies, and conquer the Archon's palace.

name: Arcane Coven
summary: A roguelite 1-8 player Co-op top-down dungeon crawler. Slay mobs, loot chests, explore the map, craft wands and upgrade spells in a team attempt to escape from the magical dimension by conquering all 4 seasons.

name: Ark: Ragnarok Ascended
summary: Journey through an expansive 144 sq. kilometer environment where elements from The Island, Scorched Earth, and all new biomes are combined to bring the ultimate survivor experience.

name: Art of Bloodshed
summary: Art of Bloodshed is a stylized fantasy PvPvE multiplayer game where two teams of four players clash in high-stakes matches. Explore dynamic battlegrounds, fight creatures and players alike, and creatively siege the enemy base with strategy, tools, and teamwork.

name: Arcade Archives: Strategy X
summary: Will you go for the aggressive approach or the cautious approach?

name: Army Men Battle Simulator
summary: Army men battle simulator is a game totally base on physics and strategy. Fight with soldier, tank, plane, and more are waiting for you.

name: Arcanus Online
summary: Arcanus Online is a 2D medieval fantasy MMORPG with pixel art aesthetics, where players can explore vast lands, battle monsters, complete quests, and interact with others in a classic retro-style online world.
