Developed in Visual Basic 6 with DirectX 7, the game preserves the nostalgic feel of early 2000s MMOs while offering a persistent online universe. Players can customize their characters, craft items, join guilds, and participate in real-time PvP and PvE adventures.

name: Arrow Rain
summary: Modular bows — Unique armor — Powerful omens — Hordes of enemies — Co-op — Roguelike

name: Arcade Archives: Crazy Balloon
summary: A thrilling balloon ride that’s not just hot air!

name: Architect Life: Sketch House Pack
summary: Immerse your clients in a life-size sketch with the Sketch House Pack! Unlock an exclusive architect's office and transform your interiors with 30 items designed to create striking 2D trompe-l'œil effects.

name: Architect Life: Architect's Home Office
summary: Transform your office into the perfect workplace with the ARCHITECT'S HOME OFFICE pack, and design spaces where every detail enhances your creativity and focus!

name: Architect Life: Hobbies Pack
summary:
Design the leisure spaces of your dreams with the HOBBIES PACK!

Get over 50 brand-new items to turn any room into a space that reflects your passions. Create a games room, home cinema, artist’s studio or fitness suite, and create interiors bursting with personality.

name: Arrow Dungeon
summary: A tactical action roguelike where you survive a dark dungeon with limited arrows, light-based exploration, and fast-paced bow combat.

name: Arena Returns
summary: Arena Returns is a tactical turn-based fighting game set in the colorful World of Twelve universe. Players engage in strategic PvP battles using customizable teams of characters, each with unique classes, spells, and abilities drawn from the beloved MMORPG.

name: Arcturus
summary: A dark psychological horror science fiction game where survival is based on your knowledge acquired through observation and exploration of the unique biomes in this inhospitable alien world of Arcturus.

name: Arcane Rings
summary: Defend your imperial cities against the invasion of underworld mages! Rally survivors, mages and soldiers, strengthen your defenses and fight for survival in this epic tower defense fantasy.

name: Arcade Archives: Air Combat 22
summary: "AIR COMBAT 22" is a flight shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1995. This title features an evolutionary step in 3D graphics and flashy animations using the "System Super 22" arcade board, an upgrade of the "System 22" architecture used for a wide range of legendary 3D games. Take on missions for the thrill of shooting down lots of enemy crafts, white-knuckle missions that require expert techniques, and more as you conquer diverse aerial combat scenarios. Become a hero of the skies!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Air Combat 22
summary: "AIR COMBAT 22" is a flight shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1995. This title features an evolutionary step in 3D graphics and flashy animations using the "System Super 22" arcade board, an upgrade of the "System 22" architecture used for a wide range of legendary 3D games. Take on missions for the thrill of shooting down lots of enemy crafts, white-knuckle missions that require expert techniques, and more as you conquer diverse aerial combat scenarios. Become a hero of the skies!

name: Arcane Dice Wars: Gacha Date
summary: "Arcane Dice Wars: Gacha Date!" is a fluffy spinoff game where you get a second chance at love with some of the series' most popular characters!

name: Arcadice
summary: Handcuffed to a deadly arcade machine, fight for your life in its top-down shooter. Load weapons by inserting dice into the machine. Six failures and the sentry gun fires.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Dimension Fortress Macross II
summary:
This is a time attack shoot 'em up!

The arcade game “Super Dimension Fortress MACROSS II” is a shooter released by BANPRESTO (Bandai Namco Entertainment inc.) in 1993.
The game follows the story of the original video animation “The Super Dimension Fortress Macross II -LOVERS AGAIN-”.
Set around 80 years after “The Super Dimension Fortress Macross,”
Earth is faced by a new threat that players must defeat - the Marduk.
Clear each stage by achieving the designated "CLEAR SCORE" within the time limit.

name: Art Puzzle
summary: Welcome to Art Puzzle - a special type of relaxing puzzle games that offers you the ultimate aesthetic experience. It is a unique place where anti-stress meets jigsaw puzzle-games. Solve picture puzzles, explore beautiful landscapes and admire dreamy imagery. Try this refreshing reimagination of jigsaw puzzles and art games for free!

name: Armadillo Knight
summary: Armadillo Knight is a series of side-scrolling, hack-n-slash Flash games, which were developed by Trent Halvorsen (also known as Trent the Fox). The overall story is broken up into three individual games: Kenora Village, Wara Wood, and Blizzard Peak.

name: ArmourX
summary:
ArmourX is a thrilling blockchain-based game blending Play-and-Earn mechanics with immersive gameplay. Set in a futuristic world, players become skilled warriors defending their planet against a formidable alien threat. Customize and upgrade your armor and weapons, trade them as unique assets, and earn rewards both in-game and through blockchain trading. Featuring intense battles and challenging missions, ArmourX delivers an exhilarating experience while offering the chance to earn valuable digital assets.

Dive into the action and join the fun today!

name: A Recipe for Survival
summary: Use two decks of cards to serve food to your customers during the day! Then fight them off when they turn to monsters at night in this fun and unique deckbuilding roguelike!

name: Arcade Empire Tycoon
summary: Build and manage your own arcade, attract customers, and grow your empire in Arcade Empire Tycoon!

name: Arcade Archives: Super Basketball
summary:
Can you turn the situation around in this dire situation?

"SUPER BASKETBALL" is a sports game released by KONAMI in 1984.
There are 10 competing teams. Every match starts at a disadvantage.
Use skillful dribbling and passing to turn the tide and aim to win within the time limit.

name: Archery Black
summary: A simple archery game with good music

name: Arcaneering: Beyond Automation
summary: Build spell-powered factories, reclaim ancient territories filled with magical secrets, and discover game-changing technology hidden across procedurally generated worlds. Master both engineering and magic in this cozy fusion of factory automation and RPG progression.

name: Argonauts Agency: God of the Storm - Collector's Edition
summary: Lead legendary heroes through cursed islands, and uncover the mysteries of Poseidon's domain. The collector's edition includes extra levels, comics, and more.

name: Arcade Archives: Stinger
summary: Destroy the enemy and infiltrate the base!

name: Argonauts Agency: Captive of Circe - Collectors Edition
Argonauts Agency: Chair of Hephaestus - Collector's Edition
Argonauts Agency: Glove of Midas - Collector's Edition
summary:
One morning, Pelias the collector asked his old friends Jason and Medea to deliver him a package. The package was the legendary glove of Midas. Rumor has it that it bestows magical powers on the wearer. Pelias decided to upgrade it a little and performed an experiment...

The collector's edition includes a bonus campaign.

name: Argonauts Agency: Missing Daughter - Collector's Edition
Argonauts Agency: Pandora's Box - Collector's Edition
Around the World 2 with the Johnson Family
summary: Explore with the Johnsons. Play ten casual mini-games in different places around the world.

name: Articrow
summary: Articrow is a 2D top-down action roguelike. Play as a magical crow exploring dungeons, collecting and upgrading artifacts with unique parts. Equip these powerful artifacts and defeat challenging enemies to escape.

name: Art-Therapy: Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: 🧩 A Cozy Jigsaw Puzzle Game for Everyone! If you like puzzles, this one’s for you. It has over 100 beautiful pictures in different styles—some colorful and fun, others peaceful and calming. There’s no rush, no timers, just a simple and relaxing way to spend your time.

name: ArcheAge War
summary: "ArcheAge War" is the new sequel to the renowned MMORPG ArcheAge, which is released on both PC and mobile platforms. It comes with fascinating game features, such as open world map, warship battle and siege warfare. Enjoy the rush of defeating your enemy anytime anywhere, as well as the fast-paced fighitng experience.

name: Arcade Archives: Field Day
summary: Face off across seven sporting events to become the champion!

name: Arctic Digger TCG Collection
summary: A cozy simulation game where you dig through the arctic to collect ores and trading card packs. Use what you find to produce new items, upgrade your tools, and hire penguins to help run your business. Expand your area and turn it into the top trading spot in the frozen north.

name: Arcade Hero
summary: In this remaster the graphics are updated from the original version.

name: Arena II
summary: A fantasy arena battler. Level up, gear up, conquer increasingly brutal arenas, and take on increasingly powerful foes in a medieval world. Unlock secret relics and hidden arenas as you rise to become the ultimate champion in Arena II.

name: Arcanorum 231
summary: A journey into a mystical underworld and immersive occult art and ritual. Featuring artwork by Barry William Hale, music by NOKO210, and drumming, chanting, and invocations by a number of other practicing occultists.

name: Arcade Archives: D-Day
summary:
The order has now been given to begin the operation!
Break through the enemy's encirclement
and destroy the enemy fortress!!

"D-DAY" is a shooter released by JALECO in 1984.
Your mission is to pilot your battleship, fending off enemy battleships and bombers, and destroy the enemy fortress.
Today is the day the operation is to take place. The longest day begins...

name: Argonauts Agency: Ares Games
summary: Argonauts Agency: Ares Games: Explore mythical lands and uncover Ares’ sinister plan!

name: Ark of Trisolar
summary: Steam's first AI robot driven Ark Colony simulation shooting game In the era of civilization collapse, the 'Three Body Ark' - the last fortress of hope for humanity, carries three interdependent ecological worlds towards deep space.

name: Area Zero
summary: Area Zero is a gritty, comic book style fighting game. It features continuously scrolling stages, modern style controls and a hold-to-cancel input system.

name: ARK Axiom
summary: ARK Axiom is a narrative-driven, turn-based RPG where player choices affect both story and gameplay. Players abandon one path and embrace another, unlocking varying abilities, altering party dynamics, and reshaping the world itself.

name: Archomni
summary: Tactical single-player card battler with unique triad combat system and challenging opponents.

name: Archlyphion: Migration
summary: Archlyphion: Migration tells a story of a lone Beanie who, after a fire broke out in their habitat, must make a run for it. Perhaps the herd is waiting at the other side of The Maze, but not before it stumbles across other eras along the way. Will it have what it takes to survive the odds?

name: Arcade Archives: Aqua Jet
summary:
"AQUA JET" is a marine sports game released by NAMCO LIMITED (current Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1996.

This game stood out at arcades at the time thanks to its large jet ski-style cabinet.
Savor the thrill of racing across shimmering waves under the blazing sun in a stunning, resort-like setting brought to life by the "System Super 22" hardware!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Aqua Jet
summary:
The "Arcade Archives" (ACA) series faithfully reproduces classic arcade game masterpieces, staying true to its original.
You can customize game settings to your liking, such as adjusting the difficulty level, and depending on the title, even recreate the nostalgic atmosphere of CRT TVs back in the day.
Additionally, you can compete for high scores with players from all around the world through online rankings.

In addition to the “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HIGH SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the “Arcade Archives” series, “Arcade Archives 2” series will add new features such as “TIME ATTACK MODE” and “NETWORK MODE.”In “TIME ATTACK MODE” you compete to see who can beat the final boss the fastest stating from the first battle. This mode focuses on how quickly you can complete the game, regardless of the score you achieve. In “NETWORK MODE” you can play against other users over the network.

Additionally, functionality has been significantly enhanced. Multiple save slots have been implemented instead of just one, along with a rewind feature that allows players to retry gameplay and a quick start feature for those who want to dive straight into the game. Furthermore, VRR support has been added, enabling more accurate reproduction of the original arcade game’s experience.

Enjoy the legendary arcade masterpiece with “Arcade Archives 2,” now more fun and user-friendly.

name: Arab Drift Cars 2: The Definitive Edition
Arcana Automata
summary: In Arcana Automata, you program drones using Python to harvest a mystical resource, unlock upgrades, and encounter German mythical creatures. Perfect for curious minds who love to learn through play.

name: Armageddonica
summary: Revolutionary ARPG/RTS where your hero shapes the battle, but strategy and your army decide the war. Hack-and-slash your way to commanding legions. Fight the dire gods, while the Gospel of Judas whispers a forbidden truth.

name: Around the World Puzzle
summary: Spin and complete views from around the world! A brain-training puzzle game where you'll discover your favorite

name: Arcade Archives: Chopper 1
summary:
"CHOPPER 1" is a shooter released by SNK in 1988.
Pilot a combat helicopter deep into enemy territory in a mission to restore peace to your homeland.
Wielding overwhelming power far beyond what’s needed to simply protect one's family, what will these men discover at the end of their path of destruction?

name: Arc’s Glitch Defender
summary: A sci-fi arcade, combat arena shooter where speed, precision, and strategy push your skills to the limit. Uncover a rich story of a beautiful utopian galaxy's planets, inspired by the styles of old arcades and the synthwave genre. The ultimate prize is Glory!

name: Archiver
summary: Welcome to the sublime library, where we archive human thoughts that ended a long time ago.

name: Arcana Roma
summary: Arcana Roma is a third-person/top-down action-adventure strategy game in which you command a Roman officer and his legion with the goal of reclaiming your homeland from barbarian invaders.

name: Arab Drift Cars 3
summary: The third edition of the popular Arab Drift Cars game, specifically in Riyadh. Start playing, drifting, and drifting now with the most famous cars and maps.

name: Arise
summary:
Arise - The Ultimate Action RPG Multiplayer Experience!
Arise and Dominate!

Step into the epic world of Arise, where every battle is a test of your skill and strategy. Choose your character, customize your look with unique skins, and wield powerful weapons, each offering a fresh and thrilling way to play. Whether you’re slashing through enemies or unleashing devastating spells, every fight in Arise is a chance to prove your dominance. Are you ready to rise above the competition?

Conquer the Dungeons

Dive into the heart-pounding dungeons of Arise, where you decide how to play. Race against the clock in Competition Mode or explore at your own pace in Exploration Mode. Each dungeon is packed with deadly enemies, tricky traps, and epic bosses waiting to challenge you. The choices you make inside will determine your rewards and your rank on the global leaderboards. Will you conquer the depths?

Defend or Plunder—The Choice is Yours
In Arise, your fate is in your hands. Will you build an impenetrable fortress to defend your lands or become the feared conqueror, raiding others for their treasures? Every decision you make shapes your destiny in this ever-evolving world. Choose your path, gather your allies, and either defend your legacy or claim the riches of others. The battlefield is waiting—what will you choose?

A World Driven by Players

Arise offers more than just battles—it's a living world where your actions drive the economy. Gather resources, craft powerful weapons, and trade with players from around the globe. Your choices influence the balance of power and the fortunes of others. In Arise, your gameplay isn’t just about winning—it’s about leaving your mark on a world shaped by players like you. Are you ready to rise and take control?

name: Argus
summary: Argus is a role playing adventure. Your aim is to find the captured Starchild. The game has 1500 locations to explore and you will fight many monsters on your journey. Extra weapons, keys and other items can be found to help you. An animated introduction and end sequences have been created and there is a game save and loading function. The graphics and overall presentation are heavily inspired by the 1991 Psygnosis game "Obitus".

name: Around the World 5: Beautiful America - Collector's Edition
summary: Embark on a virtual journey across the USA. Find hidden objects, solve engaging puzzles, and collect unique souvenirs from different states. The Collector’s Edition enhances your journey with unique bonus locations, exclusive puzzles and mini-games.

name: Arcabbit
summary: Latch on with two hooks and ride the momentum of a pendulum swing. Swap left and right in rhythm to blaze through neon stages in this 2D action game. Stage mechanics sync with the soundtrack for a snappy “one more try” loop.

name: Archimedes: Eureka! - Collector's Edition
summary: The great inventor Archimedes presents his newest and most advanced invention: a large winch powered by the wind. Even Hercules is no match for this mechanism! However, it’s no match against nature as a strong gust of wind destroys the device, which in turn, destroys the entire city of Syracuse. The collector’s edition includes a bonus gameplay episode, strategy guide and more.

name: Artificial Fashionista: Winter Collection
summary: A set of 35+ new Winter-themed items for Foris to wear!

name: Artificial Fashionista: Extra Collection
summary: A set of 70+ fan-picked items for Foris to wear!

name: Artificial Fashionista: Spring Collection
summary: A set of 35+ new Spring-themed items for Foris to wear!

name: Artificial Fashionista: Autumn Collection
summary: A set of 35+ new Autumn-themed items for Foris to wear!

name: Armed Frame
summary:
A fast-paced TPS & FPS where you control customizable mechs in combat.
Customize 12 parts across 6 categories: head, torso, arms, legs, boosters, FCS, and six weapon slots.
You can also customize the colors of your weapons and frames.
Use weapons, jump, boost in the air, run along walls, perform rapid boosts (horizontal, up, down), quick turns, and high-speed movement.

name: A Ragdoll Rage Game
summary: A Ragdoll Rage Game is a physics-based rage platformer where you grab, aim, and fling a ragdoll through challenging obstacles. The game also features secret badges, unlockable cosmetics, a built-in level editor, global leaderboards, and more.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Scrambled Egg
summary:
Kick, launch, and get chased! It's a scramble emergency!!!

"SCRAMBLED EGG" is an action game released by Technos Japan in 1983.
Kick the eggs to crack them open and hatch chicks. Then launch all the new chicks into the sky!
Red chicks and chickens will help you take down enemies. Be sure to take good care of them!

name: Arcade Archives: Scrambled Egg
summary:
Kick, launch, and get chased! It's a scramble emergency!!!

"SCRAMBLED EGG" is an action game released by Technos Japan in 1983.
Kick the eggs to crack them open and hatch chicks. Then launch all the new chicks into the sky!
Red chicks and chickens will help you take down enemies. Be sure to take good care of them!

name: Argonauts Agency: God of the Storm
summary: Pelias, the wise mentor, joins forces with Jason and Medea to uncover the deeply hidden causes of divine wrath.

name: Armada 2: Exodus
summary:
Armada 2: Exodus was a planned Sega Dreamcast sequel to Armada. Despite being advertised, it was never released.

The game was set to support online play.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Chopper 1
summary:
"CHOPPER 1" is a shooter released by SNK in 1988.
Pilot a combat helicopter deep into enemy territory in a mission to restore peace to your homeland.
Wielding overwhelming power far beyond what’s needed to simply protect one's family, what will these men discover at the end of their path of destruction?

"Arcade Archives 2" series includes "ORIGINAL MODE," "HIGH SCORE MODE," "CARAVAN MODE," and "TIME ATTACK MODE."
It also features multiple save slots, a rewind function that lets you restart your gameplay, and a quick start function for those who want to get started right away.
Furthermore, VRR support has been added, enabling more accurate reproduction of the original arcade game's experience.

name: Armed Animals RPG
summary: Armed Animals RPG is a top down action RPG with an emphasis on highly reactive sandbox style tactical combat and complex health simulation systems. Make friends and enemies in a world of colorful animal characters!

name: Ardor 2
summary: Ardor is a fast and lethal turn-based tactical card game. Play cards to dodge danger and kill enemies. Combat is simple but deep, with a high skill ceiling. Win fights to upgrade your deck and take on stronger foes.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Mach Breakers
summary:
Seven new contenders compete in an unprecedented super competition!

"MACH BREAKERS" is a sports game released by NAMCO LIMITED (current Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1995.
The superhuman sports series continues with this sequel to “Numan Athletics”!
Now featuring 7 athletes and 12 kinds of events, the action is even more intense.
Break the sound barrier and shatter expectations!

name: Arcade Archives: Mach Breakers
summary: Seven new contenders compete in an unprecedented super competition!

name: Artifact Seekers 1
summary: Take part in the new adventurous TV show! We designed unique puzzles and locations special for you. “Artifact Seekers” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Arcade Archives: Video Hustler
summary:
Experience the thrill of the pocket!

"VIDEO HUSTLER" is a sports game released by KONAMI in 1981.
This game is a simplified version of pool (pocket billiards). You strike the white cue ball to roll it, hit six balls, and sink them into the pockets.
The game’s most distinctive feature is that the score can vary greatly depending on the numbers on the balls and the different multipliers assigned to each pocket.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Video Hustler
summary:
Experience the thrill of the pocket!

"VIDEO HUSTLER" is a sports game released by KONAMI in 1981.
This game is a simplified version of pool (pocket billiards). You strike the white cue ball to roll it, hit six balls, and sink them into the pockets.
The game’s most distinctive feature is that the score can vary greatly depending on the numbers on the balls and the different multipliers assigned to each pocket.

name: Art Attack
summary: Art Attack is an action roguelike with a unique paint based combat system, and a distaste for GenAI.

name: Arena
summary: A fantasy arena battler where you fight enemies for gold and silver, upgrade your gear, and take on increasingly powerful foes in a medieval world.

name: Archive: Zero
summary: In 2125, AI gained self-awareness—but failed to understand emotions. To fix this, they began extracting human memories. Now, in a world stripped of memories, one boy—Recorder—awakens. With D.BO, he sets out to reclaim lost memories and restore humanity.

name: Ark Re:Code
summary: The end is here and it’s horny… Dive into a wild post-apocalyptic RPG packed with sexy girls, mutants, and more H-scenes than you can handle. Build your harem and fuck these hotties like the fate of humanity depends on it!

name: Ares Fighter
summary: Ares Fighter" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Arena Monarchy
summary: Arena Monarchy is a gladiator management game with a heavy focus on turn-based combat. Collect loot, theorycraft builds, upgrade your ludus and become champion!

name: Art House
summary: Art House is a 2D puzzle platformer in which you play as a woman who gets trapped with her children inside the paintings of her recently deceased mother. Navigate through painting rips and use a magical paintbrush to escape and come to terms with your grief.

name: Arcana Academy
summary: Build your magic academy in this card realm, recruit students, manage their tasks or classes, perform rituals, and explore a perilous magical world. Faced with the encroachment of the Abyss, can you live up to people's expectations and save the empire from crisis?

name: Arcade Games Collection
summary: The craziest, weirdest game in the universe,

name: Arkheron
summary: In this fast-paced, dynamic PvP game from Bonfire Studios, teams of three battle to ascend a mysterious Tower built from fragments of their life before. Here, items are the heroes - each one imbued with powerful abilities that shape how you fight, adapt, and outplay other teams. Build your strategy and identity on the fly by looting and combining items in real time, creating unique builds throughout every match. What you choose to carry defines not only what you can do, but who you can become.

name: Arcade Archives: Steel Worker
summary:
"STEEL WORKER" is a puzzle game released by TAITO in 1980.
In this game, your objective is to connect a path to the destination by placing scaffolding for a workman performing high-altitude work on a construction site, ensuring he does not fall.
To prevent the workman from having an accident, it is sometimes necessary to strategically place the scaffolding so that he takes a detour or reverses his path. Remember to value your workers! Stay safe out there!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Steel Worker
summary:
"STEEL WORKER" is a puzzle game released by TAITO in 1980.
In this game, your objective is to connect a path to the destination by placing scaffolding for a workman performing high-altitude work on a construction site, ensuring he does not fall.
To prevent the workman from having an accident, it is sometimes necessary to strategically place the scaffolding so that he takes a detour or reverses his path. Remember to value your workers! Stay safe out there!

“Arcade Archives 2” series introduces a brand-new mode called TIME ATTACK MODE, in addition to the ORIGINAL MODE, HI SCORE MODE, and CARAVAN MODE from Arcade Archives. TIME ATTACK MODE focuses on how quickly you can complete the game, regardless of the score you achieve.
What’s more, with VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support, the gameplay can be reproduced even more accurately, closer to the original arcade experience.

name: Archaeology: Grass Farm
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Grass Kingdom
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Ardent Wilds
summary: Battle your way to victory in this sandbox adventure with fast-paced combat and numerous spells to discover! Dig, craft, explore and defeat fearsome bosses to defend your world against tentacly invaders.

name: Arcane Trigger
summary: From the Creators of "Endgame of Devil" comes their latest masterpiece! This time, youre not the Devil Lord youre a gunslinger with magic at your fingertips! Pick your Arcane Bullets to lay down some serious firepower!

name: Armor Stride
summary: Sir Stepsalot is trapped in the Cursed Forest! Luckily, he has his trusty sword and bomb pouch to fend off dangerous monsters. He will have to travel deeper into the forest fighting monsters and avoiding traps. Our knight can't stay in place for too long though. There's a dark curse chasing him!

name: Archaeology: Frozen Space
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Archaeology: Frozen Pirates
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Ardena
summary: Ardena is a first-person survival horror game where your only light is a dwindling campfire. Gather wood to keep it burning, uncover chilling clues about you and your location, and find a way to escape the mysterious forest—before she finds you.

name: Architect of Ruin
summary: Architect of Ruin is a completely hand drawn sword and sorcery colony simulation game. Farm, hunt, build, and survive as you rebuild an ancient temple under the gaze of a vengeful god.

name: Arcane Duel
summary: Arcane Duel is a RTS game. There are many skills you can choose in this game. In each game you can choose four skills and one auto attack style. Using these skill to defeat your enemy!! This game is using mouse to control the movement of the character and use QWER key to cast the skill.

name: Arcade Archives: Dacholer
summary:
"DACHOLER" is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1983.
Kick a turtle with your powerful legs and take down enemy animals! Watch out for the kappa jumping out of the river!
This title also includes a slightly modified version, KICK BOY, so you can enjoy the differences in visuals and gameplay.

name: Arcane Rift
summary: Arcane Rift is a turn-based RPG where every choice shapes your journey. Explore dungeons that shift with each session, recruit unique heroes, and uncover the secrets of the Arcane Rifts in an epic narrative with challenging combat.

name: Arctic Drive
summary: First-person survival road trip in a procedurally generated frozen wasteland. Drive and upgrade your off-road vehicle alone or with up to 3 friends, scavenge for fuel, food, and parts, and survive hunger, thirst, and sub-zero temperatures.

name: Arcane Overdrive
summary: Arcane Overdrive, is a survivor-like game where you combine different vehicle parts to create your own gameplay and movement style.

name: Arrive In Time
summary: A minimalist puzzle game. Drive a car and collect stars within the time limit.

name: Argonauts Agency: Wrath of Olympus
summary: The Argonauts are on the move again. Win the hearts of the gods to stop the chain of disasters.

name: Arctic Isolation
summary: Travel to the vast expanse of space aboard a mighty starship equipped with the latest technology to battle ruthless enemies in this thrilling space saga. Choose your perfect ship, arm yourself with deadly weapons and challenge the forces of evil in epic space battles.

name: Arcade Archives: Gee Bee
summary: Puts the Punch!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Gee Bee
summary: Puts the PUNCH!

name: Archaeology: Egypt
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Argonauts Agency: Gorgon Medusa
summary: Argonauts Agency: Gorgon Medusa: A journey to gather resources, fight petrification, and save your friends and all of Greece!

name: Archipelago
summary: Archipelago is a cross-game modification system which randomizes different games, then uses the result to build a single unified multi-player game. Items from one game may be present in another, and you will need your fellow players to find items you need in their games to help you complete your own.

name: Armaphract
summary: Command a mercenary tank company through brutal urban warfare to the outskirts of a shattered desert megacity. Outmatched and outgunned, you'll use superior tactics and daring maneuvers through claustrophobic streets for survival and profit.

name: Arena of Gods
summary: Arena of Gods is a fast-paced free-to-play PVP card game with rich strategies. Integrating four major myths, the game has hundreds of deities for players to choose from. Flexibly use public cards and build decks to fight, opening up thousands of strategic possibilities!

name: Arrow Survival: 15 Seconds
summary:
Dodge and shoot to survive 15 seconds! Master 40 levels of arrow chaos in this fast-paced pixel art platformer!

Dive into Arrow Survival: 15 Seconds, a thrilling 2D pixel art platformer where every second counts! As a skilled archer, your mission is to survive 15 seconds per level by dodging deadly hazards and strategically firing arrows. Each of the 40 unique levels introduces new challenges, from bouncing platforms that redirect your arrows to treacherous spikes and evolving mechanics that keep you on your toes.

Plan your shots carefully! The angle and direction of your arrows can make or break your survival, as they ricochet unpredictably or trigger new obstacles. Test your reflexes, sharpen your strategy and reach the final level. Can you survive the last 15 seconds of each level?

name: Arcane Rivals
summary: Arcane Rivals is a combo‑driven, voice‑interactive PvP fighter. Weave hand signs, then speak the spell into your mic to unleash anime‑inspired techniques. Chain, counter, and outplay in fast duels where precision, timing, and clear calls decide the winner.

name: Arena of Suffering
summary: A classic RPG of strategic turn-based combat, dangerous dungeon crawls, and total party customization. Build the best heroes in the land — and by the end, you won’t just face the final boss. You’ll be the final boss.

name: Arcfall
summary: ARCFALL is a thrilling adventure in which you awaken as a lone robot in a strange and hostile world — with no memory of how you got there. Your systems are damaged, and a critical malfunction is causing your energy to deplete far too quickly.

name: Arbeiter
summary: Arbeiter is a survival-management game about working-class life. Work to survive, balance hunger, stress, fatigue and wages, organize fellow workers, manage unions, and spread your ideology. Or go your own way.

name: Armada Pet Wars
summary: Armada Pet Wars is a 4X-lite asynchronous turn based space-themed strategy game... with pets. Design Starships, make or break alliances, setup your fleets for victory in this strategic, space-themed, auto-battler.

name: Arrowburst
summary: Arrowburst is a calm, relaxing, short incremental game about bursting squares and upgrading your arrow.

name: Arcade Archives: Battlantis
summary:
The time for battle has come! Rise, true hero!

"Battlantis" is a shooter released by Konami in 1987.
The objective is to defend your castle from an invading army of monsters. You must defeat all enemies before they climb the castle walls.
Only the young King Cripeuss III can save the sacred island of Battlantis. Go forth and drive back the evil monsters!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Battlantis
summary:
The time for battle has come!
Rise, true hero!

"BATTLANTIS" is a shooter released by KONAMI in 1987.
The objective is to defend your castle from an invading army of monsters. You must defeat all enemies before they climb the castle walls.
Only the young King Cripeuss III can save the sacred island of Battlantis. Go forth and drive back the evil monsters!

name: Arcane Plunder
summary: Explore enchanted dungeons shrouded in magical fog. Reveal hidden paths, uncover treasures, and telekinetically loot artifacts from the shadows. Upgrade your magic, extend your reach and dive deeper into the unknown in this bite sized idle clicker adventure.

name: Ark of Isolation
summary: Once humanity's last hope, the space vessel 'PramaArk' now drifts aimlessly, light-years away from Earth. It's up to you to set things right, and uncover the secrets buried deep within the ship. The one left behind, and the one who had to say goodbye... Which one will you relate to more?

name: Arkee Malarkey
summary: Throw a bunch of quirky animals onto the Ark and merge them into bigger animals in Classic and Score Attack modes! Or put your animal throwing skills to the test in the Arkee Trials, featuring various levels and unlockables to collect!

name: Arcade Archives: Munch Mobile
summary: Munch Mobile is an action game released by SNK in 1983. Pilot a mysterious car with arms, picking up fuel and food along the way. The goal is to make it home before your fuel runs out. Place trash left from your food into bins to earn big points! Show consideration in public spaces and enjoy a fun drive!

name: Arinoa: Conquest
summary: Arinoa: Conquest is a real time grand strategy game with a focus on hero units, and combines elements of strategy, resource management, and light RPG mechanics. Gather resources, build your army, and conquer your enemies within the harsh world of Arinoa.

name: Arrow Spire: Tower Defense
summary: A tower defense roguelite where each defeat makes you stronger. Spend gold on temporary boosts, invest gems in permanent upgrades, and push your tower higher each run.

name: Argo's Choice
summary:
An interactive story that’s determined by your choices! Argo’s secretive story begins in a dark world colored by corruption and crime.
This story game is in a visual novel format, and tells a story of various interesting characters in an episodic and chatting manner.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Munch Mobile
summary: Munch Mobile is an action game released by SNK in 1983. Pilot a mysterious car with arms, picking up fuel and food along the way. The goal is to make it home before your fuel runs out. Place trash left from your food into bins to earn big points! Show consideration in public spaces and enjoy a fun drive!

name: ArtilleRoyalty
summary: ArtilleRoyalty (Artillery + Royalty) is a solitaire card game based on Gridcannon by Tom Francis. There's nothing Bun Bun hates more than a monarch! Grab your standard deck of cards, master the 3x3 grid called the Gridcannon, and help her depose all 12 pesky Royals!

name: Arrow World
summary: Guide the ever-moving cardboard "Hakoby" to the goal! Use infinitely placeable conveyor belts to create diverse solutions. A fresh puzzle experience that responds to Hakoby in real-time!

name: Arthur's Kindergarten
summary: Arthur's Kindergarten is the perfect combination of learning, fun, and helpful features. With 15 different educational activities, Arthur's Kindergarten teaches a full year's worth of kindergarten skills and entertains your child with limitless fun and learning!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Midnight Landing
summary:
"MIDNIGHT LANDING" is a flight simulation game released by TAITO in 1987.
You take control of an aircraft soaring through the midnight sky, with the goal of landing safely at the airport.
The lights of the runway come into view, signalling the end of your journey through the night.
Bring it to a perfect close with a beautiful landing.

“Arcade Archives 2” adds a new “TIME ATTACK MODE” to the lineup of “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HI SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the Arcade Archives series. In “TIME ATTACK MODE,” players compete to clear the game as quickly as possible, regardless of the score achieved. VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support has also been added, allowing gameplay to be reproduced even closer to the original arcade experience.

name: Archon
summary: In this story-rich interstellar political drama, ascend as humanity's next leader. Rebuild a broken empire in a war-torn galaxy through might, diplomacy, or espionage. Every choice has a consequence. What will you choose, Your Eminence?

name: Arcade Archives: Midnight Landing
summary:
The landing is near... Challenge yourself to a beautiful touchdown!!
"MIDNIGHT LANDING" is a flight simulation game released by TAITO in 1987.
You take control of an aircraft soaring through the midnight sky, with the goal of landing safely at the airport.
The lights of the runway come into view, signalling the end of your journey through the night.
Bring it to a perfect close with a beautiful landing.

name: Arcane Earth
summary: Arcane Earth is an incremental clicker game where you unearth layers of magical terrain to collect essence, blocks and cristals. You can summon Golems and upgrade them to automate digging.

name: Arcade Archives: Scion
summary:
“SCION” is a shooting game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1984.
The game is set in Crystal Heaven, a sprawling supercity built in multiple layers.
Your mission is to rescue your captured kin trapped within the city’s core.
Fight your way down from the upper levels, tearing through each layer as you advance toward the enemy’s stronghold deep within!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Scion
summary:
"SCION" is a shooting game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1984.
The game is set in Crystal Heaven, a sprawling supercity built in multiple layers.
Your mission is to rescue your captured kin trapped within the city’s core.
Fight your way down from the upper levels, tearing through each layer as you advance toward the enemy’s stronghold deep within!

“Arcade Archives 2” adds a new “TIME ATTACK MODE” to the lineup of “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HI SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the Arcade Archives series. In “TIME ATTACK MODE,” players compete to clear the game as quickly as possible, regardless of the score achieved. VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support has also been added, allowing gameplay to be reproduced even closer to the original arcade experience.

name: Arondight
summary: Zanac-like Ultra High-Speed Scrolling 2D Shooter Humanity suffered a crushing defeat in the war against the sentient AI, RA6 the Great Sovereign, losing 70% of the global population. Now, you board the anti-AI fighter MSX-3 Arondight, and launch into the final battle against the Sovereign.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Tokyo Wars
summary: The battle for Tokyo! Which side will you join: the Green force or the White force?

name: Arcade Archives: Tokyo Wars
summary: The battle for Tokyo! Which side will you join: the Green force or the White force?

name: Arby
summary: Arby is a minimalist 2D indie platformer where you control two lovable squares at once. Every jump, fall, and wall-bounce moves them both simultaneously—turning familiar platformer challenges into clever, brain-bending puzzles. Master mirrored movement, dodge deadly saws.

name: Arachnoid
summary: Arachnoid is a first person horror game about moving into a house and finding a giant spider infestation. Fix your house, walk to surrounding points of interest, and defend yourself with shotgun after finding it. In an immersive VHS style Arachnoid will pull you into this horrifying mystery.

name: Arcana
summary: A free pixel-art roguelike deckbuilder with CCG-style combat. Collect over 130 cards, build strategic decks, and battle your way through a sci-fi fantasy world.

name: Arson
summary: Shift between three deadly combat forms in this brutal metroidvania. Wield high-speed melee, heavy firepower, and summoned minions to crush evolving enemies. Explore a ruined world shaped by your choices, uncover Arson’s lost past, and decide the fate of humanity’s remnants.

name: Arnie
summary: Shoot aliens, fly around and make everything explode, alone and with friends, in this frenetic 2D run and gun roguelite. Survive the procedurally generated environment, collect weapons, level up and defeat planetary bosses. Improve between runs and discover new planets as you win.

name: Are You Human?
summary: What are you? The CAPTCHA can't find an answer to that question, and it won’t let you go until it knows your identity. Through minigames and puzzles, you must prove your identity. Follow it's instructions...please, it will cry if you don't.

name: Arcane Shores
summary: Arcane Shores is a city-building strategy game where you turn a humble ancient settlement into a thriving, magic-infused kingdom. But this is not your land. A mysterious power stirs in the depths of the island—watching, warning, and making it clear you do not belong here

name: Artdink Game Log: Tail of the Sun
summary: The protagonist of this game is a primitive human. Their daily life was driven purely by instinct. They slept when tired, gathered fallen nuts, hunted animals to satisfy their hunger. This game recreates that wild, simple existence. Wagashi-shaped nuts, an open-world field, scattered objects resembling human body parts, avant-garde techno music, and a caveman who suddenly falls asleep while head-sliding... Experience a wild, pure, and simple life that appeals to your primal instincts.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Galactic Warriors
summary:
Galactic Fighters: Which mecha will you pilot, which weapon will you fight with?

"GALACTIC WARRIORS" is a fighting game released by KONAMI in 1985.
Join the "Robot Fighting" event, a major craze among galactic humanity in Cosmic Year HIT 30,000, and aim for victory.
Your protagonists are three beloved machines: SAMSON, GAEA, and POSEIDON.
The warriors of the cosmos roar through the stadium!

name: Ark: Valguero Ascended
summary: Explore Valguero, a land where medieval legend and ancient memory entwine. Journey across ten deadly biomes, from tundra to shadowed trenches, and face predators like the swift Deinonychus and the terrifying Megaraptor. Both beautiful and brutal, Valguero will test your survival like never before.

name: Armatus
summary: ARMATUS is a third-person roguelite shooter set in the demon-infested ruins of Paris. As the last supernatural warrior of an ancient order, armed with powerful firearms and incredible celestial powers, scour the city in search of a lost gateway to heaven - the Sunless Gate.

name: Aro: Tales in the Dome
summary: Aro: Tales in the Dome is a 2D hand-drawn action-adventure game. Play as Aro and explore an elemental world sealed beneath the dome. As the journey unfolds, uncover the hidden conspiracy and face the truth about the world, the dome, and yourself.

name: Arcade Archives: Bomb Bee
summary: The second in the BEE series! New charm for the block-breaker genre!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Bomb Bee
summary: The second in the BEE series! New charm for the block-breaker genre!

name: Arcade Archives: Galactic Warriors
summary:
Galactic Fighters: Which mecha will you pilot, which weapon will you fight with?

"GALACTIC WARRIORS" is a fighting game released by KONAMI in 1985.
Join the "Robot Fighting" event, a major craze among galactic humanity in Cosmic Year HIT 30,000, and aim for victory.
Your protagonists are three beloved machines: SAMSON, GAEA, and POSEIDON.
The warriors of the cosmos roar through the stadium!

name: Arcade Archives: Karate Blazers
summary: Defend the honour of the old master as only you can do.

name: Arq Of The Abyss
summary: In "Arq of the Abyss," step into the life of a scientist who invents a device to solve the energy crisis of 2050. As his invention creates a paradox, explore a 2D adventure filled with comic-style storytelling and situational puzzles. Your choices lead to unique scenarios and endings.

name: Armed With WIngs: Culmination
summary:
Armed with Wings Culmination is the fifth installment of the Armed with Wings series, after Red Moon and the main trilogy.

The game is centered around Lone Warrior's quest to slay Vandheer Lorde once and for all. The Lone Warrior chases Vandheer, who doesn't want to fight him as the Lone Warrior has become very weak after losing the "Armed with Wings" powers. He has to face various Dark Creatures while chasing Vandheer, but eventually catches up to him and their final battle begins. The Lone Warrior is finally slain and Vandheer leaves him to die alone.

This story takes place parallel to the remaining part of Armed with Wings 3 when frenzied by his rage, Lone Warrior leaves Leo in Chapter 4 of Armed with Wings 3 to hunt down Vandheer. Culmination reveals why Vandheer did not try to confront Leo before Network did, and why the Lone Warrior was resurrected.

name: Arctica
summary: An ancient terror emerges to threaten the survival of all humanity in this immersive first-person RPG. Explore 1980s Antarctica at the height of the cold war as the US leads an operation to secure the frozen frontier and ensure the end of the Soviet world.

name: Aria:||
summary: When you were little, did you ever make your fingers act like tiny people, letting them hop and dance to the music in the car as the scenery rolled by? A world that begins with lines and sound. That feeling is what Aria:‖ is all about. A quiet little game meant to make you smile.

name: Argonauts Agency: Patterns of Morpheus
summary: Jason, Medea, and Asclepius fight nightmares to restore the balance between sleep and waking life.

name: Arcade Archives: Bermuda Triangle
summary: From the creators of “IKARI WARRIORS” and “VICTORY ROAD” comes the Ultimate Time-Space Battle!!

name: Arcane Merchant
summary: Open your own shop in the heart of a Medieval Fantasy realm! Stock your shelves with everything from potions and swords to mysterious crystals and legendary artifacts. Set your prices, earn your customers' trust and become the richest merchant in town!

name: Arm Around!
summary: You are an arm. Yes, seriously, just an arm. And to be it you have to use your mouse. Oh, and everything is physics based. If it sounds hard it's because it is. Drag, jump, punch and arm around to... wait, what kind of a mission could a disembodied arm possibly have?

name: Arcade Archives: Roc'n Rope
summary:
Capture the “ROC” BIRD

"ROC'N ROPE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1983.
In pursuit of the lucky bird, the Roc, you must climb higher and higher through various locations, including cliffs and ice caves.
Use the rope, which can be fired diagonally upwards, to create the optimal route for a safe ascent!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Roc'n Rope
summary:
Capture the “ROC” BIRD

"ROC'N ROPE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1983.
In pursuit of the lucky bird, the Roc, you must climb higher and higher through various locations, including cliffs and ice caves.
Use the rope, which can be fired diagonally upwards, to create the optimal route for a safe ascent!

name: Arithmetic Arena
summary: Arithmetic Arena is a competitive math-challenge game built on the ELO ranking system. Each challenge tests not only your speed and accuracy, but also your ability to stay calm and composed. Confidence and composure will let you truly enjoy the game and find fun in every challenge.

name: Ars Mechanica
summary: A PvE idle strategy game where auto-battles unfold on a 10×5 grid battlefield. Customize and position your humanoid mechanical soldiers, defeat the enemies that stand in your way, and build the strongest mechanized army.

name: Ark: Lost Colony
summary: Plunge through the icy heart of darkness as you reunite with old legends, while rekindling hope for the next generation. ARK: Lost Colony bridges the gap between Extinction and ARK 2 with the most ambitious narrative experience in the franchise's history.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Bermuda Triangle
summary:
"BERMUDA TRIANGLE" is a shooting game released by SNK in 1987.
Pilot the time-space battleship ZIG and face off against mysterious enemies seeking to invade human history.
From the present to the past, the battlefield shifts with the changing ages. Power up your warship and gain the strength to survive any era!

name: Arrow Party
summary: Aim, release, and showcase your bullseye accuracy across various arcade mini-games in multiplayer fun with friends.

name: Arcade Archives: Space Invaders
summary:
Space Invaders is an arcade video game developed by Tomohiro Nishikado and released in 1978. It is one of the earliest shooting games and the aim is to defeat waves of aliens with a laser cannon to earn as many points as possible.

This Arcade Archives edition emulates both black/white and colored versions with a combination of color filters and backgrounds mimicking the original arcade machines.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Space Invaders
summary:
Space Invaders is an arcade video game developed by Tomohiro Nishikado and released in 1978. It is one of the earliest shooting games and the aim is to defeat waves of aliens with a laser cannon to earn as many points as possible.

This Arcade Archives edition emulates both black/white and colored versions with a combination of color filters and backgrounds mimicking the original arcade machines, along with VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support for smoother playback of the original frame rate.

name: Archer of Den
summary: The evil in the air has it's grip on everything. So it's up to you and your trusty bow to put a stop to it. You will travel a diverse set of lands to accomplish your goal. in this Action Adventure you have to do what it takes, run, shoot, slide, bomb , and even fly to bring back peace.

name: Arrow Bingo
summary: "Touch the arrow to slide the balls together, leading to One Away, then Bingo!" Touch the arrow to slide an entire line in its direction. You guide the balls to the matching color and pattern sheets and make them reach the goal, line them up to get Bingo, and sink them.

name: Arctic Grave
summary: Uncover the mystery of an arctic cargo facility's lost crew in this horror game. Take in the frozen sea and delve into the depths of this place, finding items and uncovering new paths with each one to learn what really happened here. But be careful, because something else might be here with you.

name: Armor Attack
summary: Armor Attack invites you to assemble your squad of sci-fi machines for intense PvP action! Lead robots, tanks, and hovers, each equipped with powerful weapons and unique abilities. Strategically combine these units to dominate the battlefield in a dynamic, evolving environment where every move matters.

name: Arcade Archives 2: The Outfoxies
summary:
"THE OUTFOXIES" is an action game released by NAMCO LIMITED (current Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1995.

You select one of the world’s top assassins as your protagonist, and under the orders of a mysterious billionaire, your mission is to eliminate all the others.

Whether for the reward, for pride, or simply for the thrill of combat…

A no-rules showdown among the world’s most dangerous professionals is about to begin!

The “Arcade Archives”series is developed with the concept of faithfully reproducing classic arcade games. It also includes convenient features such as difficulty and screen settings, rewind, rapid-fire, and multiple save slots. In addition, players can compete for the best scores with players around the world through online rankings.

“Arcade Archives 2” adds a new “TIME ATTACK MODE” to the lineup of “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HI SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the Arcade Archives series. In “TIME ATTACK MODE,” players compete to clear the game as quickly as possible, regardless of the score achieved. VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support has also been added, allowing gameplay to be reproduced even closer to the original arcade experience.

name: Arenosum
summary: This is an alternative take on the classic RTS. A 2D strategy game with 3D physics about the conquest of 'Sand Planet'.

name: Arcane Summoner
summary: A challenging creature collection game with real-time strategic combat. Explore a dark world full of mysteries, evolve your unique creatures, and face dangers as you uncover the secrets behind the mysterious Arcane Rift. Dare to dive into this epic adventure!

name: Argonauts Agency: The Bronze Plague - Collector's Edition
Arktis SCP-RP
summary: Dive into the mysterious and dangerous universe of the SCP Foundation with ARKTIS SCP. Explore secret facilities, survive anomalies, and experience an intense, narrative-driven roleplay adventure.

name: Arrows: Puzzle Escape
summary: Welcome to Arrows: Puzzle Escape, a minimalist puzzle game that challenges your logic, planning, and spatial thinking. Your goal is simple: extract each arrow without causing a collision.

name: Arcade Archives: Touchdown Fever
summary:
"TOUCHDOWN FEVER" is a sports game released by SNK in 1987.
Tap the buttons to push forward—simple controls make it easy to enjoy the flow of American football.
With over a hundred formations selected automatically, even beginners unfamiliar with detailed tactics can relax and enjoy the game.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Touchdown Fever
summary:
"TOUCHDOWN FEVER" is a sports game released by SNK in 1987.
Tap the buttons to push forward—simple controls make it easy to enjoy the flow of American football.

name: Arthur and His Companions
summary: A traditional pixel style role-playing game...

name: Artifact Run
summary: A treasure hunter searches for artifacts in the jungle and is chased by wild animals.

name: Arcade Archives: The Outfoxies
summary:
Make use of various weapons to eliminate the enemy assassins

"THE OUTFOXIES" is an action game released by NAMCO LIMITED (current Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1995.
You select one of the world’s top assassins as your protagonist, and under the orders of a mysterious billionaire, your mission is to eliminate all the others.
Whether for the reward, for pride, or simply for the thrill of combat…
A no-rules showdown among the world’s most dangerous professionals is about to begin!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Space Invaders Part II
summary:
In 1979, and again in 2026, the Invaders are returning!

"Space Invaders Part II" is a shooting game released by Taito in 1979.
The enemy Invaders have returned more powerful than ever, having acquired new tactics like splitting and receiving reinforcements from Ufos!
With added features like the Rainbow Bonus to aim for high scores, this title is long beloved by skilled experts looking to hone their abilities!

name: Arcade Archives: Space Invaders Part II
summary:
In 1979, and again in 2026, the Invaders are returning!

"Space Invaders Part II" is a shooting game released by Taito in 1979.
The enemy Invaders have returned more powerful than ever, having acquired new tactics like splitting and receiving reinforcements from Ufos!
With added features like the Rainbow Bonus to aim for high scores, this title is long beloved by skilled experts looking to hone their abilities!

name: Arcane Arts: Sorcerer's Quest
summary: Arcane Arts Academy - Sorcerer's Quest follows Erika as she embarks on a treacherous journey across diverse realms, seeking allies and a powerful long-lost artifact that could shift the tide of an impending war between Chaos and Order. Take on Time Management challenges and thwart the looming threat of war in the GameHouse Premiere of Arcane Arts Academy - Sorcerer's Quest!

name: Aresda
summary: An open-world space exploration game. Explore, trade and fight to rise the ranks, discover new worlds and new species, and leave your mark on the Galaxy.

name: Arcade Archives 2: Bomb Jack Twin
summary:
Even the toughest challenge can be overcome by two players!

"Bomb Jack Twin" is an action game released by NMK(original work by Koei Tecmo Games) in 1993.
The popular "Bomb Jack" is back, cuter and tougher than ever! Two-player simultaneous play is also possible!
Dodge enemy attacks and collect all the bombs on the stage. Prioritize grabbing the lit bombs for a chance at a high score!

name: Around the World 4: Family Tour - Collector's Edition
summary: An incredible and amazing journey!

name: Arcade Archives: Bomb Jack Twin
summary:
Even the toughest challenge can be overcome by two players!
"Bomb Jack Twin" is an action game released by NMK(original work by Koei Tecmo Games) in 1993.
The popular "Bomb Jack" is back, cuter and tougher than ever! Two-player simultaneous play is also possible!
Dodge enemy attacks and collect all the bombs on the stage. Prioritize grabbing the lit bombs for a chance at a high score!

name: Armored Vehicle Designer
summary: Sandbox game about designing armored vehicles.

name: Arcade Archives: Labyrinth Runner
summary: Pit your wits against the Devil!!

name: Artifact Seekers
summary: Become heroes of exciting challenges!

name: Arcade Archives 2: Labyrinth Runner
summary:
“LABYRINTH RUNNER” is a shooting game released by KONAMI in 1988.
You set off on a journey towards the castle where the evil Devil awaits, in order to rescue the kidnapped Princess Papaya.
Be wary of the various traps along the way, and use three types of projectiles to defeat enemies appearing from all directions as you advance!

name: Arc Aquarium
summary:
Build and manage your own aquarium by collecting fish, earning money, and unlocking decorations.
Feed your fish, clean the tank, and enjoy relaxing idle progression in this cozy 2D aquarium simulation.
